225_CD ._.
Overcrowding_VBG in_IN relation_NN to_TO Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay.-In_NNP the_DT foregoing_NN paragraph_NN one_CD effect_NN of_IN overcrowding_NN has_VBZ been_VBN noticed_VBN ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ an_DT even_RB more_RBR important_JJ one_CD to_TO be_VB considered_VBN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ frequently_RB been_VBN stated_VBN that_IN malaria_NN tends_VBZ to_TO diminish_VB in_IN proportion_NN as_IN the_DT density_NN of_IN a_DT population_NN increases_NNS ._.
The_DT explanation_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB sought_VBN in_IN the_DT comparative_JJ absence_NN of_IN breeding_VBG places_NNS of_IN ordinary_JJ carriers_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS usually_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN centres_NNS of_IN dense_JJ population_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN Bombay_NNP many_JJ areas_NNS which_WDT possess_VBP populations_NNS of_IN more_JJR than_IN 200-400_JJ people_NNS per_IN acre_NN are_VBP most_RBS malarious_JJ ._.
This_DT is_VBZ explained_VBN by_IN the_DT domestic_JJ habits_NNS of_IN Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN and_CC the_DT peculiar_JJ character_NN of_IN the_DT breeding_NN places_NNS selected_VBN by_IN it_PRP ._.
Provided_VBD the_DT carrier_NN of_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ present_JJ ,_, density_NN of_IN population_NN tends_NNS to_TO increase_VB rather_RB than_IN diminish_VB the_DT intensity_NN of_IN infection_NN ,_, for_IN anopheles_NNS have_VBP no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG food_NN and_CC shelter_NN in_IN the_DT crowded_JJ dwellings_NNS ,_, and_CC an_DT infected_JJ insect_NN has_VBZ far_RB greater_JJR chances_NNS of_IN biting_VBG large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN different_JJ people_NNS in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN when_WRB from_IN five_CD to_TO twenty_NN are_VBP sleeping_VBG in_IN a_DT single_JJ room_NN ,_, than_IN in_IN places_NNS where_WRB the_DT population_NN is_VBZ comparatively_RB sparse_JJ ._.
Overcrowding_VBG in_IN Bombay_NNP also_RB leads_VBZ to_TO many_JJ thousands_NNS of_IN people_NNS sleeping_VBG out-of-doors_NNS and_CC these_DT persons_NNS are_VBP specially_RB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
In_IN parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Fort_NNP near_IN the_DT New_NNP Docks_NNP hundreds_NNS of_IN people_NNS may_MD be_VB seen_VBN almost_RB all_PDT the_DT year_NN round_NN sleeping_VBG out-of-doors_NNS ;_: and_CC a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN these_DT people_NNS are_VBP infected_VBN with_IN malaria_NNS ._.
226_CD ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN Economic_NNP conditions_NNS on_IN malaria_NNS in_IN Bombay.-In_NNP one_CD of_IN the_DT earlier_JJR paragraphs_NN of_IN this_DT report_NN attention_NN was_VBD drawn_VBN to_TO the_DT economic_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN and_CC in_IN another_DT paragraph_NN in_IN discussing_VBG epidemic_JJ malaria_NNS reference_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO the_DT sudden_JJ rise_NN of_IN prices_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP during_IN 1907_CD and_CC 1908_CD ._.
The_DT importance_NN of_IN economic_JJ conditions_NNS in_IN modifying_VBG malaria_NN has_VBZ only_RB recently_RB been_VBN recognized_VBN although_IN it_PRP has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN known_VBN that_IN the_DT disease_NN tended_VBD to_TO diminish_VB in_IN times_NNS of_IN great_JJ prosperity_NN and_CC to_TO increase_VB in_IN times_NNS of_IN scarcity_NN ._.
Christophers*_NNP as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN investigations_NNS carried_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ malaria_NN there_EX is_VBZ often_RB closely_RB associated_VBN with_IN two_CD factors_NNS ,_, abnormally_RB heavy_JJ rainfall_NN and_CC high_JJ prices_NNS of_IN food_NN ._.

The_DT occurrence_NN of_IN heavy_JJ rainfall_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP always_RB results_NNS in_IN an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN malaria-carrying_JJ anopheles_NNS ,_, but_CC in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN another_DT paragraph_NN ,_, the_DT amount_NN of_IN rainfall_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB *_NNP Vide_NNP ``_`` Paludism_NNP ''_'' No_NN ._.
2_CD ,_, February_NNP 1911_CD ._.
B_IN 136-22_CD ?_. 86_CD to_TO generally_RB influence_VB the_DT anopheline_NN factor_NN ._.

This_DT is_VBZ not_RB the_DT first_JJ occasion_NN in_IN which_WDT high_JJ prices_NNS appear_VBP to_TO have_VB influenced_VBN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN outbreaks_NNS of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.

229_CD ._.
Soil_NNP disturbance_NN and_CC outbreaks_NNS of_IN Malaria.-For_NNP many_JJ years_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN recognized_VBN that_IN outbreaks_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS frequently_RB occurred_VBD in_IN association_NN with_IN excavation_NN and_CC other_JJ works_NNS involving_VBG soil_NN disturbance_NN ;_: and_CC these_DT observa-_JJ tions_NNS led_VBD to_TO the_DT old_JJ theory_NN that_IN the_DT virus_NN of_IN malaria_NN was_VBD present_JJ in_IN the_DT soil_NN and_CC that_IN over-turning_VBG the_DT soil_NN allowed_VBD it_PRP to_TO escape_VB and_CC diffuse_VB into_IN the_DT atmosphere_NN with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN epidemic_JJ outbreaks_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
Unfortunately_RB many_JJ people_NNS still_RB cling_VBG to_TO this_DT idea_NN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ on_IN this_DT account_NN to_TO try_VB and_CC make_VB clear_JJ the_DT sequence_NN of_IN events_NNS which_WDT leads_VBZ to_TO outbreaks_VB of_IN malaria_NNS often_RB more_RBR or_CC less_RBR directly_RB associated_VBN with_IN construction_NN works_NNS in_IN the_DT tropics_NNS ._.
230_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT East_NNP the_DT coolie_NN labourers_NNS employed_VBN on_IN such_JJ works_NNS are_VBP drawn_VBN almost_RB entirely_RB from_IN the_DT poorest_JJS and_CC most_RBS ignorant_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ;_: they_PRP are_VBP often_RB brought_VBN long_RB distances_NNS and_CC set_VB down_RP in_IN a_DT country_NN where_WRB the_DT climate_NN ,_, and_CC even_RB the_DT food_NN obtainable_JJ ,_, differ_VBP greatly_RB from_IN that_DT to_TO which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP accustomed_VBN ._.
If_IN housed_VBN at_IN all_DT they_PRP are_VBP generally_RB crowded_VBN into_IN temporary_JJ huts_NNS ,_, but_CC frequently_RB they_PRP are_VBP left_VBN to_TO find_VB what_WP shelter_NN they_PRP can_MD ._.

Their_PRP$ work_NN is_VBZ arduous_JJ and_CC their_PRP$ pay_NN small_JJ ;_: and_CC as_IN they_PRP generally_RB try_VBP to_TO save_VB money_NN for_IN the_DT support_NN of_IN dependents_NNS at_IN home_NN it_PRP is_VBZ no_DT uncommon_JJ thing_NN to_TO find_VB them_PRP attempting_VBG to_TO exist_VB upon_IN a_DT miserably_RB insufficient_JJ diet_NN ._.
Camped_NNP ,_, as_IN they_PRP usually_RB are_VBP ,_, upon_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, their_PRP$ surroundings_NNS are_VBP almost_RB always_RB highly_RB insanitary_JJ ,_, for_IN there_EX is_VBZ rarely_RB any_DT pretence_NN at_IN a_DT conservancy_NN system_NN and_CC sometimes_RB no_DT proper_JJ water-supply_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN much_JJ earth_NN work_NN is_VBZ going_VBG on_IN ,_, the_DT numerous_JJ pools_NNS of_IN water_NN formed_VBN during_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN speedily_RB become_VB the_DT breeding_JJ places_NNS of_IN countless_JJ swarms_NNS of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB surprising_JJ that_IN coolie_VBZ labourers_NNS on_IN large_JJ public_JJ works_NNS should_MD be_VB decimated_VBN by_IN outbreaks_NNS of_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, tending_VBG to_TO increase_VB in_IN severity_NN as_IN the_DT work_NN progresses_VBZ ._.
But_CC whatever_WDT happens_VBZ ?_. 87_CD to_TO the_DT coolies_NNS the_DT work_NN has_VBZ still_RB to_TO go_VB forward_RB ,_, so_RB that_IN as_RB long_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN progress_NN there_EX is_VBZ continual_JJ imigration_NN of_IN new_JJ labourers_NNS to_TO fill_VB the_DT gaps_NNS caused_VBN in_IN the_DT labour_JJ force_NN by_IN sickness_NN ,_, desertion_NN and_CC death_NN ._.
This_DT continual_JJ imigration_NN is_VBZ a_DT further_JJ source_NN of_IN mischief_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT constant_JJ introduction_NN of_IN gangs_NNS of_IN susceptible_JJ new_JJ comers_NNS into_IN camps_NNS which_WDT already_RB are_VBP hot-beds_NNS of_IN disease_NN ,_, increases_VBZ the_DT trouble_NN just_RB as_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN fuel_NN to_TO a_DT glowing_NN fire_NN increases_VBZ the_DT blaze_NN ._.
231_CD ._.
The_DT conditions_NNS briefly_VBP described_VBN above_IN or_CC some_DT slight_JJ modification_NN of_IN them_PRP are_VBP the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ outbreaks_NNS almost_RB universally_RB attributed_VBN to_TO soil_VB disturbances_NNS ._.
But_CC some_DT of_IN the_DT minor_JJ outbreaks_NNS attributed_VBD to_TO this_DT cause_NN are_VBP merely_RB the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN relapses_NNS among_IN labourers_NNS already_RB infected_VBN ,_, as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN arduous_JJ work_NN or_CC exposure_NN to_TO the_DT sun_NN and_CC rain_NN ._.
If_IN such_JJ epidemics_NNS of_IN relapses_NNS occur_VBP among_IN the_DT labourers_NNS of_IN a_DT labour_NN camp_NN where_WRB carriers_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS abound_VBP new_JJ infections_NNS will_MD increase_VB proportionately_RB ._.
232_CD ._.
A_DT consideration_NN of_IN these_DT facts_NNS shows_VBZ that_IN temporary_JJ aggregations_NNS of_IN labourers_NNS may_MD often_RB be_VB a_DT most_RBS potent_JJ cause_NN of_IN increased_JJ malaria_NNS in_IN places_NNS where_WRB the_DT infection_NN and_CC the_DT carrier_NN already_RB exist_VBP ;_: and_CC the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN even_RB quite_RB small_JJ labour_NN camps_NNS is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO produce_VB an_DT appreciable_JJ effect_NN ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN 1909_CD a_DT small_JJ collection_NN of_IN coolies_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO an_DT Indian_JJ contractor_NN were_VBD working_VBG in_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN Chowpatti_NNP ._.
There_EX were_VBD only_RB about_RB 23_CD of_IN them_PRP and_CC they_PRP were_VBD housed_VBN in_IN the_DT most_RBS miserable_JJ of_IN makeshift_NN shelters_NNS ._.
They_PRP had_VBD been_VBN working_VBG there_RB for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD a_DT few_JJ open_JJ wells_NNS close_RB by_IN infested_VBN with_IN larv_NN of_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN ._.
Examination_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN these_DT people_NNS showed_VBD that_IN 35_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD infected_VBN with_IN malaria_NN parasites_NNS ,_, an_DT index_NN far_RB exceeding_VBG that_IN of_IN Chowpatti_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_NN ._.
Not_RB only_RB did_VBD these_DT people_NNS suffer_VBP from_IN malaria_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT foreman_NN and_CC an_DT overseer_NN who_WP belonged_VBD to_TO Bombay_NNP and_CC who_WP had_VBD a_DT small_JJ office_NN on_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT works_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT they_PRP often_RB stayed_VBD till_JJ late_RB at_IN night_NN ,_, both_DT contracted_VBN malaria_NN ,_, most_RBS probably_RB in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
233_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP Works_NNP large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN labourers_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN together_RB and_CC many_JJ of_IN them_PRP were_VBD camped_VBN down_RB on_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
A_DT number_NN of_IN temporary_JJ frame_NN huts_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN for_IN these_DT people_NNS ,_, but_CC besides_IN these_DT ,_, many_JJ little_JJ shelters_NNS were_VBD built_VBN here_RB and_CC there_RB by_IN the_DT coolies_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
A_DT good_JJ supply_NN of_IN water_NN was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN from_IN the_DT City_NNP mains_NNS ,_, latrines_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN ,_, and_CC arrangements_NNS made_VBN for_IN medical_JJ treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN but_CC for_IN these_DT precautions_NNS disease_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN even_RB more_RBR prevalent_JJ amongst_IN the_DT labourers_NNS than_IN it_PRP was_VBD ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN special_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN against_IN malaria_NN at_IN the_DT commence-_JJ ment_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN if_IN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN generally_RB known_VBN that_IN malaria_NN was_VBD prevalent_JJ in_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP ,_, which_WDT adjoins_VBZ the_DT dock_NN site_NN ,_, efficient_JJ preventive_JJ measures_NNS would_MD have_VB been_VBN instituted_VBN from_IN the_DT first_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT most_RBS simple_JJ measure_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT labourers_NNS from_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN after_IN night-fall_JJ ._.
234_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ recorded_VBN that_IN ,_, when_WRB the_DT road_NN between_IN Colombo_NNP and_CC Kandy_NNP was_VBD being_VBG constructed_VBN a_DT fearful_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN malaria_NNS occurred_VBD amongst_IN the_DT labourers_NNS employed_VBN ,_, who_WP were_VBD encamped_VBN along_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN ._.
Villages_NNS near_IN the_DT line_NN also_RB suffered_VBD severely_RB ._.
Because_IN of_IN this_DT outbreak_NN ,_, arrangements_NNS were_VBD made_VBN at_IN a_DT later_JJ period_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN the_DT railway_NN ,_, to_TO convey_VB all_PDT the_DT labourers_NNS to_TO and_CC from_IN the_DT work_NN by_IN special_JJ trains_NNS ._.
The_DT labourers_NNS were_VBD housed_VBN in_IN Colombo_NNP and_CC Kandi_NNP away_RB from_IN the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN this_DT measure_NN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN disease_NN was_VBD avoided_VBN ._.
235_CD ._.
Education_NN in_IN relation_NN to_TO Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay.-Celli_NNP has_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN education_NN has_VBZ a_DT most_RBS important_JJ influence_NN in_IN modifying_VBG the_DT severity_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._.
Usually_RB other_JJ things_NNS being_VBG equal_JJ malaria_NN tends_VBZ to_TO be_VB most_RBS prevalent_JJ among_IN the_DT poorest_JJS and_CC more_RBR ignorant_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN pro-_JJ portion_NN as_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN education_NN leads_VBZ people_NNS to_TO seek_VB proper_JJ treatment_NN for_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC to_TO adopt_VB methods_NNS for_IN its_PRP$ prevention_NN malaria_NN will_MD become_VB less_RBR and_CC less_RBR common_JJ ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN the_DT educated_JJ citizens_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP are_VBP familiar_JJ with_IN current_JJ ideas_NNS regarding_VBG malaria_NNS and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN them_PRP on_IN occasion_NN seek_VBP the_DT advice_NN of_IN qualified_JJ medical_JJ practitioners_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS and_CC themselves_PRP and_CC adopt_VB minor_JJ precautions_NNS against_IN malaria_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN mosquito_JJ nets_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, at_IN night_NN ;_: though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN mosquito_JJ nets_NNS are_VBP more_RBR often_RB used_VBN because_IN of_IN the_DT discomfort_NN of_IN mosquito_NN bites_NNS ,_, than_IN with_IN the_DT idea_NN of_IN escaping_VBG malaria_NN ._.
?_. 88_CD 236_CD ._.
But_CC in_IN regard_NN to_TO public_JJ measures_NNS of_IN prevention_NN directed_VBN against_IN malaria_PRP a_DT great_JJ deal_NN has_VBZ still_RB to_TO be_VB learned_VBN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ often_RB a_DT difficult_JJ matter_NN to_TO convince_VB otherwise_RB well_RB informed_JJ people_NNS that_IN an_DT open_JJ well_NN may_MD be_VB a_DT danger_NN not_RB only_RB to_TO themselves_PRP but_CC to_TO their_PRP$ neighbours_NNS ._.
This_DT fact_NN explains_VBZ in_IN part_NN the_DT persistence_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT continued_VBN existence_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP would_MD be_VB impossible_JJ ,_, but_CC for_IN the_DT facilities_NNS afforded_VBD to_TO the_DT breeding_NN of_IN the_DT carrier_NN ,_, N._NNP stephensi_NN ,_, in_IN wells_NNS and_CC other_JJ collections_NNS of_IN water_NN which_WDT are_VBP under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT property-owning_NN and_CC educated_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
237_CD ._.
The_DT Effect_NNP of_IN Treatment_NNP upon_IN the_DT Prevalence_NNP of_IN Malaria.-It_NNP has_VBZ sometimes_RB been_VBN supposed_VBN that_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT main_JJ factors_NNS in_IN causing_VBG the_DT dis-_JJ appearance_NN of_IN malaria_NN from_IN Great_NNP Britain_NNP was_VBD the_DT gradual_JJ adoption_NN of_IN efficient_JJ methods_NNS of_IN treatment_NN for_IN the_DT disease_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ considerable_JJ evidence_NN to_TO support_VB the_DT view_NN that_IN in_IN proportion_NN as_IN communities_NNS make_VBP use_NN of_IN quinine_NN and_CC skilled_VBD treatment_NN the_DT disease_NN tends_VBZ to_TO become_VB less_RBR prevalent_JJ ._.
Bombay_NNP is_VBZ favourably_RB situated_VBN in_IN possessing_VBG a_DT number_NN of_IN medical_JJ institutions_NNS and_CC also_RB very_RB many_JJ trained_JJ physicians_NNS and_CC chemists_NNS and_CC druggists_NNS ;_: and_CC a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS are_VBP treated_VBN by_IN them_PRP every_DT year_NN ._.
Every_DT case_NN of_IN malaria_NNS adequately_RB treated_VBD lessens_VBZ the_DT chance_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ to_TO estimate_VB the_DT exact_JJ effect_NN which_WDT is_VBZ produced_VBN upon_IN the_DT malaria_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP by_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN many_JJ thousand_VBP cases_NNS of_IN infection_NN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ question_NN that_IN it_PRP exerts_VBZ a_DT very_RB strong_JJ ameliorating_VBG influence_NN ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP still_RB a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS who_WP are_VBP not_RB reached_VBN by_IN treatment_NN and_CC until_IN they_PRP are_VBP induced_VBN to_TO seek_VB it_PRP of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ free_JJ will_MD or_CC to_TO receive_VB it_PRP when_WRB offered_VBN ,_, they_PRP will_MD remain_VB a_DT danger_NN to_TO the_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN so_RB long_RB as_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ uncontrolled_VBN by_IN public_JJ measures_NNS directed_VBN against_IN the_DT anopheles_NNS mosquito_VBP which_WDT carries_VBZ it_PRP ._.
238_CD ._.
Migration_NN and_CC Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay.-It_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT favourite_JJ theory_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP that_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ an_DT imported_JJ disease_NN ._.
No_DT doubt_NN a_DT certain_JJ proportion_NN of_IN those_DT who_WP come_VBP into_IN the_DT City_NNP every_DT year_NN from_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP districts_NNS and_CC other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, carry_VBP malaria_JJ parasities_NNS with_IN them_PRP ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN a_DT very_RB great_JJ amount_NN of_IN infection_NN is_VBZ imported_VBN in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT migration_NN into_IN the_DT City_NNP from_IN the_DT more_RBR malarious_JJ districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ;_: there_EX are_VBP few_JJ immigrants_NNS from_IN Sind_NNP ,_, Panch_NNP Mahls_NNP and_CC Knara_NNP which_WDT are_VBP probably_RB the_DT most_RBS malarious_JJ districts_NNS ;_: and_CC neither_CC the_DT Konkan_NNP nor_CC the_DT Deccan_NNP as_IN a_DT whole_NN are_VBP very_RB malarious_JJ ._.
239_CD ._.
The_DT examination_NN of_IN people_NNS newly_RB arrived_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ country_NN has_VBZ rarely_RB shown_VBN evidence_NN of_IN much_JJ malaria_NNS amongst_VBP them_PRP ,_, except_IN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN vagrants_NNS ,_, among_IN some_DT of_IN whom_WP enlarged_VBD spleen_NN is_VBZ not_RB uncommon_JJ ;_: whereas_NNS among_IN Bombay_NNP born_JJ people_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Prsis_NNP ,_, malaria_NN is_VBZ common_JJ ._.
As_IN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP the_DT spleen_JJ index_NN indicates_VBZ that_IN imported_VBN malaria_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT serious_JJ matter_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT spleen_JJ census_NN ,_, conducted_VBN in_IN an_DT area_NN including_VBG 5/6ths_CD of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, which_WDT harbours_VBZ 2/3rds_CD of_IN the_DT total_JJ population_NN ,_, gave_VBD an_DT index_NN of_IN only_RB 1.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG 1/6th_CD of_IN the_DT island_NN to_TO the_DT south_NN of_IN this_DT ,_, an_DT area_NN which_WDT harbours_VBZ 1/3rd_CD of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, the_DT spleen_JJ index_NN was_VBD nearly_RB 15_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
240_CD ._.
But_CC although_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN much_JJ malaria_NN is_VBZ imported_VBN from_IN without_IN ,_, internal_JJ migration_NN from_IN the_DT south_NN to_TO the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN present_NN there_RB ._.
Quite_RB recently_RB many_JJ thousand_VBP people_NNS have_VBP been_VBN displaced_VBN from_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT malarious_JJ localities_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ question_NN that_IN a_DT proportion_NN of_IN the_DT enlarged_NN spleens_NNS which_WDT raise_VBP the_DT spleen_JJ index_NN of_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN to_TO 1.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
belong_NN in_IN reality_NN to_TO the_DT south_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
241_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN malarial_JJ infection_NN can_MD not_RB spread_VB in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT carrier_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ often_RB overlooked_VBN ._.
If_IN every_DT person_NN who_WP entered_VBD Bombay_NNP was_VBD infected_VBN with_IN malaria_NNS there_EX could_MD be_VB no_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN if_IN the_DT comparatively_RB few_JJ breeding_VBG places_NNS of_IN dangerous_JJ anopheles_NNS were_VBD efficiently_RB controlled_VBN ._.
242_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN that_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN malaria_NN contracted_VBN locally_RB is_VBZ many_JJ times_NNS in_IN excess_NN of_IN that_DT introduced_VBD into_IN the_DT island_NN from_IN without_IN ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ question_NN that_IN from_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN the_DT importation_NN of_IN malaria_JJ infection_NN into_IN Bombay_NNP may_MD be_VB ignored_VBN ._.
?_. PART_NNP III.-PREVENTION_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY_NNP ._.
CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
HISTORY_NN OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY_NNP ._.
Section_NN 1_CD ._.
243_CD ._.
THE_DT PAST_NNP HISTORY_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY.-The_NNP history_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP dates_NNS from_IN quite_RB recent_JJ times_NNS ,_, for_IN although_IN much_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN in_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD centuries_NNS to_TO reclaim_VB the_DT ``_`` drowned_JJ lands_NNS ''_'' in_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, embankments_NNS having_VBG been_VBN built_VBN here_RB and_CC there_RB ,_, many_JJ swamps_NNS and_CC marshes_NNS having_VBG been_VBN filled_VBN in_IN and_CC much_JJ low-land_NN raised_VBN above_IN flood_NN level_NN ;_: and_CC although_IN much_JJ of_IN this_DT work_NN was_VBD originally_RB undertaken_VBN with_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN improving_VBG the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ questionable_JJ if_IN it_PRP can_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN specially_RB directed_VBN against_IN malaria_NN ._.
244_CD ._.
In_IN 1841_CD the_DT two_CD Napiers_NNS cleared_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT foreshore_NN at_IN Colaba_NNP of_IN mangrove_NN bushes_NNS in_IN the_DT hope_NN of_IN reducing_VBG malaria_NNS ,_, which_WDT had_VBD become_VBN so_RB severe_JJ during_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Causeway_NNP as_IN to_TO seriously_RB affect_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS ._.
This_DT measure_NN was_VBD undoubtedly_RB directed_VBN against_IN malaria_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN after_IN it_PRP was_VBD carried_VBN cut_VBD the_DT disease_NN diminished_VBD in_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, though_RB whether_IN as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN or_CC merely_RB because_IN of_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT Causeway_NNP ,_, the_DT construction_NN of_IN which_WDT had_VBD caused_VBN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO determine_VB ._.
245_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB possible_JJ to_TO class_NN the_DT numerous_JJ drainage_NN schemes_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP in_IN Bombay_NNP since_IN 1863_CD as_IN anti-malaria_JJ measures_NNS ;_: for_IN although_IN it_PRP was_VBD at_IN one_CD time_NN believed_VBD that_IN the_DT undrained_JJ areas_NNS in_IN the_DT island_NN were_VBD malarious_JJ and_CC that_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN sewers_NNS and_CC storm-water_NN drains_NNS would_MD render_VB them_PRP more_RBR healthy_JJ ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT evidence_NN that_IN malaria_NN was_VBD influenced_VBN in_IN the_DT slightest_JJS degree_NN by_IN the_DT drains_NNS and_CC sewers_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP now_RB severely_RB affected_VBN by_IN malaria_NNS are_VBP among_IN those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN longest_JJS drained_VBN ,_, while_IN the_DT northern_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN which_WDT is_VBZ totally_RB undrained_JJ is_VBZ almost_RB free_JJ of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, negatives_VBZ this_DT view_NN ._.
246_CD ._.
The_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT Committee_NNP by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP in_IN September_NNP 1901_CD to_TO consider_VB certain_JJ matters_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT presence_NN of_IN Anopheles_NNP mosquitoes_NNS and_CC the_DT measures_NNS which_WDT might_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO reduce_VB or_CC suppress_VB them_PRP ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN the_DT first_JJ occasion_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT adoption_NN of_IN specific_JJ measures_NNS against_IN malaria_NN on_IN the_DT lines_NNS laid_VBD down_RB by_IN Ross_NNP received_VBD consideration_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
At_IN that_DT time_NN it_PRP was_VBD assumed_VBN that_IN malaria_NN was_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ amount_NN of_IN sickness_NN and_CC considerable_JJ mortality_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP urged_VBD the_DT Corporation_NN to_TO attempt_VB the_DT destruction_NN of_IN every_DT kind_NN of_IN mosquito_NN ,_, and_CC stated_VBD that_IN they_PRP ``_`` Were_NNP prepared_VBN to_TO recommend_VB the_DT Corporation_NNP to_TO sanction_VB liberal_JJ expenditure_NN ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, to_TO make_VB these_DT measures_NNS effective_JJ ,_, but_CC as_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP believes_VBZ that_IN he_PRP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO carry_VB them_PRP out_RP with_IN the_DT existing_VBG establishment_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO endeavour_VB to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, and_CC to_TO report_VB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN three_CD months_NNS if_IN he_PRP finds_VBZ that_IN a_DT special_JJ staff_NN will_MD be_VB required_VBN ._. ''_''
As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN their_PRP$ recommendations_NNS certain_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD undertaken_VBN ._.
Apparently_RB it_PRP was_VBD soon_RB found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO augment_VB the_DT existing_VBG staff_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ recorded_VBN in_IN 1902_CD that_IN for_IN each_DT ward_NN of_IN No_NNP ._.
1_CD Division_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP one_CD mosquito_NN gang_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT sub-inspector_NN and_CC four_CD men_NNS ,_, was_VBD formed_VBN ._.
No_DT ._.
1_CD Division_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP at_IN that_DT time_NN consisted_VBD of_IN three_CD wards_NNS A._NNP ,_, B._NNP ,_, C._NNP with_IN a_DT total_JJ area_NN of_IN about_IN 3.8_CD square_JJ miles_NNS and_CC a_DT population_NN of_IN 376,624_CD and_CC the_DT mosquito_NN gangs_NNS for_IN work_NN in_IN this_DT area_NN numbered_VBD 3_CD sub-inspectors_NNS and_CC 12_CD men_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ wages_NNS of_IN this_DT staff_NN at_IN present_JJ rates_NNS would_MD amount_VB to_TO about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
260_CD per_IN month_NN (_( or_CC about_IN 208_CD per_IN annum_NN )_) ,_, These_DT gangs_NNS found_VBD Anopheles_NNP larv_FW chiefly_NN in_IN fountains_NNS ,_, drinking_VBG troughs_NNS ,_, tubs_NNS and_CC buckets_NNS ,_, open_JJ cisterns_NNS and_CC certain_JJ drains_NNS ._.
Culex_NNP larv_NN they_PRP found_VBD chiefly_NN in_IN wells_NNS ,_, gullies_NNS and_CC stormwater_JJR catch-pits_NNS ._.
B_IN 136-23_CD ?_. 90_CD The_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP records_NNS that_WDT holes_VBZ in_IN the_DT ground_NN were_VBD filled_VBN where_WRB possible_JJ ;_: open_JJ drains_NNS cleared_VBD ;_: drinking_VBG troughs_NNS ,_, tubs_NNS and_CC buckets_NNS emptied_VBD once_RB a_DT week_NN ;_: fish_JJ were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN fountains_NNS ;_: and_CC other_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN a_DT mixture_NN of_IN tar_NN and_CC kerosine_NN ._.
247_CD ._.
In_IN March_NNP 1903_CD the_DT Corporation_NNP asked_VBD for_IN a_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN since_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT resolution_NN regarding_VBG anti-mosquito_JJ measures_NNS the_DT year_NN previously_RB ._.
A_DT list_NN of_IN 855_CD places_NNS dealt_NN with_IN ,_, including_VBG pools_NNS ,_, ditches_NNS ,_, wells_NNS ,_, fountains_NNS ,_, quarry-holes_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, was_VBD submitted_VBN to_TO them_PRP and_CC the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP stated_VBD that_DT work_NN on_IN the_DT lines_NNS laid_VBD down_RB in_IN 1902_CD was_VBD being_VBG continued_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN (_( July_NNP 1903_CD )_) ,_, the_DT Corporation_NNP resolved_VBD that_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP should_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO organize_VB a_DT regular_JJ system_NN of_IN cleaning_VBG public_JJ wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS at_IN fixed_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
But_CC in_IN August_NNP of_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP reported_VBD that_IN ,_, no_DT good_JJ so_RB far_RB as_IN mosquito_JJ larv_NN are_VBP concerned_VBN will_MD be_VB obtained_VBN by_IN periodical_JJ cleansing_NN such_JJ as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN was_VBD able_JJ to_TO do_VB ._.
He_PRP recommended_VBD that_IN the_DT Heads_NNP of_IN Departments_NNP ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ charge_NN the_DT wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS were_VBD ,_, should_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO arrange_VB for_IN their_PRP$ systematic_JJ cleansing_NN ._.
248_CD ._.
In_IN 1904_CD the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP recommended_VBD the_DT filling_VBG up_RP or_CC covering_VBG of_IN wells_NNS or_CC the_DT use_NN of_IN fish_NN in_IN them_PRP ;_: but_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN wells_NNS thus_RB dealt_NN with_IN is_VBZ not_RB stated_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT Health_NNP report_NN for_IN 1904_CD it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB stated_VBN whether_IN the_DT special_JJ staff_NN appointed_VBN for_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN in_IN 1902_CD was_VBD continued_VBN during_IN that_DT year_NN ._.
249_CD ._.
In_IN 1905_CD owing_VBG to_TO the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT quarters_NNS of_IN the_DT Inspector_NNP at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP Reservoir_NNP ,_, wire_NN gauze_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN to_TO the_DT verandahs_NN and_CC windows_NNS at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
750_CD ._.
In_IN August_NNP 1905_CD the_DT Corporation_NNP passed_VBD a_DT resolution_NN asking_VBG the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO report_VB on_IN the_DT probable_JJ cause_NN or_CC causes_NNS of_IN the_DT reputed_JJ unhealthiness_NN of_IN the_DT houses_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT reservoir_NN and_CC those_DT in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT nullah_NN between_IN the_DT reservoir_NN and_CC Nepean_NNP Sea_NNP Road_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO report_VB what_WP steps_VBZ he_PRP proposed_VBD taking_VBG to_TO remove_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN unhealthiness_NN and_CC the_DT cost_NN thereof_NN ._.
The_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP recom-_NN mended_VBD that_IN the_DT open_JJ channel_NN drain_NN for_IN waste_NN water_NN from_IN the_DT water_NN works_VBZ should_MD be_VB continued_VBN higher_JJR up_RB and_CC that_IN all_PDT the_DT places_NNS from_IN whence_NN water_NN oozed_VBN should_MD be_VB drained_VBN ._.
He_PRP advised_VBD the_DT abolishing_NN of_IN the_DT Dhobi_NNP Ghat_NNP also_RB and_CC suggested_VBD that_IN residents_NNS in_IN the_DT affected_JJ area_NN should_MD be_VB given_VBN a_DT leaflet_NN explaining_VBG how_WRB to_TO prevent_VB the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
In_IN December_NNP 1905_CD the_DT Municipal_NNP Com-_NNP missioner_NN directed_VBD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO undertake_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN cutting_VBG away_RB undergrowth_JJ and_CC connecting_VBG the_DT sand_NN washing_VBG tanks_NNS with_IN the_DT existing_VBG channel_NN drain_NN ._.
This_DT work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP by_IN January_NNP 1906_CD ._.
Towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1905_CD the_DT Corporation_NNP moved_VBD a_DT resolution_NN regarding_VBG the_DT supposed_VBN increasing_VBG preva-_JJ lence_NN of_IN malaria_NNS and_CC other_JJ fevers_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN Government_NNP was_VBD approached_VBN and_CC a_DT Special_JJ Committee_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN in_IN March_NNP 1906_CD to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
250_CD ._.
During_IN 1906_CD although_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS was_VBD undertaken_VBN in_IN various_JJ localities_NNS there_RB does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN any_DT measure_NN of_IN im-_JJ portance_NN carried_VBD out_RP against_IN malaria_NNS ._.

251_CD ._.
In_IN 1907_CD the_DT Corporation_NNP sanctioned_VBD the_DT expenditure_NN of_IN a_DT considerable_JJ sum_NN of_IN money_NN for_IN the_DT repair_NN of_IN Bhandarwada_NNP Hill_NNP Reservoir_NNP at_IN Mazagaon_NNP ,_, which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN subject_JJ to_TO serious_JJ leakage_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ._.
The_DT leak_NN gave_VBD rise_NN to_TO springs_NNS and_CC streamlets_NNS near_IN the_DT base_NN of_IN the_DT hill_NN and_CC these_DT became_VBD the_DT breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN Anopheles_NNP mosquitoes_NNS (_( M._NNP listoni_NN )_) ,_, the_DT presence_NN of_IN which_WDT caused_VBD the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN among_IN residents_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT same_JJ year_NN complaints_NNS were_VBD received_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Frere_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Chowpati_NNP ;_: and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN preventive_JJ work_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN done_VBN in_IN both_DT areas_NNS ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP records_NNS ,_, regarding_VBG Frere_NNP Road_NNP ,_, that_IN all_PDT the_DT storm-water_JJ catch-pits_NNS in_IN the_DT locality_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT side_NN walls_NNS of_IN gullies_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN with_IN pesterine_NN (_( crude_VB petroleum_NN )_) at_IN frequent_JJ intervals_NNS ;_: and_CC that_IN stagnant_JJ pools_NNS in_IN the_DT new_JJ Dock_NNP compound_NN were_VBD also_RB pesterined_VBN ._.
At_IN Chowpati_NNP also_RB similar_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN ._.
?_. 91_CD 252_CD ._.
In_IN 1908_CD the_DT Special_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP in_IN 1906_CD to_TO enquire_VB into_IN the_DT supposed_VBN increasing_VBG prevalence_NN of_IN malaria_NNS and_CC other_JJ fevers_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, presented_VBD their_PRP$ report_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN this_DT report_NN the_DT question_NN of_IN malaria_NN was_VBD dismissed_VBN very_RB briefly_JJ ,_, and_CC beyond_IN referring_VBG to_TO the_DT leaky_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT reservoirs_NNS and_CC filters_NNS at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP and_CC Bhandarwada_NNP Hill_NNP as_IN a_DT cause_NN of_IN malaria_NNS in_IN those_DT localities_NNS ,_, and_CC advising_VBG that_IN steps_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO remedy_VB this_DT condition_NN ,_, no_DT recommendations_NNS were_VBD made_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT adoption_NN of_IN specific_JJ measures_NNS against_IN malaria_NN ._.

The_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, on_IN being_VBG asked_VBN to_TO report_VB upon_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, stated_VBD that_IN all_DT stagnant_JJ pools_NNS in_IN the_DT new_JJ Dock_NNP compound_NN were_VBD being_VBG frequently_RB treated_VBN with_IN pesterine_NN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP as_IN in_IN 1907_CD ;_: and_CC he_PRP recommended_VBD that_IN the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP should_MD be_VB asked_VBN to_TO take_VB up_RP the_DT question_NN also_RB ._.

254_CD ._.

255_CD ._.
On_IN September_NNP 17th_CD ,_, 1908_CD ,_, an_DT assistant_NN Sanitary_NNP Inspector_NNP and_CC four_CD men_NNS were_VBD deputed_VBN for_IN special_JJ mosquito_NN destruction_NN work_NN in_IN Ward_NNP A._NN and_CC a_DT Sub-_JJ Inspector_NNP and_CC four_CD men_NNS for_IN similar_JJ duties_NNS in_IN each_DT of_IN Wards_NNP B._NNP ,_, D._NNP ,_, and_CC E._NNP ,_, respectively_RB ._.

256_CD ._.
In_IN spite_NN of_IN these_DT measures_NNS a_DT severe_JJ outbreak_NN of_IN malaria_NNS occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ quarter_NN of_IN 1908_CD ,_, the_DT disease_NN being_VBG especially_RB prevalent_VBN in_IN the_DT Frere_NNP Road_NNP ,_, near_IN the_DT docks_NNS ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN was_VBD greatly_RB interfered_VBN with_IN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN fever_NN among_IN the_DT shipping_NN coolies_NNS and_CC staff_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC the_DT G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Railway_NNP had_VBD great_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN maintaining_VBG their_PRP$ daily_JJ complement_NN of_IN trains_NNS on_IN account_NN of_IN sickness_NN among_IN their_PRP$ guards_NNS and_CC drivers_NNS ._.

257_CD ._.
In_IN November_NNP 1908_CD the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP decided_VBD that_IN in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT serious_JJ loss_NN of_IN life_NN and_CC health_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT grave_NN embarrassment_NN that_WDT had_VBD been_VBN caused_VBN to_TO the_DT business_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP and_CC the_DT trade_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, immediate_JJ action_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO investigate_VB the_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC to_TO devise_VB measures_NNS of_IN prevention_NN for_IN the_DT future_NN ._.
?_. 92_CD Section_NN 2_CD ._.
258_CD ._.
THE_DT HISTORY_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP SINCE_NNP 1908.-_CD The_DT recent_JJ history_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP may_MD be_VB said_VBD to_TO date_NN from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT enquiry_NN arranged_VBD for_IN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN 1908_CD ._.
In_IN November_NNP of_IN that_DT year_NN the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP decided_VBD to_TO depute_VB a_DT Special_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, to_TO investigate_VB the_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC proposed_VBN to_TO associate_VB with_IN him_PRP a_DT small_JJ Committee_NNP representing_VBG the_DT chief_JJ public_JJ bodies_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
Early_RB in_IN 1909_CD Captain_NNP A._NNP G._NNP McKendrick_NNP ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, was_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO conduct_VB the_DT investigation_NN ;_: and_CC a_DT Committee_NNP consisting_NN of_IN representatives_NNS from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT Bombay_NNP Port_NNP Trust_NNP ,_, the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP ,_, the_DT G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Railway_NNP Company_NNP and_CC the_DT B_NNP ._.
B_NNP ._.
&_CC C._NNP I_PRP ._.
Railway_NNP Company_NNP was_VBD formed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP any_DT measures_NNS which_WDT might_MD appear_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT immediate_JJ mitigation_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._.
259_CD ._.
In_IN March_NNP 1909_CD Captain_NNP McKendrick_NNP ,_, having_VBG discovered_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT very_RB heavy_JJ percentage_NN of_IN malaria-stricken_JJ persons_NNS in_IN the_DT area_NN bounded_VBN by_IN Church_NNP Gate_NNP Street_NNP on_IN the_DT south_NN ,_, Hornby_NNP and_CC Paltan_NNP Roads_NNP on_IN the_DT west_NN ,_, the_DT Harbour_NNP on_IN the_DT east_NN and_CC Musjid_NNP Siding_NNP on_IN the_DT north_NN ,_, suggested_VBN in_IN view_NN of_IN this_DT fact_NN and_CC in_IN anticipation_NN of_IN a_DT renewal_NN of_IN the_DT malaria_NNS epidemic_VBP in_IN the_DT autumn_NN of_IN 1909_CD that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB wise_JJ to_TO take_VB immediate_JJ steps_NNS to_TO treat_VB with_IN quinine_NN all_DT children_NNS in_IN this_DT area_NN affected_VBD with_IN enlarged_JJ spleen_NN ._.
He_PRP therefore_RB approached_VBD the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN a_DT scheme_NN was_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP and_CC eventually_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN two_CD medical_JJ assistants_NNS on_IN salaries_NNS of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
125_CD each_DT per_IN mensem_NN and_CC ten_JJ compounders_NNS on_IN salaries_NNS of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
40_CD each_DT per_IN mensem_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN a_DT house_NN to_TO house_NN distribution_NN of_IN quinine_JJ tablets_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT area_NN mentioned_VBD above_IN ._.
The_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN was_VBD commenced_VBN in_IN April_NNP 1909_CD and_CC by_IN May_NNP 5th_CD Captain_NNP McKendrick_NNP reported_VBD that_IN 1,212_CD children_NNS were_VBD under_IN treatment_NN out_IN of_IN 1,496_CD found_NN to_TO have_VB enlarged_VBN spleen_NN in_IN the_DT area_NN specified_VBD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT scheme_NN of_IN treatment_NN Captain_NNP McKendrick_NNP commenced_VBD to_TO train_VB a_DT staff_NN of_IN men_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN investigating_VBG the_DT mosquito_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ intention_NN was_VBD that_IN these_DT men_NNS would_MD be_VB subsequently_RB employed_VBN as_IN supervisors_NNS of_IN anti-mosquito_JJ gangs_NNS for_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT rains_NNS ._.
To_TO meet_VB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN necessary_JJ for_IN these_DT different_JJ duties_NNS and_CC the_DT supply_NN of_IN quinine_NN required_VBN ,_, a_DT special_JJ budget_NN grant_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
12,000_CD was_VBD made_VBN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ._.

Experimental_JJ mosquito_NN destruction_NN had_VBD also_RB been_VBN undertaken_VBN in_IN the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP enclosure_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN some_DT weeks_NNS after_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT rains_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN that_IN an_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC six_CD to_TO ten_VB men_NNS could_MD keep_VB that_IN area_NN practically_RB free_JJ from_IN mosquito_JJ larv_NN by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN larvacides_NNS ._.
263_CD ._.
The_DT memoranda_NN submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT members_NNS of_IN the_DT Malaria_NNP Investiga-_NNP tion_NN Committee_NNP were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Letter_NN No_UH ._.
114_CD ,_, dated_VBD 17th_CD July_NNP 1909_CD ,_, from_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP A._NNP Bentley_NNP ,_, M.P._NNP ,_, D.P.H._NNP ,_, on_IN Special_JJ Duty_NNP ,_, Malaria_NNP Investigation_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
``_`` In_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT minutes_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP Meeting_NNP held_VBD on_IN ``_`` June_NNP 30th_CD ,_, 1909_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO submit_VB for_IN your_PRP$ consideration_NN ,_, ?_. 93_CD ``_`` the_DT enclosed_JJ Memorandum_NNP dealing_VBG with_IN Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP with_IN especial_JJ ``_`` reference_NN to_TO the_DT steps_NNS which_WDT in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN should_MD be_VB undertaken_VBN by_IN the_DT ``_`` Municipality_NNP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO mitigating_VBG the_DT disease_NN during_IN the_DT present_JJ ``_`` season_NN and_CC eventually_RB attempting_VBG its_PRP$ complete_JJ control_NN ._.
Memorandum_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT Investigation_NNP into_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN Malaria_NNP within_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN ``_`` Bombay_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN the_DT disease_NN to_TO be_VB prevalent_JJ over_IN a_DT very_RB large_JJ area_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN particular_JJ it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB present_JJ in_IN a_DT persistent_JJ form_NN in-_JJ ``_`` Ward_NNP A.-Lower_NNP Colaba_NNP and_CC ``_`` Ward_NNP C.-Market_NNP ._.

``_`` These_DT observations_NNS serve_VBP to_TO give_VB some_DT idea_NN of_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN sickness_NN ``_`` produced_VBN by_IN this_DT disease_NN within_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.

Such_JJ loss_NN is_VBZ necessarily_RB very_RB greatly_RB increased_VBD when_WRB ``_`` Malaria_NNP becomes_VBZ epidemic_JJ as_IN is_VBZ has_VBZ done_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP recently_RB ._.
But_CC it_PRP ``_`` must_MD not_RB be_VB supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD not_RB present_JJ in_IN considerable_JJ ``_`` amount_NN within_IN the_DT City_NNP previously_RB ._.
Enquiry_NN shows_VBZ that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ existed_VBN ``_`` in_IN certain_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP for_IN many_JJ years_NNS and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT likelihood_NN ``_`` of_IN its_PRP$ dying_VBG out_RP spontaneously_RB ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN there_RB appear_VBP to_TO be_VB ``_`` grave_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN believing_VBG that_DT in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN organized_VBN measures_NNS for_IN ``_`` its_PRP$ suppression_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN will_MD persist_VB ,_, and_CC may_MD even_RB extend_VB and_CC increase_VB ``_`` in_IN intensity_NN in_IN certain_JJ localities_NNS from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ;_: while_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN it_PRP ``_`` remains_VBZ unchecked_JJ ,_, the_DT City_NNP will_MD be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT danger_NN of_IN epidemics_NNS ``_`` similar_JJ to_TO the_DT one_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN witnessed_VBN during_IN 1907-08_JJ ._.
Malaria_NNP ``_`` presents_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP certain_JJ peculiarities_NNS both_CC as_IN regards_NNS distribution_NN ``_`` and_CC propagation_NN which_WDT are_VBP in_IN marked_JJ contrast_NN to_TO generally_RB recorded_VBN ``_`` observations_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
In_IN this_DT City_NNP ,_, Malaria_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ ``_`` generally_RB considered_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT disease_NN of_IN scattered_JJ rural_JJ districts_NNS and_CC ``_`` tracts_NNS of_IN jungle_NN and_CC unopened_JJ country_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB found_VBN widely_RB distributed_VBN ``_`` through_IN densely_RB populated_VBN areas_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Chakla_NNP ,_, Umarkhadi_NNP and_CC ``_`` Khara_NNP Talao_NNP with_IN populations_NNS of_IN from_IN 500_CD to_TO over_IN 600_CD persons_NNS per_IN ``_`` acre_NN ._.
The_DT explanation_NN of_IN this_DT fact_NN is_VBZ given_VBN by_IN a_DT study_NN of_IN the_DT habits_NNS ``_`` of_IN the_DT mosquito_NN which_WDT serves_VBZ as_IN the_DT common_JJ carrier_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN in_IN ``_`` this_DT City_NNP ._.
For_IN the_DT species_NNS of_IN Anopheles-N._NNP stephensi_NN which_WDT serves_VBZ to_TO ``_`` propagate_VB Malaria_NNP within_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO breed_VB readily_RB in_IN wells_NNS ,_, ``_`` cisterns_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, tubs_NN and_CC in_IN fact_NN in_IN almost_RB any_DT conceivable_JJ receptacle_NN for_IN ``_`` water-natural_JJ or_CC artificial-whereas_JJ in_IN many_JJ places_NNS where_WRB other_JJ varieties_NNS ``_`` of_IN Anopheles_NNS are_VBP concerned-only_JJ natural_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS such_JJ as_IN ?_. 95_CD ``_`` streams_NNS ,_, ponds_NNS ,_, ditches_NNS and_CC puddles_NNS are_VBP dangerous_JJ ._.
These_DT facts_NNS have_VBP a_DT ``_`` considerable_JJ bearing_NN upon_IN the_DT problem_NN of_IN Malaria_NNP prevention_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
``_`` It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP that_IN organized_VBN and_CC systematic_JJ mosquito_NN destruction_NN ``_`` will_MD afford_VB a_DT means_NN of_IN controlling_VBG the_DT disease_NN within_IN definite_JJ limits_NNS ,_, and_CC ``_`` provided_VBD it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN with_IN due_JJ care_NN ,_, should_MD reduce_VB the_DT liability_NN to_TO ``_`` epidemic_JJ manifestations_NNS or_CC even_RB entirely_RB prevent_VBP their_PRP$ occurrence_NN ._.
It_PRP ``_`` must_MD not_RB be_VB supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT task_NN of_IN mosquito_JJ destruction_NN to_TO an_DT extent_NN ``_`` sufficient_JJ to_TO actually_RB control_VB Malaria_NNP ,_, will_MD be_VB an_DT easy_JJ one_CD ._.
But_CC given_VBN a_DT ``_`` proper_JJ staff_NN and_CC organization_NN ,_, adequate_JJ powers_NNS ,_, and_CC sufficient_JJ expenditure_NN ``_`` and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP it_PRP will_MD be_VB quite_RB possible_JJ to_TO obtain_VB the_DT desired_JJ results_NNS ._.
``_`` I_PRP wish_VBP to_TO make_VB it_PRP clear_JJ from_IN the_DT outset_NN that_IN in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO ``_`` deal_VB with_IN the_DT matter_NN effectively_RB it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO create_VB a_DT Special_JJ ``_`` Department_NNP engaged_VBD solely_RB in_IN mosquito_JJ destruction_NN ,_, and_CC working_VBG under_IN ``_`` the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Such_JJ a_DT Department_NNP must_MD ``_`` be_VB a_DT permanent_JJ one_CD and_CC must_MD possess_VB a_DT small_JJ regular_JJ staff_NN of_IN skilled_VBN men_NNS ``_`` whose_WP$ sole_JJ duty_NN all_PDT the_DT year_NN round_NN must_MD be_VB anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN ._.
In_IN ``_`` addition_NN ,_, arrangements_NNS must_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN increasing_VBG the_DT staff_NN by_IN the_DT ``_`` addition_NN of_IN unskilled_JJ men_NNS during_IN the_DT period_NN between_IN the_DT outset_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` rains_NNS and_CC the_DT complete_JJ establishment_NN of_IN the_DT dry_JJ season_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT short_JJ ``_`` memorandum_NN it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO go_VB into_IN details_NNS ,_, which_WDT will_MD require_VB ``_`` careful_JJ discussion_NN ._.
But_CC I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB as_IN a_DT tentative_JJ measure_NN that_IN ``_`` steps_NNS be_VB taken_VBN to_TO organize_VB such_PDT a_DT Department_NNP for_IN immediate_JJ work_NN in_IN ``_`` Wards_NNP A._NN and_CC B._NNP and_CC possibly_RB Walkeshwar_NNP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO subsequently_VB ``_`` extending_VBG operations_NNS over_IN the_DT whole_JJ southern_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP south_VBP ``_`` of_IN a_DT line_NN drawn_NN between_IN Kasara_NNP Basin_NNP ,_, Mazagon_NNP ,_, and_CC Mahaluxmi_NNP Battery_NNP ,_, ``_`` and_CC possibly_RB in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Island_NNP ._.
Briefly_NNP ,_, I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB that_IN ``_`` the_DT area_NN in_IN which_WDT operations_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB commenced_VBN should_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN ``_`` sections_NNS ,_, of_IN a_DT size_NN to_TO allow_VB of_IN each_DT being_VBG inspected_VBN thoroughly_RB by_IN a_DT ``_`` responsible_JJ officer_NN at_IN weekly_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Each_DT one_CD of_IN these_DT sections_NNS must_MD ``_`` be_VB sub-divided_JJ and_CC put_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT trained_JJ muccadum_NN who_WP must_MD ``_`` control_VB one_CD to_TO three_CD or_CC four_CD men_NNS ._.
Large_JJ sized_VBD plans_NNS must_MD be_VB prepared_VBN of_IN ``_`` each_DT section_NN and_CC sub-section_NN ,_, wherein_WP all_DT possible_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS must_MD ``_`` be_VB plainly_RB marked_JJ and_CC every_DT place_NN in_IN which_WDT mosquito_NN larv_NN have_VBP been_VBN ``_`` found_VBN must_MD be_VB indicated_VBN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, section_NN and_CC sub-section_NN registers_NNS ``_`` must_MD be_VB drawn_VBN up_IN of_IN every_DT potential_JJ breeding_NN place_NN for_IN mosquitoes_NNS and_CC ``_`` a_DT diary_JJ or_CC journal_JJ must_MD be_VB kept_VBN by_IN each_DT Inspector_NNP recording_VBG his_PRP$ visit_NN to_TO ``_`` each_DT sub-section_NN and_CC the_DT result_NN of_IN his_PRP$ inspection_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ staff_NN must_MD be_VB ``_`` made_VBN clearly_RB to_TO understand_VB that_DT their_PRP$ sole_NN duty_NN is_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB mosquitoes_NNS ``_`` breeding_VBG within_IN the_DT area_NN under_IN their_PRP$ charge_NN ._.

Failure_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT breeding_NN ``_`` of_IN mosquitoes_NNS must_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB reported_VBN to_TO head-quarters_NNS ._.
Failure_NN to_TO ``_`` prevent_VB mosquitoes_NNS breeding_VBG or_CC to_TO report_VB such_JJ failure_NN and_CC its_PRP$ reason_NN ``_`` should_MD entail_VB liability_NN to_TO dismissal_VB ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB clear_JJ that_IN the_DT areas_NNS under_IN ``_`` the_DT control_NN of_IN each_DT Inspector_NNP must_MD not_RB be_VB made_VBN too_RB large_JJ or_CC there_EX will_MD be_VB ``_`` inadequate_JJ supervision_NN which_WDT will_MD result_VB in_IN certain_JJ failure_NN ._.
Further_IN it_PRP ``_`` must_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT whole_JJ question_NN of_IN mosquito_NN destruction_NN in_IN ``_`` a_DT City_NNP such_JJ as_IN Bombay_NNP presents_VBZ a_DT problem_NN for_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN which_WDT little_JJ ``_`` assistance_NN can_MD be_VB gained_VBN from_IN examples_NNS of_IN such_JJ work_NN elsewhere_RB ._.
General_NNP ``_`` principles_VBZ only_RB can_MD be_VB laid_VBN down_RB to_TO guide_VB us_PRP in_IN framing_VBG a_DT workable_JJ ``_`` scheme_NN ,_, and_CC actual_JJ experiment_NN in_IN a_DT limited_JJ area_NN must_MD be_VB undertaken_VBN to_TO ``_`` determine_VB the_DT minimum_JJ staff_NN necessary_JJ ,_, the_DT powers_NNS of_IN control_NN required_VBN ``_`` and_CC the_DT probable_JJ expenditure_NN that_WDT will_MD be_VB involved_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO attain_VB ``_`` success_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ for_IN these_DT reasons_NNS that_IN I_PRP suggest_VBP that_IN steps_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN ``_`` for_IN the_DT organization_NN of_IN a_DT Special_JJ Department_NNP to_TO work_VB in_IN a_DT limited_JJ area_NN in_IN ``_`` A._NN and_CC B_NNP ._.
Wards_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN similar_JJ work_NN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN ``_`` the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP and_CC Railway_NNP Authorities_NNP ._.
We_PRP must_MD not_RB lose_VB sight_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` fact_NN that_IN mosquito_JJ destruction_NN must_MD be_VB carried_VBN on_IN indefinitely_RB ,_, although_IN ``_`` there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ question_NN but_CC that_IN it_PRP will_MD become_VB easier_JJ year_NN by_IN year_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN this_DT connexion_NN it_PRP must_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN wells_NNS ,_, ``_`` public_JJ and_CC private_JJ ,_, has_VBZ a_DT special_JJ importance_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP ,_, at_IN ``_`` Mazagon_NNP and_CC at_IN Colaba_NNP unguarded_VBD wells_NNS form_VBP the_DT breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN large_JJ ``_`` numbers_NNS of_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN and_CC unless_IN adequate_JJ control_NN of_IN wells_NNS can_MD be_VB ?_. 96_CD ``_`` ensured_VBD it_PRP will_MD be_VB impossible_JJ to_TO effectually_RB carry_VB out_RP any_DT measure_NN of_IN ``_`` mosquito_JJ destruction_NN with_IN hope_NN of_IN success_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP preparing_VBG a_DT special_JJ ``_`` report_NN dealing_VBG with_IN this_DT question_NN which_WDT I_PRP shall_MD forward_RB separately_RB ._. ''_''
264_CD ._.
Letter_NNP No_NNP ._.
116_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 17th_CD July_NNP 1909_CD ,_, from_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP A._NNP Bentley_NNP ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, D.P.H._NNP ,_, on_IN Special_JJ Duty_NNP ,_, Malaria_NNP Investigation_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, re_JJ State_NNP of_IN Wells_NNP ,_, private_JJ and_CC public_JJ ,_, within_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN Fort_NNP North_NNP ._.
``_`` In_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT minutes_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP Meeting_NNP held_VBD on_IN ``_`` the_DT 30th_CD June_NNP 1909_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO draw_VB your_PRP$ attention_NN to_TO the_DT ``_`` dangerous_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT wells_NNS ,_, private_JJ and_CC public_JJ ,_, within_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` Fort_NNP North_NNP ._.
A_DT careful_JJ examination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN of_IN 511_CD wells_NNS within_IN ``_`` this_DT section_NN with_IN the_DT following_JJ result_NN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) 240_CD have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN to_TO contain_VB very_RB numerous_JJ larv_NN of_IN Anopheles_NNP Mosquitoes_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) 32_CD of_IN these_DT contain_VBP larv_NN of_IN Culex_NNP or_CC Stegomyia_NNP in_IN addition_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) A_DT total_NN of_IN 83_CD wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN to_TO contain_VB larv_NN of_IN either_DT Culex_NNP or_CC Stegomyia_NNP Mosquitoes_NNP ._.
``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN by_IN a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN house-holders_NNS that_IN many_JJ of_IN ``_`` these_DT wells_NNS are_VBP unused_JJ ._.
In_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN discovered_VBN whose_WP$ ``_`` existence_NN was_VBD unknown_JJ to_TO the_DT present_JJ occupiers_NNS of_IN the_DT houses_NNS in_IN which_WDT ``_`` they_PRP were_VBD situated_VBN ._.
Many_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN houses_NNS with_IN mosquito-infected_JJ ``_`` wells_NNS complained_VBD of_IN being_VBG troubled_VBN with_IN mosquitoes_NNS ,_, but_CC few_JJ ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, ``_`` appeared_VBD to_TO know_VB that_IN the_DT source_NN of_IN their_PRP$ trouble_NN was_VBD the_DT open_JJ or_CC ``_`` improperly_RB guarded_VBN well_RB in_IN the_DT house_NN itself_PRP ._.
A_DT certain_JJ proportion_NN of_IN ``_`` wells_NNS are_VBP provided_VBN with_IN wooden_JJ covers_NNS ,_, but_CC many_JJ of_IN such_JJ covers_NNS are_VBP ``_`` useless_JJ and_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP frequently_RB ``_`` left_VBD open_JJ ._.
A_DT few_JJ wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN blocked_VBN up_RP and_CC in_IN certain_JJ cases_NNS ,_, ``_`` particularly_RB in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Frere_NNP Road_NNP ,_, wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN ``_`` recently_RB with_IN Pesterine_NNP and_CC are_VBP free_JJ from_IN mosquito_JJ larv_NN ._.
``_`` Species_NNS of_IN Mosquitoes_NNP breeding_VBG in_IN the_DT Wells.-Among_NNP the_DT 240_CD wells_NNS ``_`` infested_VBN by_IN the_DT larv_NN of_IN Anopheles_NNP ,_, nearly_RB every_DT one_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO ``_`` be_VB the_DT breeding_JJ place_NN of_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN ,_, a_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ carrier_NN of_IN ``_`` Malaria_NNP ._.
The_DT few_JJ exceptions_NNS show_VBP the_DT presence_NN of_IN M._NNP rossi_NN ._.
It_PRP ``_`` has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN experimentally_RB that_IN this_DT species_NNS of_IN Anopheles_NNS can_MD be_VB ``_`` readily_RB infected_VBN with_IN Filaria_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN all_DT probability_NN it_PRP is_VBZ one_CD of_IN the_DT agents_NNS ``_`` in_IN the_DT propagation_NN of_IN Filarial_NNP Disease_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ ``_`` investigation_NN adult_NN mosquitoes_NNS of_IN this_DT species_NNS ,_, that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN caught_VBN and_CC ``_`` examined_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO test_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN their_PRP$ serving_NN as_IN carriers_NNS of_IN ``_`` Malaria_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN to_TO be_VB very_RB heavily_RB infected_VBN with_IN Filarial_NNP ``_`` embryos_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT connection_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB remarked_VBN that_IN certain_JJ common_JJ ``_`` species_NNS of_IN Culex_NNP mosquito_NN are_VBP known_VBN to_TO be_VB also_RB concerned_VBN in_IN the_DT ``_`` transmission_NN of_IN Filarial_NNP disease_NN ,_, and_CC among_IN the_DT 83_CD wells_NNS which_WDT contain_VBP ``_`` other_JJ than_IN Anopheles_NNP larv_CC Culex_NNP mosquitoes_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN are_VBP to_TO be_VB ``_`` found_VBN breeding_NN ._.
A_DT certain_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT wells_NNS contain_VBP the_DT larv_NN ``_`` of_IN Stegomyia_NNP calopus_NN (_( formerly_RB known_VBN as_IN Stegomyia_NNP fasciata_NN )_) ,_, the_DT ``_`` species_NNS of_IN mosquito_NN concerned_VBN in_IN the_DT propagation_NN of_IN Yellow_NNP Fever_NNP in_IN the_DT ``_`` Western_NNP Hemisphere_NNP ._.
``_`` Malaria_NNP in_IN the_DT Fort.-Enquiry_NN shows_VBZ that_IN Malaria_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN present_JJ ``_`` in_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP Section_NNP for_IN many_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT reference_NN to_TO past_VB ``_`` history_NN reveals_VBZ the_DT fact_NN that_IN for_IN generations_NNS this_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP ``_`` has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN the_DT evil_JJ effects_NNS of_IN 'dangerous_JJ miasmata_NNS ._. '_''
It_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ ``_`` that_IN Anopheles_NNP mosquitoes_NNS must_MD have_VB existed_VBN in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ``_`` for_IN a_DT very_RB long_JJ time_NN and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN their_PRP$ distribution_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ``_`` extended_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
For_IN mosquitoes_NNS can_MD be_VB conveyed_VBN long_JJ ``_`` distances_NNS in_IN covered_JJ vehicles_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP may_MD frequently_RB be_VB found_VBN ``_`` taking_VBG shelter_NN in_IN shigrams_NNS and_CC the_DT hoods_NNS of_IN victorias_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ ``_`` probable_JJ that_IN among_IN the_DT many_JJ carriages_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS which_WDT daily_RB visit_VBZ ``_`` and_CC sometimes_RB remain_VB for_IN hours_NNS within_IN the_DT busy_JJ trading_NN centre_NN of_IN ``_`` Fort_NNP North_NNP ,_, a_DT large_JJ proportion_NN carry_VBP away_RB mosquitoes_NNS from_IN the_DT locality_NN ?_. 97_CD ``_`` and_CC in_IN this_DT way_NN serve_VBP to_TO transit_VB them_PRP to_TO other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
``_`` Dangerous_JJ mosquitoes_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ species_NNS as_IN those_DT breeding_VBG in_IN such_JJ ``_`` large_JJ numbers_NNS in_IN the_DT wells_NNS of_IN the_DT Fort_NNP can_MD be_VB found_VBN at_IN Malabar_NNP ``_`` Hill_NNP and_CC in_IN wells_NNS at_IN Mazagon_NNP and_CC Colaba_NNP ,_, and_CC exist_VBP in_IN smaller_JJR numbers_NNS ``_`` in_IN many_JJ other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ certain_JJ that_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN such_JJ ``_`` large_JJ numbers_NNS are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO breed_VB unchecked_JJ within_IN the_DT wells_NNS of_IN ``_`` the_DT Fort_NNP many_JJ of_IN them_PRP will_MD be_VB carried_VBN thence_NN to_TO other_JJ localities_NNS and_CC from_IN ``_`` time_NN to_TO time_NN new_JJ centres_NNS of_IN infection_NN will_MD thus_RB be_VB set_VBN up_RP in_IN places_NNS at_IN ``_`` present_JJ but_CC little_JJ affected_JJ ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN such_PDT an_DT extension_NN of_IN ``_`` the_DT distribution_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ Anopheles_NNP Mosquitoes_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN going_VBG on_IN for_IN ``_`` very_RB many_JJ years_NNS within_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN this_DT condition_NN of_IN things_NNS has_VBZ ``_`` been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT primary_JJ causes_NNS at_IN work_NN in_IN bringing_VBG about_IN the_DT increased_VBN ``_`` prevalence_NN of_IN Malaria_NNP which_WDT culminated_VBD in_IN the_DT recent_JJ epidemic_JJ mani-_NN ``_`` festation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN Malaria_NNP is_VBZ rife_VBN within_IN the_DT ``_`` Fort_NNP ,_, especially_RB the_DT North_NNP Section_NNP which_WDT contains_VBZ so_RB many_JJ wells_NNS ._.
A_DT ``_`` recent_JJ examination_NN of_IN 2,782_CD children_NNS resident_NN in_IN this_DT locality_NN revealed_VBD ``_`` the_DT fact_NN that_IN 40.9_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN enlarged_VBN spleen_NN ._.
This_DT ``_`` compares_VBZ very_RB unfavourably_RB with_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN an_DT examination_NN of_IN ``_`` 2,761_CD children_NNS in_IN Wards_NNP F._NNP and_CC G._NNP among_IN whom_WP only_RB 1.4_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
``_`` showed_VBD splenic_JJ enlargement_NN ._.
A_DT more_RBR recent_JJ microscopical_JJ examination_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN 170_CD persons_NNS resident_NN in_IN Fort_NNP North_NNP showed_VBD no_DT less_JJR than_IN ``_`` 77_CD to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN Malaria_NNP parasites_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS examined_VBD included_VBN ``_`` 57_CD adults_NNS and_CC 113_CD children_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT adults_NNS 28_CD were_VBD infected_VBN and_CC of_IN ``_`` the_DT children_NNS 49_CD ._.
Among_IN the_DT children_NNS a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN had_VBD ``_`` been_VBN undergoing_JJ quinine_JJ treatment_NN or_CC the_DT proportion_NN of_IN infections_NNS would_MD ``_`` undoubtedly_RB have_VBP been_VBN much_JJ higher_JJR ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN for_IN the_DT ``_`` purposes_NNS of_IN this_DT examination_NN no_DT selection_NN of_IN cases_NNS was_VBD made_VBN ,_, blood_NN films_NNS ``_`` being_VBG taken_VBN from_IN any_DT persons_NNS who_WP were_VBD willing_JJ ._.
These_DT observations_NNS ``_`` show_VBP that_IN the_DT present_JJ sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN North_NNP Fort_NNP ,_, especially_RB as_IN ``_`` regards_NNS the_DT existence_NN of_IN such_JJ an_DT extraordinary_JJ number_NN of_IN unguarded_JJ ``_`` wells_NNS ,_, is_VBZ a_DT menace_NN to_TO the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ City_NNP ._.
For_IN the_DT danger_NN ``_`` resulting_VBG from_IN the_DT continuous_JJ breeding_NN of_IN such_JJ large_JJ number_NN of_IN ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS is_VBZ not_RB confined_VBN to_TO residents_NNS in_IN that_DT locality_NN only_RB ._.
There_EX are_VBP ``_`` many_JJ wells_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP at_IN present_JJ free_JJ from_IN mosquitoes_NNS ,_, but_CC ``_`` sooner_RB or_CC later_RBR they_PRP will_MD become_VB infected_JJ if_IN dangerous_JJ centres_NNS such_JJ as_IN ``_`` those_DT in_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO remain_VB unchecked_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB ``_`` long_RB as_IN this_DT is_VBZ case_NN the_DT the_DT whole_JJ City_NNP must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO ``_`` the_DT danger_NN of_IN recrudescences_NNS of_IN epidemic_JJ Malaria_NNP ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN there_EX ``_`` should_MD be_VB no_DT delay_NN in_IN taking_VBG adequate_JJ steps_NNS to_TO control_VB this_DT danger_NN ._.
``_`` All_DT unused_JJ wells_NNS should_MD be_VB filled_VBN in_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Those_DT that_IN ``_`` are_VBP required_VBN for_IN use_NN should_MD be_VB provided_VBN with_IN permanent_JJ covers_NNS suitably_RB ``_`` designed_VBN and_CC arrangements_NNS made_VBN for_IN raising_VBG the_DT water_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT ``_`` hand_NN pump_NN ._.
The_DT depth_NN of_IN no_DT well_NN that_IN I_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN would_MD preclude_VB the_DT ``_`` use_NN of_IN a_DT simple_JJ suction_NN pump_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT most_RBS suitable_JJ ``_`` form_NN of_IN covering_VBG would_MD be_VB a_DT permanent_JJ cover_NN of_IN re-inforced_JJ concrete_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT cost_NN of_IN protecting_VBG these_DT wells_NNS efficiently_RB need_VBP not_RB be_VB great_JJ ,_, while_IN ``_`` the_DT benefit_NN to_TO the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT residents_NNS in_IN the_DT locality_NN will_MD be_VB enormous_JJ ._.
``_`` Moreover_RB a_DT constant_JJ source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP will_MD ``_`` have_VB been_VBN removed_VBN ._.
It_PRP must_MD be_VB remarked_VBN that_IN it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ ``_`` to_TO protect_VB the_DT wells_NNS in_IN which_WDT larv_NN are_VBP at_IN present_JJ breeding_NN ._.
There_EX ``_`` are_VBP probably_RB millions_NNS of_IN adult_NN mosquitoes_NNS already_RB existing_VBG in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP ``_`` and_CC as_RB soon_RB as_IN their_PRP$ favourite_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS are_VBP abolished_VBN ,_, numbers_NNS of_IN ``_`` these_DT will_MD seek_VB other_JJ suitable_JJ locations_NNS ._.
This_DT being_VBG the_DT case_NN it_PRP will_MD ``_`` certainly_RB follow_VBP that_IN any_DT well_RB in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP can_MD ``_`` obtain_VB access_NN ,_, if_IN not_RB already_RB infected_VBN ,_, will_MD speedily_RB become_VB so_RB ._.
In_IN ``_`` addition_NN it_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN likely_RB that_IN a_DT far_RB larger_JJR proportion_NN of_IN wells_NNS ``_`` actually_RB harbour_JJ mosquito_NN larv_NN than_IN has_VBZ been_VBN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT present_JJ enquiry_NN ,_, for_IN unless_IN they_PRP are_VBP present_JJ in_IN very_RB large_JJ ``_`` numbers_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB difficult_JJ to_TO dip_VB them_PRP out_RP with_IN either_DT a_DT bucket_NN ``_`` or_CC a_DT net_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS the_DT water_NN can_MD be_VB reached_VBN in_IN no_DT other_JJ way_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN a_DT well_NN which_WDT serves_VBZ as_IN a_DT breeding_VBG place_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ``_`` should_MD be_VB declared_VBN a_DT dangerous_JJ nuisance_NN and_CC a_DT house_NN which_WDT contains_VBZ B_NNP 136-_JJ 25_CD ?_. 98_CD ``_`` a_DT well_NN in_IN which_WDT Anopheles_NNP mosquitoes_NNS are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO breed_VB should_MD be_VB ``_`` declared_JJ unfit_NN for_IN habitation_NN ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO point_VB out_RP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ``_`` my_PRP$ belief_NN that_IN until_IN steps_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN to_TO remedy_VB the_DT condition_NN of_IN ``_`` the_DT wells_NNS in_IN Fort_NNP North_NNP ,_, all_DT other_JJ forms_NNS of_IN anti-malarial_JJ sanitation_NN within_IN ``_`` this_DT area_NN will_MD be_VB rendered_VBN futile_JJ and_CC moreover_VB the_DT continued_JJ existence_NN ``_`` of_IN numerous_JJ uncontrolled_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN Anopholes_NNP in_IN this_DT locality_NN ``_`` will_MD tend_VB to_TO annul_VB efforts_NNS at_IN mosquito_JJ destruction_NN in_IN adjoining_VBG areas_NNS ._. 265_CD ._.
Action_NNP taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality.-On_NNP the_DT receipt_NN of_IN these_DT memo-_JJ randa_NN the_DT following_JJ action_NN was_VBD taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ._.
After_IN being_VBG submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP they_PRP were_VBD considered_VBN ._.
by_IN a_DT Special_JJ Committee_NNP in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP and_CC the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT latter_JJ officer_NN was_VBD asked_VBN to_TO report_VB on_IN them_PRP ._.
He_PRP advised_VBD against_IN the_DT creation_NN of_IN a_DT Special_JJ Department_NNP and_CC recommended_VBN instead_RB the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT small_JJ staff_NN divided_VBN into_IN a_DT different_JJ number_NN of_IN gangs_NNS ,_, one_CD or_CC more_JJR to_TO be_VB allocated_VBN to_TO each_DT ward_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
These_DT gangs_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB engaged_VBN solely_RB in_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN and_CC were_VBD to_TO supplement_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN already_RB supposed_VBN to_TO be_VB done_VBN by_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ sanitary_JJ staff_NN ;_: and_CC they_PRP were_VBD to_TO undertake_VB the_DT destruction_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS of_IN every_DT kind_NN ._.
266_CD ._.
The_DT proposal_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP and_CC a_DT special_JJ staff_NN of_IN 10_CD Sub-Inspectors_NNS at_IN Rs_NNP ._.
40_CD each_DT per_IN mensem_NN and_CC 10_CD gangs_NNS of_IN 5_CD coolies_NNS each_DT at_IN Rs_NNP ._.
11-1-3_JJ per_IN man_NN per_IN mensem_NN was_VBD appointed_VBN ._.
The_DT yearly_JJ cost_NN of_IN these_DT gangs_NNS was_VBD estimated_VBN at_IN Rs_NNP ._.
12,000_CD ._.
The_DT staff_NN was_VBD a_DT temporary_JJ one_CD and_CC was_VBD at_IN first_JJ appointed_VBN for_IN only_RB six_CD months_NNS from_IN October_NNP 1909_CD ._.
Subsequently_RB they_PRP were_VBD again_RB appointed_VBN for_IN another_DT year_NN ._.
Originally_RB the_DT idea_NN was_VBD to_TO distri-_JJ bute_NN this_DT special_JJ staff_NN over_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, but_CC finally_RB they_PRP were_VBD allocated_VBN to_TO A._NNP ,_, B._NNP ,_, D._NNP and_CC E._NNP Wards_NNP ,_, an_DT area_NN covering_VBG 8.6_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC possessing_VBG a_DT population_NN of_IN 522,000_CD people_NNS housed_VBN in_IN 23,469_CD houses_NNS ._.
Though_IN appointed_VBN primarily_RB for_IN anti-malaria_JJ work_NN they_PRP were_VBD directed_VBN to_TO undertake_VB measures_NNS against_IN every_DT kind_NN of_IN mosquito_NN ._.
The_DT special_JJ staff_NN commenced_VBD work_NN on_IN October_NNP 1st_CD ,_, 1909_CD ,_, just_RB before_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
267_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT proposals_NNS accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP were_VBD on_IN the_DT same_JJ lines_NNS as_IN those_DT originally_RB adopted_VBN in_IN 1902_CD ,_, when_WRB 3_CD Sub-Inspectors_NNS and_CC 12_CD men_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN to_TO carry_VB out_RP general_JJ anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN in_IN area_NN of_IN 38_CD square_JJ miles_NNS among_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 376,642_CD and_CC again_RB in_IN September_NNP 1908_CD when_WRB 4_CD Sub-Inspectors_NNS with_IN 4_CD men_NNS each_DT were_VBD deputed_VBN for_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN in_IN A._NN ,_, B._NNP ,_, D._NNP and_CC E._NNP Wards_NNP ._.
The_DT scheme_NN of_IN work_NN embodied_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ departure_NN from_IN the_DT suggestions_NNS submitted_VBN in_IN the_DT memorandum_NN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP ,_, more_RBR especially_RB as_IN regards_NNS the_DT sphere_NN of_IN operations_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT memo-_JJ andum_NN it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN suggested_VBN that_IN work_NN should_MD be_VB commenced_VBN in_IN a_DT limited_JJ area_NN in_IN A._NN and_CC B_NNP ._.
Wards_NNS in_IN connexion_NN with_IN the_DT similar_JJ work_NN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP and_CC Railway_NNP Authorities_NNP mainly_RB with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO determine_VB the_DT minimum_JJ staff_NN required_VBN ,_, the_DT powers_NNS of_IN control_NN necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT probable_JJ expenditure_NN that_WDT would_MD be_VB incurred_VBN for_IN efficient_JJ work_NN ;_: moreover_CC the_DT area_NN referred_VBD to_TO included_VB a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN shown_VBN to_TO be_VB seriously_RB affected_VBN by_IN malaria_NNS and_CC systematic_JJ investigation_NN of_IN mosquito_NN breeding_NN places_NNS had_VBD already_RB been_VBN con-_JJ ducted_VBN there_EX ;_: but_CC very_RB little_JJ was_VBD known_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT real_JJ condition_NN of_IN things_NNS in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS in_IN the_DT Island_NNP ._.
268_CD ._.
The_DT memorandum_NN submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Letter_NN No_UH ._.
115_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 17th_CD July_NNP 1909_CD ,_, from_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP A._NNP Bentley_NNP ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, D.P.H._NNP ,_, on_IN Special_JJ Duty_NNP ,_, Malaria_NNP Investigation_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Chairman_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP ._.
``_`` The_DT enclosed_JJ copy_NN of_IN a_DT memorandum_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN forwarded_VBN ``_`` to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD serve_VB to_TO indicate_VB the_DT lines_NNS upon_IN ``_`` which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ suggested_VBN anti-malarial_JJ sanitation_NN should_MD be_VB initiated_VBN in_IN ``_`` Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP controls_VBZ many_JJ areas_NNS within_IN the_DT ``_`` City-several_NNP of_IN which_WDT lie_NN within_IN the_DT specially_RB malarious_JJ zone_NN ._.
In_IN ?_. 99_CD ``_`` particular_JJ the_DT Paltan_NNP Road_NNP Chawl_NNP area_NN is_VBZ the_DT site_NN of_IN intense_JJ malaria_NN ``_`` and_CC in_IN the_DT Dongri_NNP Koli_NNP area_NN adjoining_VBG ,_, many_JJ actual_JJ and_CC potential_JJ ``_`` breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN Anopheles_NNP (_( N._NNP stephensi_NN and_CC M._NNP rossi_NN )_) have_VBP ``_`` been_VBN found_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
In_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ``_`` to_TO undertake_VB work_NN in_IN these_DT areas_NNS of_IN a_DT similar_JJ nature_NN to_TO that_DT which_WDT ``_`` it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN shall_MD be_VB initiated_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, the_DT Port_NNP ``_`` Trust_NNP and_CC the_DT Railway_NNP Companies_NNPS ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP probable_JJ that_IN one_CD ``_`` trained_JJ man_NN assisted_VBN by_IN an_DT ordinary_JJ coolie_NN could_MD ensure_VB that_IN the_DT ``_`` Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP areas_NNS referred_VBD to_TO are_VBP kept_VBN free_JJ from_IN mosquito_NN larv_NN ``_`` during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN and_CC one_CD man_NN alone_RB could_MD do_VB the_DT work_NN in_IN the_DT ``_`` dry_JJ weather_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT question_NN of_IN supervision_NN is_VBZ in_IN my_PRP$ opinion_NN all_DT ``_`` important_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT staff_NN should_MD ``_`` be_VB inspected_VBN weekly_JJ by_IN some_DT responsible_JJ officer_NN engaged_VBN on_IN this_DT kind_NN of_IN ``_`` work_NN alone_RB ._.
I_PRP do_VBP not_RB feel_VB that_IN it_PRP lies_VBZ within_IN my_PRP$ province_NN to_TO suggest_VB ``_`` what_WP arrangement_NN to_TO this_DT end_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN by_IN the_DT Improvement_NNP ``_`` Trust_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP suggested_VBN to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP and_CC Railway_NNP Companies_NNPS that_IN ``_`` it_PRP would_MD be_VB advisable_JJ to_TO appoint_VB responsible_JJ Inspectors_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP appears_VBZ ``_`` to_TO me_PRP that_IN trustworthy_JJ time-expired_JJ European_JJ soldiers_NNS with_IN a_DT good_JJ ``_`` knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT vernacular_NN would_MD be_VB the_DT best_JJS type_NN of_IN men_NNS to_TO employ_VB ._.
``_`` But_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP no_DT single_JJ area_NN is_VBZ sufficiently_RB ``_`` large_JJ to_TO require_VB one_CD such_JJ men_NNS and_CC though_IN possibly_RB one_CD Inspector_NN could_MD ``_`` superintend_VB the_DT work_NN on_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN their_PRP$ property_NN it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN it_PRP ``_`` would_MD be_VB better_JJR that_IN each_DT separate_JJ Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP area_NN should_MD be_VB ``_`` under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT special_JJ municipal_JJ inspector_NN for_IN the_DT anti-_JJ ``_`` mosquito_JJ work_NN of_IN the_DT section_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP lies_VBZ ._. ''_''
269_CD ._.
Action_NNP taken_VBN by_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust.-The_NNP Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP did_VBD not_RB appoint_VB a_DT special_JJ staff_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP deputed_VBD one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ subordinate_NN officers_NNS to_TO pay_VB special_JJ attention_NN to_TO the_DT question_NN of_IN mosquito_NN breeding_NN places_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ Estates_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN training_VBG this_DT officer_NN and_CC other_JJ Inspectors_NNS of_IN the_DT Trust_NNP 's_POS Estates_NNP ,_, demonstrations_NNS were_VBD given_VBN by_IN the_DT Special_JJ Officer_NNP and_CC staff_NN employed_VBN on_IN the_DT malaria_NN investigation_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Admistration_NNP Report_NNP of_IN the_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP for_IN 1909-1910_CD the_DT following_VBG paragraph_NN appears_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` A_DT new_JJ departure_NN in_IN 1909-1910_CD was_VBD the_DT training_NN of_IN all_DT inspectors_NNS ``_`` and_CC peons_NNS on_IN the_DT Trust_NNP Estates_NNPS to_TO find_VB out_RP mosquito_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS ``_`` and_CC destroy_VB larv_NN ._.

The_DT present_JJ ``_`` enquiry_NN into_IN Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ especially_RB ``_`` prevalent_JJ along_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT east_JJ coast_NN of_IN the_DT Island_NNP between_IN the_DT ``_`` Kasara_NNP Basin_NNP ,_, Mazagaon_NNP and_CC the_DT Sassoon_NNP Dock_NNP ,_, Colaba_NNP ._.

(_( In_IN 1903_CD the_DT admissions_NNS for_IN malaria_NNS ``_`` among_IN the_DT police_NN stationed_VBD at_IN these_DT docks_NNS stood_VBD at_IN 2776.8_CD per_IN 1,000_CD against_IN ``_`` an_DT average_NN of_IN 1031.3_CD per_IN 1,000_CD for_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._. )_)
In_IN particular_JJ ``_`` the_DT enclosure_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP Works_NNP can_MD be_VB shown_VBN to_TO be_VB the_DT site_NN of_IN ``_`` very_RB severe_JJ malaria_NN and_CC probably_RB the_DT centre_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN is_VBZ ``_`` disseminated_VBN to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ area_NN around_RB ._.
An_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT Prince's_NNP ?_. 100_CD ``_`` and_CC Victoria_NNP Docks_NNP ,_, Carnac_NNP Bunder_NNP and_CC areas_NNS north_RB of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP ``_`` Dispensary_NNP between_IN Manson_NNP and_CC Frere_NNP Roads_NNP ,_, has_VBZ shown_VBN the_DT existence_NN of_IN ``_`` numerous_JJ potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS larv_VBP ``_`` of_IN Anopheles_NNP stephensi_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN recently_RB ,_, and_CC I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN ``_`` informed_VBN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD prevalent_JJ in_IN many_JJ places_NNS within_IN this_DT area_NN during_IN ``_`` last_JJ monsoon_NN ._.
