It_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO give_VB even_RB a_DT partial_JJ estimate_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` number_NN or_CC area_NN of_IN such_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS as_IN already_RB exist_VBP ,_, but_CC it_PRP may_MD be_VB ``_`` stated_VBN that_IN practically_RB every_DT shallow_JJ collection_NN of_IN water_NN on_IN the_DT upper_JJ ``_`` level_NN of_IN the_DT works_NNS ,_, except_VBP such_JJ as_IN have_VBP been_VBN treated_VBN with_IN Pesterine_NNP ,_, ``_`` contain_VBP numerous_JJ larv_NN of_IN anopheles-90_JJ per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN which_WDT are_VBP those_DT ``_`` of_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO me_PRP probable_JJ that_IN ``_`` there_EX are_VBP more_JJR mosquitoes_NNS of_IN this_DT variety_NN breeding_NN within_IN the_DT New_NNP ``_`` Dock_NNP area_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Wards_NNP A._NN and_CC B._NNP put_VBD ``_`` together_RB ,_, excluding_VBG perhaps_RB Fort_NNP North_NNP section_NN with_IN its_PRP$ innumerable_JJ ``_`` wells_NNS ._.
A_DT recent_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN of_IN 63_CD persons_NNS resident_NN within_IN ``_`` the_DT New_NNP Deck_NNP enclosure_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN ,_, out_IN of_IN the_DT 46_CD adults_NNS and_CC 17_CD ``_`` children_NNS from_IN whom_WP the_DT blood_NN was_VBD taken_VBN ,_, 44_CD or_CC nearly_RB 70_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
har-_JJ ``_`` boured_VBN malaria_NN parasites_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ the_DT highest_JJS proportion_NN yet_RB found_VBN in_IN ``_`` any_DT community_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
These_DT observations_NNS serve_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ``_`` necessary_JJ to_TO adopt_VB organized_VBN and_CC systematic_JJ measures_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN ``_`` and_CC suppression_NN of_IN anopheles_NNS breeding_VBG grounds_NNS if_IN the_DT incidence_NN of_IN ``_`` malaria_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB diminished_VBN within_IN this_DT area_NN and_CC the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.

``_`` For_IN New_NNP Dock_NNP Enclosure.-A_NNP whole_JJ time_NN European_JJ Inspector_NNP should_MD ``_`` be_VB appointed_VBN whose_WP$ sole_JJ duty_NN must_MD be_VB the_DT supervision_NN of_IN anti-mosquito_JJ ``_`` work_NN ._.

``_`` In_IN view_NN of_IN these_DT facts_NNS it_PRP would_MD appear_VB advisable_JJ to_TO take_VB immediate_JJ steps-_NNS (_( a_DT )_) to_TO provide_VB covers_NNS to_TO any_DT open_JJ wells_NNS ,_, cisterns_NNS or_CC tanks_NNS within_IN these_DT areas_NNS ;_: (_( b_NN )_) to_TO drain_VB or_CC fill_VB up_RP depressions_NNS in_IN which_WDT puddles_NNS or_CC pools_NNS of_IN water_NN may_MD lie_VB ,_, affording_VBG opportunities_NNS for_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ;_: (_( c_NN )_) to_TO destroy_VB the_DT larv_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB found_VBN breeding_VBG in_IN places_NNS that_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB permanently_RB protected_VBN or_CC obliterated_VBN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP not_RB yet_RB had_VBD time_NN to_TO investigate_VB the_DT condition_NN ``_`` of_IN affairs_NNS at_IN the_DT G._NNP I._NNP P._NNP Workshops_NNP and_CC Mazagon_NNP Station_NNP ,_, but_CC as_IN both_DT ``_`` these_DT Yards_NNS are_VBP within_IN the_DT malaria-affected_JJ zone_NN it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN anti-_JJ ``_`` mosquito_JJ work_NN will_MD be_VB required_VBN there_RB also_RB ._.

In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT men_NNS referred_VBD to_TO it_PRP will_MD be_VB ``_`` necessary_JJ to_TO associate_VB with_IN them_PRP at_IN least_JJS one_CD other_JJ man_NN at_IN each_DT yard_NN to_TO ``_`` assist_VB in_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN mosquito_JJ destruction_NN ._.
A_DT sufficient_JJ supply_NN of_IN Peste-_NNP ``_`` rine_NN or_CC crude_JJ kerosine_NN must_MD be_VB provided_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT sprayer_NN of_IN the_DT knapsack_NN ``_`` type_NN filled_VBN with_IN a_DT suitable_JJ nozzle_NN will_MD be_VB required_VBN ._.
The_DT ordinary_JJ method_NN ``_`` of_IN applying_VBG Pesterine_NNP as_IN practised_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ both_DT wasteful_JJ and_CC ``_`` inefficient_NN ._.
Lastly_RB ,_, as_IN such_JJ work_NN must_MD be_VB carried_VBN on_IN with_IN regularity_NN year_NN ``_`` after_IN year_NN through_IN each_DT monsoon_NN and_CC in_IN lessened_JJ amount_NN even_RB through_IN ``_`` the_DT dry_JJ season_NN ,_, at_IN least_JJS for_IN several_JJ years_NNS ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO make_VB ``_`` arrangements_NNS for_IN proper_JJ and_CC adequate_JJ supervision_NN by_IN a_DT responsible_JJ man_NN ``_`` whose_WP$ sole_JJ duty_NN this_DT must_MD be_VB ._.
Lack_NN of_IN supervision_NN will_MD mean_VB failure_NN and_CC ``_`` a_DT mere_JJ waste_NN of_IN money_NN ,_, and_CC any_DT suggestion_NN to_TO arrange_VB for_IN such_JJ work_NN to_TO be_VB ``_`` done_VBN in_IN addition_NN to_TO other_JJ duties_NNS ,_, indicates_VBZ a_DT failure_NN to_TO appreciate_VB the_DT real_JJ ``_`` importance_NN of_IN the_DT question_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN work_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN will_MD be_VB ``_`` carried_VBN out_RP most_JJS efficiently_RB by_IN a_DT European_JJ such_JJ as_IN a_DT trust-worthy_JJ time-_JJ ``_`` expired_VBD soldier_NN with_IN a_DT good_JJ knowledge_NN of_IN the_DT vernacular_NN ._.

During_IN 1909_CD the_DT P._NNP &_CC O_NNP ._.
Company_NN decided_VBD to_TO institute_VB a_DT system_NN of_IN quinine_JJ parades_NNS among_IN the_DT crews_NNS of_IN all_DT their_PRP$ vessels_NNS entering_VBG the_DT port_NN ._.

The_DT Company_NNP also_RB deputed_VBD one_CD of_IN their_PRP$ subordinate_JJ staff_NN to_TO inspect_VB their_PRP$ private_JJ dockyard_NN ,_, workshops_NNS and_CC quarters_NNS ,_, where_WRB mosquitoes_NNS had_VBD been_VBN found_VBN breeding_NN in_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN places_NNS ._.

277_CD ._.
Meanwhile_RB the_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN commenced_VBN by_IN Captain_NNP McKendrick_NNP had_VBD been_VBN continued_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO extend_VB the_DT distribution_NN to_TO as_IN large_JJ a_DT proportion_NN as_IN possible_JJ of_IN the_DT poorer_JJR population_NN in_IN the_DT most_RBS seriously_RB affected_JJ localities_NNS ,_, instead_RB of_IN confining_VBG it_PRP merely_RB to_TO young_JJ children_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN enlarged_VBN spleen_NN ._.

The_DT modification_NN of_IN the_DT scheme_NN of_IN quinine_NN treatment_NN made_VBD it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO confine_VB the_DT distribution_NN to_TO a_DT smaller_JJR area_NN than_IN before_RB ,_, and_CC as_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN was_VBD being_VBG commenced_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Trust_NNP and_CC Railway_NNP Companies_NNPS on_IN a_DT considerable_JJ scale_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD decided_VBN to_TO limit_VB quinine_JJ distribution_NN to_TO an_DT area_NN round_VBD the_DT New_NNP Docks_NNP ._.
The_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN was_VBD therefore_RB stopped_VBN in_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT portion_NN adjoining_VBG the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP Works_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD felt_VBN that_IN ,_, in_IN areas_NNS like_IN the_DT North_NNP Fort_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT presence_NN of_IN severe_JJ malaria_NN was_VBD so_RB obviously_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT existence_NN of_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN anopheline_NN infested_VBN wells_NNS ,_, the_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN was_VBD likely_JJ to_TO postpone_VB the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN the_DT proper_JJ and_CC more_RBR radical_JJ measures_NNS ,_, the_DT protection_NN of_IN these_DT wells_NNS ;_: whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT area_NN finally_RB selected_VBN for_IN treatment_NN it_PRP was_VBD quite_RB beyond_IN ?_. 104_CD the_DT power_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ residents_NNS to_TO greatly_RB improve_VB their_PRP$ condition_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN amongst_IN them_PRP ,_, co-incidently_RB with_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN anti-_JJ mosquito_NN measures_NNS ,_, would_MD probably_RB effect_NN some_DT mitigation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

AD_NNP INTERIM_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN 1910.-During_JJ 1909_CD considerable_JJ progress_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT investigation_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP Island_NNP ,_, and_CC as_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD wise_NN to_TO publish_VB as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ a_DT brief_JJ summary_NN of_IN the_DT information_NN obtained_VBD so_RB that_IN it_PRP might_MD serve_VB as_IN a_DT guide_NN to_TO the_DT work_NN of_IN malaria_NNS prevention_NN that_WDT was_VBD already_RB in_IN progress_NN and_CC give_VB some_DT indication_NN of_IN the_DT line_NN of_IN future_JJ action_NN ,_, a_DT short_JJ ad_NN interim_JJ report_NN was_VBD issued_VBN early_RB in_IN 1910_CD ._.
279_CD ._.
In_IN that_DT report_NN the_DT necessity_NN for_IN obtaining_VBG necessary_JJ legal_JJ powers_NNS was_VBD emphasized_VBN and_CC a_DT scheme_NN of_IN prevention_NN was_VBD outlined_VBN ._.
A_DT short_JJ summary_NN of_IN the_DT scheme_NN recommended_VBD is_VBZ given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: ``_`` Measures_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN Malaria_NNP recommended_VBD in_IN ad_NN interim_NN ``_`` report.-_JJ (_( a_DT )_) The_DT measures_NNS required_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN ``_`` malaria_NNS by_IN the_DT reduction_NN of_IN the_DT mosquito_NN host_NN are_VBP best_JJS discussed_JJ ``_`` under_IN two_CD heads-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) General_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Special_NNP ._.
``_`` (_( b_NN )_) As_IN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN ``_`` Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN appear_VBP to_TO have_VB a_DT special_JJ importance_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP enable_VBP ``_`` the_DT mosquito_NN to_TO continue_VB breeding_VBG uninterruptedly_RB all_PDT the_DT year_NN round_NN ``_`` and_CC form_VB the_DT centres_NNS from_IN which_WDT temporary_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS become_VBP ``_`` infected_JJ ._.
This_DT being_VBG so_RB ,_, the_DT first_JJ step_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG control_NN of_IN malaria_NN ``_`` must_MD be_VB directed_VBN towards_NNS abolishing_VBG all_DT permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS or_CC ``_`` protecting_VBG them_PRP in_IN such_PDT a_DT manner_NN that_IN the_DT malaria-carrying_JJ mosquito_NN ``_`` can_MD not_RB make_VB use_NN of_IN them_PRP for_IN breeding_VBG ._.
``_`` (_( c_NN )_) In_IN the_DT survey_NN of_IN mosquito-breeding_JJ places_NNS it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN shewn_VBN ``_`` that_IN the_DT commonest_JJS permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN malaria-carrying_JJ ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS are_VBP :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) Open_NNP wells_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( 2_CD )_) Open_NNP and_CC improperly_RB closed_VBN house_NN and_CC latrine_NN cisterns_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) Garden_NNP and_CC other_JJ tanks_NNS ,_, fountains_NNS and_CC garden_NN tubs_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
``_`` (_( 4_CD )_) In_IN certain_JJ localities_NNS special_JJ permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS exist_VBP ``_`` in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN tanks_NNS ,_, filter-beds_NNS ,_, reservoirs_NNS and_CC foreshore_NN pools_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( d_NN )_) General_NNP Measures.-The_NNP first_JJ step_NN towards_NNS attaining_VBG control_NN of_IN ``_`` breeding_VBG places_NNS of_IN a_DT permanent_JJ character_NN must_MD be_VB a_DT strict_JJ limitation_NN of_IN ``_`` their_PRP$ number-no_JJ increase_NN of_IN potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN this_DT nature_NN ``_`` must_MD be_VB allowed_VBN ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ,_, wells_NNS are_VBP dug_JJ ,_, open_JJ or_CC improperly_JJ ``_`` closed_JJ cisterns_NNS are_VBP erected_VBN ,_, fountains_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS are_VBP constructed_VBN and_CC ``_`` garden_NN and_CC other_JJ tubs_NNS multiplied_VBN without_IN let_NN or_CC hindrance_NN ._.
The_DT danger_NN ``_`` of_IN this_DT increase_NN of_IN potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS is_VBZ very_RB great_JJ and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ ``_`` essential_JJ that_IN the_DT community_NN should_MD be_VB protected_VBN from_IN further_JJ risk_NN by_IN ``_`` stringent_JJ regulations_NNS ,_, briefly_NN :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT construction_NN of_IN new_JJ open_JJ wells_NNS must_MD be_VB strictly_RB ``_`` prohibited_VBN ._.
Owners_NNS of_IN property_NN wishing_VBG to_TO obtain_VB a_DT well_RB water-_JJ ``_`` supply_NN must_MD either_VB construct_NN a_DT well_NN with_IN a_DT permanent_JJ concrete_NN cover_NN ``_`` or_CC make_VB use_NN of_IN an_DT Abyssinian_JJ Tube_NNP Pump_NNP ._.
*_NN ``_`` (_( 2_CD )_) The_DT erection_NN of_IN open_JJ or_CC improperly_RB closed_VBN cisterns_NNS must_MD also_RB ``_`` be_VB strictly_RB prohibited_VBN and_CC all_DT cisterns_NNS ,_, whether_IN required_VBN for_IN latrine_NN ,_, ``_`` house_NN ,_, or_CC business_NN purposes_NNS ,_, must_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO conform_VB to_TO a_DT given_VBN ``_`` standard_NN of_IN safety_NN as_IN regards_NNS protection_NN from_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
*_VB The_DT cost_NN of_IN an_DT Abyssinian_JJ tube_NN and_CC pump_NN is_VBZ about_IN Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD only_RB ._.
?_. 105_CD ``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) The_DT construction_NN of_IN new_JJ fountains_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS within_IN the_DT ``_`` limits_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP should_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.
``_`` (_( 4_CD )_) The_DT use_NN of_IN garden_NN tanks_NNS and_CC tubs_NN should_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO ``_`` regulation_NN and_CC their_PRP$ multiplication_NN should_MD be_VB restricted_VBN ._.
``_`` (_( e_NN )_) Having_VBG taken_VBN steps_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT increase_NN of_IN potential_JJ breeding_NN ``_`` places_VBZ it_PRP will_MD be_VB possible_JJ to_TO set_VB about_IN the_DT reduction_NN of_IN those_DT already_RB in_IN ``_`` existence_NN with_IN some_DT hope_NN of_IN success_NN ._.
Among_IN existing_VBG potential_JJ breeding_NN ``_`` places_NNS cisterns_NNS are_VBP the_DT most_RBS easily_RB dealt_NN with_IN ,_, as_IN they_PRP are_VBP a_DT comparatively_RB ``_`` modern_JJ innovation_NN ._.
Cisterns_NNS at_IN present_JJ existing_VBG in_IN the_DT City_NNP may_MD be_VB ``_`` roughly_RB divided_VBN into_IN three_CD types-_JJ ``_`` (_( A_DT )_) Open_NNP cisterns_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( B_NNP )_) Closed_VBD cisterns_NNS ,_, possessing_VBG a_DT manhole_NN or_CC other_JJ opening_NN for_IN ``_`` which_WDT a_DT loose_JJ lid_NN or_CC hinged_VBN door_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN ._.
``_`` (_( C_NNP )_) Cisterns_NNP possessing_NN ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO a_DT manhole_NN ,_, a_DT raised_VBN box_NN ``_`` for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN the_DT ball_NN float_NN and_CC valve_NN ._.
This_DT valve-box_NN is_VBZ ``_`` usually_RB closed_VBN by_IN a_DT rough_JJ lid_NN which_WDT rarely_RB fits_VBZ properly_RB ._.
``_`` In_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN our_PRP$ present_JJ knowledge_VB the_DT danger_NN of_IN open_JJ cisterns_NNS is_VBZ ``_`` so_RB great_JJ that_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN any_DT more_JJR of_IN this_DT type_NN should_MD be_VB absolutely_RB ``_`` prohibited_VBN and_CC steps_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO have_VB those_DT at_IN present_JJ in_IN existence_NN ``_`` adequately_RB protected_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cisterns_NNS of_IN types_NNS B_NNP and_CC C_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ ``_`` essential_JJ that_IN all_DT openings_NNS should_MD be_VB closed_VBN in_IN such_JJ a_DT manner_NN that_IN no_DT ``_`` mosquito_NN can_MD gain_VB access_NN to_TO them_PRP ._.
Manhole_NNP or_CC valve-box_JJ lids_NNS ,_, which_WDT ``_`` must_MD be_VB well_RB fitted_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB bolted_VBN down_RB ,_, and_CC on_IN no_DT account_NN must_MD ``_`` the_DT supply_NN pipe_NN be_VB taken_VBN into_IN the_DT cistern_NN through_IN the_DT manhole_NN ._.
When_WRB ``_`` the_DT regulation_NN of_IN cisterns_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_IN and_CC the_DT faulty_NN ones_NNS ``_`` have_VBP been_VBN corrected_VBN ,_, all_DT danger_NN from_IN these_DT sources_NNS will_MD have_VB been_VBN removed_VBN ,_, ``_`` and_CC beyond_IN occasional_JJ inspection_NN their_PRP$ control_NN can_MD be_VB left_VBN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN ``_`` the_DT Water_NNP Department_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ inspectors_NNS should_MD be_VB instructed_VBN to_TO report_VB ``_`` any_DT irregularity_NN which_WDT they_PRP may_MD discover_VB ._.
``_`` (_( f_NN )_) The_DT question_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN open_JJ wells_NNS ,_, fountains_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS and_CC ``_`` garden_NN tubs_NN is_VBZ a_DT more_RBR difficult_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB ``_`` simplified_VBN somewhat_RB by_IN requiring_VBG all_DT owners_NNS of_IN such_JJ potential_JJ breeding_NN ``_`` places_NNS to_TO register_VB them_PRP and_CC if_IN necessary_JJ to_TO take_VB out_RP a_DT license_NN ._.
``_`` (_( g_NN )_) It_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN a_DT workable_JJ scheme_NN for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN potential_JJ ``_`` permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS may_MD be_VB evolved_VBN on_IN the_DT following_JJ lines_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) All_DT owners_NNS of_IN open_JJ or_CC temporarily_RB closed_VBN wells_NNS ,_, cisterns_NNS ,_, ``_`` fountains_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, garden_NN tubs_NNS ,_, barrels_NNS and_CC vessels_NNS used_VBN for_IN the_DT storing_VBG ``_`` of_IN water_NN should_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO register_VB the_DT same_JJ ._.
``_`` (_( 2_CD )_) All_DT collections_NNS of_IN water_NN of_IN this_DT nature_NN which_WDT may_MD offer_VB ``_`` facilities_NNS for_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN and_CC subject_JJ ``_`` to_TO periodical_JJ inspection_NN ._.
``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) The_DT license_NN should_MD be_VB renewable_JJ yearly_RB ._.
``_`` (_( 4_CD )_) The_DT Municipal_JJ Commissioner_NNP should_MD have_VB the_DT power_NN to_TO close_VB ,_, ``_`` cover_NN ,_, remove_VB or_CC fill_VB up_RP any_DT unlicensed_JJ collection_NN of_IN water_NN of_IN this_DT ``_`` nature_NN after_IN due_JJ notice_NN to_TO the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN such_JJ ``_`` work_NN should_MD be_VB recoverable_JJ from_IN the_DT owner_NN ._.
``_`` (_( 5_CD )_) No_DT collection_NN of_IN water_NN of_IN this_DT nature_NN which_WDT could_MD be_VB shewn_VBN ``_`` to_TO contain_VB mosquito_JJ larv_NN should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN ._.
``_`` (_( 6_CD )_) The_DT license_NN for_IN any_DT collection_NN of_IN water_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ nature_NN ``_`` which_WDT becomes_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN mosquito_NN larv_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB cancelled_VBN ,_, ``_`` unless_IN after_IN due_JJ notice_RB the_DT licensee_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN the_DT necessary_JJ measures_NNS ``_`` for_IN getting_VBG rid_JJ of_IN the_DT mosquito_NN larv_NN and_CC protecting_VBG the_DT water_NN in_IN ``_`` future_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT complete_JJ satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT proper_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( 7_CD )_) Permanently_RB covered_VBN wells_NNS and_CC fountains_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN ``_`` converted_VBN into_IN flower_NN beds_NNS ,_, should_MD not_RB require_VB a_DT license_NN ._.
``_`` (_( h_NN )_) It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT immediate_JJ effect_NN of_IN such_PDT a_DT scheme_NN once_IN ``_`` it_PRP were_VBD put_VBN in_IN operation_NN would_MD be_VB automatically_RB to_TO reduce_VB the_DT number_NN of_IN ``_`` potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS that_WDT at_IN present_JJ exist_NN ,_, for_IN owners_NNS of_IN such_JJ collections_NNS B_IN 136-27_JJ ?_. 106_CD ``_`` of_IN water_NN would_MD not_RB care_VB to_TO pay_VB for_IN a_DT license_NN for_IN wells_NNS ,_, fountains_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS ``_`` which_WDT they_PRP did_VBD not_RB use_VB ._.
``_`` (_( i_NN )_) When_WRB once_RB the_DT permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN ``_`` and_CC other_JJ malaria-carrying_NN mosquitoes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN controlled_VBN ,_, the_DT danger_NN ``_`` of_IN temporary_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS will_MD be_VB greatly_RB diminished_VBN ;_: but_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB ``_`` necessary_JJ to_TO adopt_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN and_CC reduction_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ ``_`` also_RB ,_, for_IN there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN to_TO shew_VB that_DT certain_JJ localities_NNS ,_, notably_RB the_DT ``_`` Frere_NNP Road_NNP area_NN ,_, have_VBP suffered_VBN seriously_RB in_IN the_DT past_JJ ,_, mainly_RB because_IN large_JJ ``_`` numbers_NNS of_IN temporary_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS have_VBP been_VBN created_VBN there_RB ._.
``_`` (_( j_NN )_) Owners_NNPS of_IN large_JJ yards_NNS and_CC compounds_NNS ,_, open_JJ spaces_NNS and_CC building_NN ``_`` sites_NNS should_MD therefore_RB be_VB required_VBN to_TO level_VB and_CC drain_VB their_PRP$ property_NN and_CC ``_`` keep_VB it_PRP free_JJ from_IN jungle_NN and_CC undergrowth_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO reduce_VB as_RB far_RB as_IN ``_`` possible_JJ the_DT danger_NN from_IN collections_NNS of_IN fresh_JJ rain_NN water_NN in_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
``_`` If_IN such_JJ work_NN were_VBD done_VBN section_NN by_IN section_NN systematically_RB ,_, commencing_VBG ``_`` with_IN Ward_NNP A._NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD soon_RB effect_NN a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN ._.
``_`` (_( k_NN )_) Other_JJ temporary_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN malaria-carrying_NN mosquitoes_NNS ``_`` are_VBP neither_DT very_RB common_JJ nor_CC important_JJ ._.
They_PRP will_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN under_IN ``_`` the_DT head_NN of_IN Special_JJ Measures_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( l_NN )_) Special_JJ measures_NNS for_IN large_JJ Cisterns.-The_JJ question_NN of_IN dealing_VBG ``_`` with_IN cisterns_NNS in_IN general_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB discussed_VBN and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN ``_`` suggested_VBN that_IN the_DT erection_NN of_IN open_JJ cisterns_NNS should_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN in_IN the_DT ``_`` future_NN ._.
Small_JJ open_JJ cisterns_NNS or_CC those_DT which_WDT are_VBP improperly_RB covered_VBN can_MD ``_`` easily_RB be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN ,_, but_CC there_RB still_RB remains_VBZ the_DT question_NN of_IN large_JJ open_JJ ``_`` cisterns_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN exist_NN in_IN mills_NNS and_CC other_JJ places_NNS ._.
Fortunately_RB with_IN rare_JJ ``_`` exceptions_NNS these_DT do_VBP not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB very_RB dangerous_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD ``_`` probably_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO require_VB such_JJ as_IN already_RB exist_VB to_TO be_VB registered_VBN ,_, ``_`` licensed_VBD and_CC periodically_RB inspected_VBN ._.
If_IN found_VBN to_TO be_VB breeding_VBG mosquitoes_NNS ``_`` they_PRP could_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN just_RB as_IN any_DT other_JJ permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS ,_, by_IN ``_`` cancelling_VBG the_DT license_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
``_`` (_( m_NN )_) Special_JJ measures_NNS for_IN Wells.-No_NNP fact_NN has_VBZ been_VBN more_JJR clearly_RB ``_`` demonstrated_VBN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ investigation_NN than_IN the_DT direct_JJ ``_`` relationship_NN that_WDT exists_VBZ in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN between_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN ``_`` open_JJ wells_NNS and_CC the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN endemic_JJ malaria_NN ._.
Where_WRB there_EX are_VBP ``_`` many_JJ wells_NNS there_EX is_VBZ much_JJ malaria_NN ;_: where_WRB there_EX are_VBP few_JJ wells_NNS there_EX is_VBZ ``_`` little_JJ malaria_NN ,_, unless_IN other_JJ special_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS exist_VBP in_IN large_JJ number_NN ;_: ``_`` and_CC where_WRB there_EX are_VBP no_DT wells_NNS malaria_NNS is_VBZ usually_RB reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT minimum_NN ._.
``_`` The_DT protection_NN of_IN open_JJ wells_NNS therefore_RB becomes_VBZ the_DT most_RBS important_JJ general_JJ ``_`` measure_NN of_IN anti-malaria_JJ sanitation_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP many_JJ thousands_NNS of_IN open_JJ ``_`` wells_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC nearly_RB three_CD thousand_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT portion_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT City_NNP south_NN of_IN Grant_NNP Road_NNP ._.
Of_IN these_DT a_DT very_RB large_JJ number_NN are_VBP the_DT ``_`` source_NN of_IN the_DT species_NNS of_IN mosquito_NN responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._.
``_`` Many_JJ of_IN these_DT wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN out_IN of_IN use_NN for_IN years_NNS and_CC in_IN many_JJ other_JJ ``_`` cases_NNS the_DT water_NN is_VBZ only_RB required_VBN for_IN washing_VBG purposes_NNS or_CC the_DT watering_NN of_IN ``_`` plants_NNS ._.
From_IN a_DT few_JJ wells_NNS water_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN for_IN drinking_NN purposes_NNS and_CC from_IN ``_`` certain_JJ others_NNS for_IN religious_JJ ceremonials_NNS ,_, but_CC at_IN least_JJS one-half_JJ of_IN the_DT total_JJ ``_`` number_NN are_VBP used_VBN for_IN no_DT purpose_NN whatsoever_RB ._.
The_DT owners_NNS of_IN these_DT wells_NNS ``_`` are_VBP few_JJ in_IN number_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT users_NNS of_IN the_DT water_NN do_VBP not_RB represent_VB a_DT very_RB ``_`` large_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ;_: but_CC the_DT sufferers_NNS from_IN malaria_NN ,_, for_IN ``_`` which_WDT these_DT wells_NNS are_VBP reponsible_JJ ,_, number_NN many_JJ thousands_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( n_NN )_) Broadly_RB speaking_VBG ,_, wells_NNS may_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN two_CD classes_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` (_( A_DT )_) Wells_NNP within_IN houses_NNS or_CC so_RB situated_VBN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP overlooked_VBN ``_`` by_IN doors_NNS or_CC windows_NNS from_IN which_WDT tenants_NNS in_IN the_DT upper_JJ floors_NNS can_MD draw_VB ``_`` water_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT rope_NN without_IN descending_VBG ._.
``_`` (_( B_NNP )_) Wells_NNP situated_VBN in_IN compounds_NNS and_CC gardens_NNS at_IN a_DT distance_NN from_IN ``_`` dwelling_VBG houses_NNS ._.
``_`` Observation_NN appears_VBZ to_TO shew_VB that_DT generally_RB speaking_VBG wells_NNS of_IN type_NN A_NNP ``_`` are_VBP more_RBR dangerous_JJ than_IN those_DT of_IN type_NN B_NNP ._.
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, open_JJ wells_NNS ``_`` in_IN the_DT basement_NN of_IN houses_NNS are_VBP specially_RB suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN ``_`` Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN ._.
?_. 107_CD ``_`` (_( o_NN )_) Wells_NNP may_MD be_VB protected_VBN from_IN mosquitoes_NNS in_IN many_JJ ways_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) They_PRP can_MD be_VB filled_VBN up_RP and_CC permanently_RB closed_VBD ._.
``_`` (_( 2_CD )_) If_IN the_DT well_NN is_VBZ required_VBN as_IN a_DT water_NN supply_NN a_DT tube-pump*_JJ ``_`` (_( Abyssinian_JJ Tube_NNP )_) may_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT well_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD then_RB be_VB filled_VBN ``_`` up_IN with_IN gravel_NN and_CC sand_NN as_IN recommended_VBN by_IN Koch_NNP ._.
``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) Wells_NNS can_MD be_VB completely_RB covered_VBN with_IN stone_NN or_CC brick-work_NN ,_, ``_`` reinforced_VBD concrete_JJ ,_, sheet_JJ iron_NN or_CC wood_NN ,_, with_IN no_DT opening_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN ``_`` necessary_JJ a_DT pump_NN can_MD be_VB used_VBN for_IN drawing_VBG water_NN ._.
``_`` (_( 4_CD )_) Wells_NNP may_MD be_VB protected_VBN by_IN a_DT cover_NN of_IN stone-work_NN or_CC concrete_NN ,_, ``_`` sheet_NN iron_NN ,_, wire_NN gauze_NN or_CC wood_NN ,_, fitted_VBN with_IN a_DT trap-door_JJ and_CC stocked_VBD ``_`` with_IN suitable_JJ fish_NN ._.
``_`` (_( 5_CD )_) In_IN some_DT cases_NNS wells_NNS stocked_VBN with_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN small_JJ fish_NN ,_, ``_`` of_IN a_DT species_NNS known_VBN to_TO pray_VB upon_IN mosquito_NN larv_NN ,_, require_VBP no_DT other_JJ ``_`` measure_NN of_IN protection_NN if_IN they_PRP are_VBP kept_JJ free_JJ of_IN weed_NN and_CC floating_VBG matter_NN ._.
``_`` Wells_NNP in_IN which_WDT water_NN has_VBZ become_VBN obviously_RB foul_JJ ,_, putrid_JJ and_CC ``_`` stinking_NN are_VBP no_DT danger_NN from_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN malaria_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS that_WDT carry_VBP the_DT disease_NN will_MD not_RB breed_VB in_IN putrid_JJ water_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT ``_`` other_JJ hand_NN ,_, these_DT wells_NNS often_RB breed_VBP enormous_JJ number_NN of_IN other_JJ mosquitoes_NNS ._.
``_`` Wells_NNP which_WDT become_VBP foul_JJ either_CC from_IN non-use_NN or_CC from_IN the_DT entrance_NN of_IN ``_`` sewage_NN of_IN foul_JJ matter_NN should_MD be_VB filled-in_JJ or_CC permanently_RB closed_VBN ._.
``_`` (_( p_NN )_) With_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO prevent_VB malaria_NN ,_, owners_NNS of_IN wells_NNS should_MD there_VB -_: ``_`` fore_RB be_VB obliged_VBN to_TO register_VB them_PRP and_CC adopt_VB one_CD of_IN the_DT following_VBG ``_`` alternatives_NNS :_: -_: ``_`` (_( 1_CD )_) Fill_NNP up_RP the_DT well_NN ._.
``_`` (_( 2_CD )_) Permanently_RB cover_VBZ the_DT well_NN with_IN concrete_NN ,_, stone_NN or_CC brick_VB -_: ``_`` work_NN or_CC sheet_NN iron_NN ,_, allowing_VBG no_DT opening_NN through_IN which_WDT a_DT mosquito_NN can_MD ``_`` pass_VB ,_, and_CC providing_VBG no_DT trap-door_JJ ,_, but_CC fixing_VBG a_DT pump_NN in_IN position_NN if_IN the_DT ``_`` water_NN is_VBZ required_VBN for_IN use_NN ._.
``_`` (_( q_NN )_) Or_CC ,_, if_IN unwilling_JJ to_TO protect_VB them_PRP in_IN this_DT manner_NN ,_, owners_NNS of_IN wells_NNS ``_`` of_IN type_NN A_NNP or_CC B_NNP should_MD be_VB required_VBN to-_JJ ``_`` (_( 3_CD )_) (_( a_DT )_) take_VB out_RP a_DT license_NN for_IN their_PRP$ wells_NNS ;_: ``_`` (_( b_NN )_) protect_VBP it_PRP with_IN a_DT well-fitting_JJ cover_NN of_IN iron_NN gauze_NN (_( of_IN not_RB more_JJR than_IN 1-16th_JJ inch_JJ mesh_NN )_) or_CC sound_JJ wooden_JJ planking_NN or_CC sheet_NN iron_NN ,_, with_IN or_CC without_IN an_DT accurately_RB fitting_JJ trap-_JJ door_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN addition_NN ``_`` (_( c_NN )_) keep_VB the_DT well_NN stocked_VBN with_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN of_IN small_JJ fish_NN of_IN a_DT species_NNS known_VBN to_TO destroy_VB mosquito_JJ larv_NN ;_: ``_`` (_( d_NN )_) allow_IN the_DT well_NN to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN periodically_RB :_: ``_`` Provided_VBD that_DT ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN wells_NNS of_IN type_NN B_NNP situated_VBD not_RB less_RBR ``_`` than_IN 50_CD feet_NNS from_IN a_DT dwelling_NN house_NN ,_, owners_NNS may_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO ``_`` (_( 4_CD )_) (_( a_DT )_) take_VB out_RP a_DT license_NN for_IN the_DT well_NN ;_: ``_`` (_( b_NN )_) keep_VB the_DT well_NN stocked_VBN with_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN suitable_JJ fish_NN ;_: ``_`` (_( c_NN )_) keep_VB the_DT well_RB free_JJ from_IN weed_NN and_CC floating_VBG matter_NN ;_: ``_`` (_( d_NN )_) allow_IN the_DT well_NN to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN periodically_RB ._.
``_`` Wells_NNS required_VBN for_IN religious_JJ purposes_NNS should_MD be_VB covered_VBN either_RB with_IN ``_`` wire_NN gauze_NN or_CC plate_NN glass_NN to_TO allow_VB of_IN sunlight_JJ penetrating_VBG to_TO them_PRP ,_, but_CC ``_`` they_PRP must_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO inspection_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN necessary_JJ be_VB stocked_VBN with_IN ``_`` fish_JJ ._.
Foul_NNP wells_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB licensed_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT owners_NNS should_MD be_VB ``_`` compelled_VBN to_TO close_VB them_PRP up_RP ._.
``_`` (_( r_NN )_) Large_VBZ Tanks.-All_JJ large_JJ tanks_NNS should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN ._.
They_PRP should_MD ``_`` be_VB kept_VBN free_JJ of_IN weed_NN other_JJ than_IN Wolffia_NNP arhiza_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB stocked_VBN with_IN ``_`` large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN fish_JJ ,_, or_CC failing_VBG this_DT periodically_RB treated_VBN with_IN kerosine_JJ oil_NN ``_`` in_IN amount_NN proportionate_NN to_TO their_PRP$ area_NN ._.
Tanks_NNS which_WDT continued_VBD to_TO ``_`` harbour_VB mosquito_NN larv_NN in_IN spite_NN of_IN these_DT measures_NNS should_MD be_VB filled_VBN in_IN ._.
*_VB The_DT cost_NN of_IN an_DT Abyssinian_JJ tube_NN and_CC pump_NN is_VBZ only_RB about_RB Rs_NNP ._.
25_CD ._.
?_. 108_CD ``_`` Fountains.-Fountains_NNS should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN and_CC periodically_RB inspected_VBN ``_`` and_CC owners_NNS should_MD be_VB required_VBN to_TO keep_VB them_PRP stocked_VBN with_IN fish_NN of_IN ``_`` a_DT suitable_JJ species_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO completely_RB empty_VB them_PRP and_CC dry_VB them_PRP out_RP at_IN ``_`` fixed_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Failing_VBG this_DT they_PRP should_MD be_VB filled_VBN up_RP and_CC turned_VBD into_IN ``_`` flower_JJR beds_NNS ._.
``_`` Garden_NNP Tanks.-Garden_JJ tanks_NNS should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN and_CC either_DT stocked_VBD ``_`` with_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN of_IN suitable_JJ fish_NN or_CC completely_RB emptied_JJ and_CC dried_VBD ``_`` out_RB at_IN fixed_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Failing_VBG this_DT they_PRP should_MD be_VB filled_VBN up_RP ._.
``_`` Garden_NNP Tubs.-Garden_NNP tubs_NN should_MD be_VB licensed_VBN ._.
They_PRP should_MD not_RB ``_`` be_VB fixed_VBN or_CC sunk_VBN in_IN the_DT earth_NN and_CC they_PRP should_MD be_VB provided_VBN with_IN a_DT suitable_JJ ``_`` cover_NN ._.
Failure_NN to_TO keep_VB them_PRP free_JJ of_IN mosquito_JJ larv_NN should_MD entail_VB the_DT ``_`` cancelling_NN of_IN the_DT license_NN and_CC their_PRP$ removal_NN ._.
``_`` (_( s_NN )_) Breeding_NNP Places_NNPS of_IN special_JJ character-Reservoirs_NNS ,_, etc.-The_JJ ``_`` reservoirs_NNS and_CC filter-beds_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ cushion-wells_NNS at_IN Malbr_NNP Hill_NNP and_CC ``_`` Bhandrwda_NNP (_( Mazagaon_NNP )_) ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN shewn_VBN to_TO be_VB dangerous_JJ ``_`` permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN malaria-carrying_NN mosquitoes_NNS ,_, require_VBP ``_`` special_JJ measures_NNS of_IN control_NN ._.
At_IN Malbr_NNP Hill_NNP all_PDT the_DT filter-beds_NNS and_CC the_DT ``_`` reservoirs_NNS are_VBP roofed_VBN over_IN ,_, but_CC many_JJ sky-lights_NNS ,_, ventilators_NNS and_CC doors_NNS exist_VBP ``_`` through_IN which_WDT mosquitoes_NNS can_MD pass_VB in_IN and_CC out_IN ._.
Every_DT ventilator_NN and_CC ``_`` opening_NN in_IN the_DT roof_NN must_MD be_VB protected_VBN by_IN galvanized-iron_NN gauze_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN ``_`` necessary_JJ double_JJ doors_NNS must_MD be_VB provided_VBN to_TO prevent_VB mosquitoes_NNS entering_VBG ``_`` and_CC escaping_VBG through_IN the_DT door-ways_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( t_NN )_) At_IN Bhandrwda_NNP it_PRP will_MD probably_RB be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO cover_VB the_DT ``_`` filter-beds_JJ and_CC protect_JJ every_DT opening_NN with_IN wire_NN gauze_NN ._.
``_`` (_( u_JJ )_) Foreshore_IN Pools.-Foreshore_NNP pools_NNS exist_VBP at_IN Colaba_NNP and_CC Malbr_NNP ``_`` Hill_NNP ._.
For_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT foreshore_NN pools_NNS at_IN Colaba_NNP and_CC Walkeshvar_NNP ``_`` reclamation_NN will_MD prove_VB effective_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN both_DT cases_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT ``_`` value_NN of_IN the_DT reclaimed_JJ land_NN would_MD amply_VB repay_VB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
``_`` (_( v_NN )_) Breeding_NNP Places_NNPS in_IN the_DT New_NNP Dock-works.-Very_NNP large_JJ numbers_NNS ``_`` of_IN temporary_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN dangerous_JJ anopheles_NNS (_( N._NNP stephensi_NN )_) ``_`` were_VBD found_VBN in_IN the_DT new_JJ dock-works_NNS during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN ``_`` of_IN surface_NN pools_NNS of_IN rain_NN water_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS important_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS ``_`` did_VBD not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB the_DT actual_JJ excavations_NNS ,_, but_CC pools_NNS on_IN the_DT upper_JJ surface_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT works-formed_JJ in_IN hollows_NNS in_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
These_DT could_MD mostly_RB be_VB ``_`` levelled_VBN off_RP or_CC filled_VBN up_RP before_IN the_DT onset_NN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN of_IN 1910_CD without_IN ``_`` unduly_JJ interfering_VBG with_IN the_DT construction_NN work_NN ,_, and_CC purely_RB destructive_JJ ``_`` measures_NNS by_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN larvacides_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB relied_VBN upon_JJ except_IN as_IN a_DT ``_`` last_JJ resource_NN ._.
For_IN pools_NNS in_IN the_DT actual_JJ excavations_NNS the_DT use_NN of_IN larvacides_NNS ``_`` is_VBZ the_DT only_JJ measure_NN that_WDT can_MD be_VB adopted_VBN and_CC this_DT must_MD be_VB persevered_VBN in_IN ``_`` until_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN renders_NNS it_PRP unnecessary_JJ ._.
Breeding_VBG Places_NNS in_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Yards_NNS at_IN Victoria_NNP Terminus_NNP and_CC Carnac_NNP Bandar_NNP ,_, Mint_NNP ,_, Arsenal_NNP ,_, Town_NNP Hall_NNP ,_, New_NNP Post_NNP Office_NNP ,_, St._NNP George_NNP 's_POS Hospital_NNP ,_, Government_NNP Dockyard_NNP ,_, etc_NN ._.
``_`` (_( w_NN )_) At_IN different_JJ times_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN malaria-_JJ ``_`` carrying_NN mosqitoes_NNS were_VBD discovered_VBN on_IN all_PDT the_DT above_JJ premises_NNS ._.
These_DT ``_`` yards_NNS ,_, in_IN common_JJ with_IN other_JJ large_JJ yards_NNS and_CC compounds_NNS ,_, require_VBP properly_JJ ``_`` draining_NN and_CC levelling_NN ;_: and_CC until_IN this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN they_PRP will_MD probably_RB be_VB a_DT ``_`` source_NN of_IN danger_NN ._.
``_`` (_( x_NN )_) Hollows_NNP and_CC Undrained_VBN Spaces.-There_NNP are_VBP many_JJ hollows_NNS and_CC ``_`` open_JJ spaces_NNS in_IN the_DT north_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN which_WDT have_VBP little_JJ influence_NN upon_IN ``_`` malaria_NNS and_CC do_VBP not_RB require_VB either_CC draining_VBG or_CC filling_VBG in_IN at_IN present_NN on_IN ``_`` that_DT account_NN ._.
But_CC a_DT number_NN of_IN observations_NNS have_VBP shewn_VBN that_IN large_JJ ``_`` yards_NNS and_CC compounds_NNS ,_, open_JJ spaces_NNS and_CC vacant_JJ building_NN plots_NNS ,_, when_WRB Note.-The_NNP kind_NN of_IN fish_JJ specially_RB recommended_VBN for_IN wells_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS and_CC fountains_NNS is_VBZ one_CD locally_RB known_VBN as_IN ``_`` Piku_NNP ._. ''_''
It_PRP can_MD be_VB obtained_VBN at_IN Marol_NNP ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB suggested_VBN that_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP should_MD make_VB arrangements_NNS to_TO place_VB fish_NN of_IN this_DT kind_NN in_IN any_DT well_NN ,_, fountain_NN or_CC tank_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT water_NN is_VBZ sufficiently_RB pure_JJ for_IN these_DT fish_JJ to_TO live_VB ,_, on_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ making_NN application_NN ._.
If_IN necessary_JJ a_DT nominal_JJ charge_NN might_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN the_DT fish_NN ._.
Anabas_NNP scandens_VBZ is_VBZ another_DT fish_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB used_VBN for_IN placing_VBG in_IN wells_NNS and_CC fountains_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN locally_RB as_IN ``_`` Kazari_NNP ._. ''_''
?_. 109_CD ``_`` improperly_RB drained_VBN and_CC levelled_VBN ,_, are_VBP a_DT great_JJ danger_NN if_IN permanent_JJ breeding_NN ``_`` places_NNS of_IN Neocellia_NNP stephensi_JJ exist_VBP in_IN their_PRP$ vicinity_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX are_VBP places_NNS ``_`` of_IN this_DT kind_NN in_IN the_DT very_JJ heart_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP which_WDT undoubtedly_RB serve_VBP to_TO ``_`` increase_VB the_DT malaria_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ neighbourhood_NN ._.
These_DT places_NNS should_MD be_VB ``_`` dealt_JJ with_IN ._.
But_CC whatever_WDT is_VBZ attempted_VBN should_MD be_VB carried_VBN through_IN ._.
``_`` systematically_RB ,_, section_NN by_IN section_NN ,_, or_CC ward_NN by_IN ward_NN ._.
``_`` (_( y_NN )_) Miscellaneous_NNP Breeding_NNP Places.-In_NNP certain_JJ places_NNS ,_, notably_RB in_IN ``_`` Frere_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Manson_NNP Road_NNP ,_, near_IN Prince_NNP 's_POS and_CC Victoria_NNP Docks_NNP and_CC at_IN ``_`` Colaba_NNP ,_, near_IN the_DT Apollo_NNP Press_NNP ,_, collections_NNS of_IN machinery_NN afford_NN numerous_JJ ``_`` breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN during_IN the_DT monsoon_NN ._.
In_IN certain_JJ other_JJ ``_`` places_NNS collections_NNS of_IN old_JJ tins_NNS ,_, tubs_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, provide_VB breeding_VBG places_NNS for_IN ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, N._NNP stephensi_NN ,_, the_DT malaria-carrier_JJ ,_, among_IN them_PRP ._.
``_`` At_IN Jamsetjee_NNP Bandar_NNP in_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, earthenware_NN vessels_NNS and_CC tubs_NNS of_IN dye_NN used_VBN ``_`` by_IN fishermen_NNS for_IN colouring_VBG their_PRP$ nets_NNS have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN to_TO afford_VB excellent_JJ ``_`` breeding_NN places_NNS for_IN N._NNP stephensi_NN and_CC other_JJ mosquitoes_NNS ._.
``_`` (_( z_NN )_) In_IN regard_NN to_TO all_DT such_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS attempts_VBP at_IN preventing_VBG ``_`` their_PRP$ formation_NN or_CC controlling_VBG them_PRP will_MD be_VB futile_JJ ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ clearly_RB ``_`` understood_VBD that_DT neglect_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN those_DT responsible_JJ will_MD entail_VB a_DT ``_`` penalty_NN ._.
Owners_NNS of_IN machinery_NN should_MD be_VB compelled_VBN to_TO stack_VB it_PRP in_IN ``_`` such_JJ a_DT way_NN that_IN it_PRP will_MD not_RB afford_VB opportunities_NNS for_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS ._.
Owners_NNS of_IN empty_JJ tins_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, should_MD likewise_RB be_VB compelled_VBN ``_`` to_TO take_VB due_JJ precautions_NNS ._. ''_''
B_IN 136-28_JJ ?_. 110_CD CHAPTER_NN II_NNP ._.
RESULTS_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY_NNP ._.
Section_NN 1_CD ._.
280_CD ._.
RESULTS_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP UP_NNP TO_NNP 1909.-As_CD has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN shown_VBN ,_, the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP has_VBZ frequently_RB suffered_VBN from_IN periods_NNS of_IN ill-health_NN in_IN the_DT past_JJ and_CC in_IN the_DT early_JJ days_NNS of_IN the_DT British_JJ occupation_NN many_JJ efforts_NNS were_VBD made_VBN to_TO improve_VB matters_NNS by_IN the_DT reclaiming_NN of_IN ``_`` drowned_JJ lands_NNS ''_'' and_CC other_JJ measures_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN these_DT measures_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, to_TO judge_NN ._.
Undoubtedly_RB much_JJ of_IN the_DT work_NN undertaken_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP on_IN the_DT assumption_NN that_IN ,_, the_DT salt_NN marshes_NNS were_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT ill-health_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ;_: but_CC as_IN we_PRP have_VBP seen_VBN in_IN another_DT chapter_NN there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ evidence_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN malaria_NN was_VBD more_RBR prevalent_JJ in_IN the_DT past_NN than_IN in_IN recent_JJ years_NNS ;_: and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB doubtful_JJ if_IN the_DT measures_NNS carried_VBD out_IN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN had_VBD any_DT appreciable_JJ effect_NN upon_IN this_DT disease_NN ._.
281_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN carried_VBD out_RP by_IN the_DT Napiers_NNS at_IN Colaba_NNP shortly_RB after_IN 1840_CD was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN followed_VBN by_IN a_DT reduced_JJ prevalence_NN of_IN malaria_NN among_IN the_DT British_JJ troops_NNS stationed_VBN in_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP there_RB ,_, who_WP had_VBD suffered_VBN very_RB severely_RB for_IN some_DT years_NNS previously_RB ;_: and_CC except_IN for_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT evidence_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN Colaba_NNP was_VBD very_RB malarious_JJ before_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT Colaba_NNP Causeway_NNP ,_, it_PRP might_MD be_VB thought_VBN that_IN this_DT was_VBD an_DT instance_NN of_IN success_NN attending_VBG anti-malaria_JJ work_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN experience_NN we_PRP are_VBP justified_VBN in_IN assuming_VBG that_IN malaria_NN increased_VBD and_CC became_VBD a_DT menace_NN to_TO the_DT health_NN of_IN Colaba_NNP because_IN of_IN the_DT reclamation_NN work_NN going_VBG on_IN there_EX ;_: and_CC that_IN after_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN the_DT epidemic_JJ declined_VBD ,_, as_IN is_VBZ usual_JJ in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ;_: and_CC though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT measures_NNS carried_VBD out_RP by_IN the_DT Napiers_NNP assisted_VBD in_IN some_DT degree_NN to_TO improve_VB matters_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB doubtful_JJ if_IN this_DT work_NN was_VBD the_DT main_JJ factor_NN in_IN producing_VBG an_DT improvement_NN in_IN the_DT public_JJ health_NN ._.
The_DT introduction_NN of_IN a_DT pipe-water_JJ supply_NN and_CC the_DT closure_NN of_IN wells_NNS in_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP ,_, at_IN a_DT much_RB later_RBR period_NN ,_, probably_RB had_VBD a_DT greater_JJR effect_NN in_IN reducing_VBG endemic_JJ malaria_NN in_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, than_IN the_DT special_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN twenty_CD years_NNS before_IN ._.
282_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS measures_NNS of_IN drainage_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, in_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT evidence_NN to_TO show_VB that_IN these_DT have_VBP influenced_VBN malaria_NNS to_TO any_DT great_JJ extent_NN and_CC the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT portions_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN longest_JJS drained_VBN are_VBP now_RB more_RBR malarious_JJ than_IN the_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT island_NN which_WDT are_VBP still_RB undrained_JJ ,_, negatives_VBZ the_DT view_NN that_IN such_JJ general_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP produced_VBN any_DT reduction_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ._.
283_CD ._.
In_IN more_RBR recent_JJ times_NNS the_DT history_NN of_IN events_NNS at_IN Colaba_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN repeated_VBN on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN both_DT at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP and_CC Bhandarwada_NNP ._.
Between_JJ 1872_CD and_CC 1879_CD a_DT large_JJ reservoir_NN and_CC settling_VBG tank_NN was_VBD constructed_VBN on_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN the_DT area_NN was_VBD very_RB malarious_JJ before_IN this_DT ,_, but_CC partly_RB in_IN consequence_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN and_CC partly_RB as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT leakage_NN which_WDT took_VBD place_NN from_IN the_DT reservoir_NN ,_, malaria_NN became_VBD prevalent_JJ in_IN that_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
In_IN 1880-1885_CD further_JJ work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT water_NN works_VBZ on_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP ,_, over_IN 4_CD lkhs_NNS of_IN rupees_NNS being_VBG spent_VBN upon_IN filter-beds_JJ etc_NN ._.
;_: and_CC again_RB in_IN 1903-1907_JJ another_DT 21/2_CD lkhs_NN were_VBD spent_VBN upon_IN enlarging_VBG the_DT works_NN there_RB ._.
Whether_NNP or_CC not_RB the_DT operations_NNS conducted_VBN in_IN 1880-1885_JJ gave_VBD rise_NN to_TO malaria_NNS ,_, is_VBZ not_RB known_VBN ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN that_IN during_IN the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT later_JJ work_NN malaria_RB again_RB became_VBD prevalent_JJ in_IN the_DT neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT complaints_NNS that_WDT were_VBD made_VBN during_IN 1905-1907_JJ by_IN the_DT residents_NNS in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT reservoir_NN ,_, certain_JJ preventive_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN carried_VBN out_IN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN in_IN that_DT locality_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB customary_JJ to_TO ascribe_VB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT improvement_NN which_WDT has_VBZ followed_VBN ,_, to_TO the_DT results_NNS of_IN this_DT work_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN construction_NN work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN one_CD of_IN the_DT main_JJ factors_NNS responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT lessened_JJ amount_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
284_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT similar_JJ history_NN regarding_VBG the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN malaria_NNS and_CC its_PRP$ prevention_NN at_IN Bhandarwada_NNP reservoir_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO suppose_VB that_IN 111_CD malaria_NN was_VBD very_RB prevalent_JJ in_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN Mazagaon_NNP before_IN the_DT construction_NN of_IN the_DT Bhandarwada_NNP reservoir_NN and_CC six_CD filter-beds_NNS in_IN 1880-1884_CD ._.
But_CC since_IN that_DT time_NN the_DT locality_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN the_DT reputation_NN for_IN being_VBG malarious_JJ ;_: and_CC there_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN to_TO show_VB the_DT existence_NN of_IN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN infection_NN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ years_NNS back_RB three_CD new_JJ filter-beds_NNS were_VBD constructed_VBN there_RB and_CC the_DT reservoir_NN was_VBD altered_VBN ._.
As_IN at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP ,_, so_RB at_IN Bhandarwada_NNP ,_, this_DT work_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB led_VBN to_TO a_DT temporary_JJ increase_NN of_IN malaria_NNS ,_, which_WDT aroused_VBD complaints_NNS ;_: and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN to_TO improve_VB matters_NNS ._.
The_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN ,_, which_WDT consisted_VBD chiefly_NN in_IN attempts_NNS to_TO stop_VB leakage_NN and_CC the_DT provision_NN of_IN masonry_NN channels_NNS for_IN waste-water_JJ etc._NN ,_, have_VBP no_DT doubt_NN been_VBN of_IN considerable_JJ service_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN much_JJ of_IN the_DT improvement_NN effected_VBD has_VBZ been_VBN largely_RB accidental_JJ ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN all_PDT the_DT filter-beds_NNS and_CC the_DT reservoir_NN itself_PRP continue_VBP to_TO breed_VB large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN malaria-carrying_JJ species_NNS of_IN anopheles_NNS and_CC if_IN extensive_JJ construction_NN works_NNS ,_, necessitating_VBG the_DT employment_NN of_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN labourers_NNS ,_, were_VBD undertaken_VBN there_RB ,_, an_DT increase_NN of_IN malaria_NNS would_MD again_RB take_VB place_NN and_CC a_DT small_JJ local_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN would_MD be_VB certain_JJ to_TO follow_VB ._.
285_CD ._.
In_IN 1902_CD ,_, as_IN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN mentioned_VBN in_IN ``_`` the_DT History_NNP of_IN Malaria_NNP Prevention_NNP ,_, ''_'' the_DT Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP decided_VBD to_TO carry_VB out_RP general_JJ anti-_JJ mosquito_NN measures_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, and_CC for_IN this_DT purpose_NN a_DT small_JJ gang_NN of_IN men_NNS was_VBD appointed_VBN ._.
The_DT special_JJ staff_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN discontinued_VBN after_IN 1904_CD ,_, and_CC since_IN then_RB anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ staff_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP ._.
286_CD ._.
What_WP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN carried_VBD out_RP on_IN the_DT lines_NNS indicated_VBD ?_.
The_DT total_NN recorded_VBD fever_NN mortality_NN is_VBZ much_RB less_JJR than_IN it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB and_CC the_DT fall_NN coincided_VBD with_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT at_IN first_JJ sight_VBD it_PRP might_MD be_VB supposed_VBN that_IN the_DT one_NN was_VBD related_VBN to_TO the_DT other_JJ ._.
But_CC examination_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Reports_NNP for_IN 1902_CD shows_NNS that_IN ,_, an_DT entirely_RB new_JJ system_NN of_IN death-registration_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN that_IN year_NN ;_: a_DT very_RB large_JJ staff_NN of_IN qualified_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS was_VBD appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT express_NN purpose_NN of_IN verifying_VBG the_DT causes_NNS of_IN death_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT fall_NN in_IN fever_JJ deaths_NNS was_VBD due_JJ not_RB to_TO better_JJR sanitation_NN but_CC to_TO improved_VBN registration_NN ._.
287_CD ._.
That_DT better_JJR diagnosis_NN rather_RB than_IN any_DT sanitary_JJ improvement_NN was_VBD responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT reduced_VBN fever_NN mortality_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN almost_RB the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT reduction_NN took_VBD place_NN among_IN Hindus_NNP and_CC Mussalmans_NNPS ._.
Among_IN Parsis_NNP the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN fever_NN remained_VBD much_RB the_DT same_JJ after_IN 1902_CD as_IN before_IN it_PRP ,_, the_DT mean_JJ annual_JJ total_NN of_IN deaths_NNS recorded_VBN under_IN this_DT head_NN being_VBG 133_CD for_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS prior_RB to_TO 1902_CD and_CC exactly_RB the_DT same_JJ figure_NN 133_CD ,_, for_IN the_DT five_CD years_NNS 1904_CD to_TO 1908_CD ._.
288_CD ._.
Excluding_VBG the_DT work_NN at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP and_CC Bhandarwada_NNP Hill_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ exceedingly_RB doubtful_JJ if_IN the_DT general_JJ anti-mosquito_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN in_IN the_DT City_NNP since_IN 1902_CD have_VBP had_VBN much_JJ influence_NN upon_IN the_DT incidence_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._.
Here_RB and_CC there_RB mosquitoes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN lessened_VBN in_IN number_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT mosquitoes_NNS dealt_VBD with_IN have_VBP often_RB been_VBN species_NNS of_IN Culex_NNP ,_, which_WDT as_RB is_VBZ well_RB known_VBN ,_, are_VBP not_RB concerned_VBN in_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN there_EX is_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_DT malaria_NN has_VBZ actually_RB increased_VBN rather_RB than_IN diminished_VBN during_IN the_DT period_NN when_WRB supposed_VBN anti-malaria_NN work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN progress_NN and_CC on_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN occasions_NNS between_IN 1902_CD and_CC 1908_CD local_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN ._.
289_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD an_DT increase_NN of_IN malaria_NNS associated_VBN with_IN construction_NN work_NN at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP reservoir_NN ;_: an_DT increase_NN at_IN Colaba_NNP ,_, associated_VBN with_IN the_DT recent_JJ reclamation_NN work_NN there_RB ,_, during_IN which_WDT the_DT cases_NNS of_IN fever_NN attending_VBG the_DT local_JJ dispensaries_NNS rose_VBD from_IN 2,559_CD in_IN 1905_CD to_TO 4,357_CD in_IN 1936_CD ,_, a_DT sudden_JJ increase_NN of_IN 70_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
;_: and_CC the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN malaria_NNS associated_VBN with_IN the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP Work_NNP ,_, which_WDT realiy_VBP began_VBD in_IN 1905_CD ,_, a_DT year_NN after_IN the_DT work_NN commenced_VBD as_IN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT admissions_NNS for_IN fever_NN to_TO the_DT local_JJ dispensary_NN ._.
Admissions_NNS of_IN fever_NN cases_NNS at_IN Frere_NNP Road_NNP Dispensary_NNP ._.

2,074_CD 2,984_CD 4,036_CD 4,852_CD 6,584_CD 7,173_CD ?_. 112_CD 290_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT three_CD epidemics_NNS which_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN there_EX have_VBP been_VBN minor_JJ increases_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS asso-_JJ ciated_VBN with_IN the_DT demolition_NN of_IN the_DT areas_NNS required_VBN by_IN the_DT Improvement_NNP Trust_NNP for_IN Sandhurst_NNP Road_NNP and_CC Princess_NNP Street_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB for_IN the_DT building_NN of_IN new_JJ chawls_NN at_IN Koliwada_NNP ._.
These_DT local_JJ epidemics_NNS have_VBP all_DT been_VBN due_JJ to_TO similar_JJ causes_NNS ,_, i.e._FW ,_, the_DT undertaking_NN of_IN construction_NN work_NN involving_VBG the_DT production_NN of_IN numerous_JJ temporary_JJ pools_NNS of_IN water_NN in_IN areas_NNS in_IN which_WDT permanent_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS of_IN the_DT malaria-carrying_JJ Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN existed_VBD ,_, and_CC in_IN which_WDT the_DT population_NN was_VBD already_RB in_IN some_DT degree_NN infected_VBN with_IN malaria_NNS ._.
The_DT gradual_JJ increase_NN of_IN endemic_JJ malaria_NNS in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, resulting_VBG in_IN many_JJ thousand_CD of_IN people_NNS becoming_VBG infected_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, culminated_VBN in_IN a_DT more_RBR general_JJ epidemic_NN in_IN 1908_CD ,_, in_IN all_DT probability_NN partly_RB as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT stress_NN produced_VBN among_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN by_IN the_DT abnormal_JJ rise_NN in_IN the_DT price_NN of_IN food_NN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ part_NN of_IN 1907_CD and_CC 1908_CD ._.
291_CD ._.
As_IN a_DT general_JJ conclusion_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB stated_VBN that_IN a_DT consideration_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT available_JJ facts_NNS leads_VBZ to_TO the_DT opinion_NN that_IN ,_, the_DT anti-malaria_JJ work_NN carried_VBD out_RP in_IN the_DT City_NNP prior_RB to_TO 1909_CD (_( with_IN the_DT exception_NN perhaps_RB of_IN work_NN at_IN Malabar_NNP Hill_NNP and_CC Bhandarwada_NNP )_) has_VBZ failed_VBN to_TO prevent_VB an_DT increase_NN of_IN malaria_NNS ._.
Section_NN 2_CD ._.
292_CD ._.
RECENT_JJ RESULTS_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP .-In_JJ 1909_CD shortly_RB after_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT special_JJ investigation_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP detailed_VBN in_IN this_DT report_NN ,_, more_RBR vigorous_JJ measures_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS prevention_NN were_VBD adopted_VBN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT Docks_NNP ._.
These_DT measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN referred_VBN to_TO at_IN length_NN in_IN a_DT former_JJ section_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB necessary_JJ to_TO mention_VB certain_JJ facts_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN the_DT measures_NNS adopted_VBN have_VBP been_VBN of_IN some_DT value_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT mitigation_NN of_IN malaria_NN has_VBZ followed_VBN upon_IN their_PRP$ adoption_NN ._.
In_IN support_NN of_IN this_DT opinion_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN -_: (_( 1_CD )_) There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT considerable_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT spleen_JJ rate_NN of_IN children_NNS resident_NN within_IN the_DT area_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN applied_VBN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT marked_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN fever_NN admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT local_JJ dispensaries_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) There_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT fall_NN in_IN the_DT total_JJ mortality_NN among_IN people_NNS resident_VBP in_IN the_DT area_NN affected_VBN by_IN malaria_NNS owing_VBG to_TO proximity_NN to_TO the_DT Dock_NNP Works_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) And_CC more_RBR especially_RB the_DT mortality_NN during_IN October_NNP and_CC November_NNP and_CC the_DT deaths_NNS among_IN young_JJ children_NNS within_IN this_DT area_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN a_DT great_JJ decrease_NN ._.
293_CD ._.
Spleen_JJ Rate.-Early_RB in_IN 1909_CD before_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT more_RBR vigrous_JJ measures_NNS subsequently_RB undertaken_VBN by_IN the_DT Municipality_NNP ,_, Port_NNP Trust_NNP and_CC Rail-_NNP way_NN Companies_NNP ,_, an_DT examination_NN of_IN 597_CD children_NNS resident_NN in_IN the_DT Esplanade_NNP section_NN ,_, the_DT area_NN immediately_RB adjoining_VBG the_DT New_NNP Dock_NNP Works_NNP ,_, showed_VBD 438_CD or_CC 73.38_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, to_TO possess_VB enlarged_JJ spleen_NN ._.
A_DT second_JJ spleen_JJ census_NN carried_VBD out_RP in_IN this_DT area_NN late_RB in_IN 1910_CD showed_VBD 250_CD children_NNS out_IN of_IN 516_CD to_TO have_VB enlarged_VBN spleen_NN or_CC 48.4_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, a_DT difference_NN of_IN nearly_RB 25_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

''_''
Extract_NN from_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS Report_NNP for_IN the_DT first_JJ quarter_NN of_IN 1910_CD ._.
Anti-malarial_JJ work_NN ._.
``_`` So_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN this_DT Department_NNP was_VBD concerned_VBN anti-malarial_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD continued_VBN during_IN the_DT quarter-_JJ inspection_NN of_IN wells_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, cisterns_NNS etc._VBP ,_, and_CC ``_`` the_DT serving_NN of_IN notices_NNS and_CC asking_VBG for_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Standing_VBG ``_`` Committee-but_JJ with_IN very_RB little_JJ practical_JJ result_NN ,_, as_IN although_IN up_IN to_TO ``_`` 5th_CD February_NNP sanction_NN was_VBD given_VBN by_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP under_IN ``_`` section_NN 381_CD of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Act_NNP ,_, to_TO carry_VB out_RP that_DT section_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN ``_`` of_IN 298_CD persons_NNS ,_, a_DT week_NN later_RB a_DT resolution_NN was_VBD passed_VBN that_IN all_DT objections_NNS to_TO ``_`` the_DT closing_NN of_IN wells_NNS should_MD be_VB laid_VBN before_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ``_`` and_CC a_DT week_NN after_IN a_DT resolution_NN was_VBD passed_VBN that_IN all_DT action_NN should_MD be_VB stayed_VBN ._.
``_`` Since_IN the_DT Malaria_NNP staff_NN was_VBD appointed_VBN in_IN October_NNP 1909_CD ,_, over_IN 12,000_CD ``_`` inspections_NNS of_IN houses_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN every_DT case_NN where_WRB an_DT ``_`` uncovered_JJ well_RB or_CC cistern_NN has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN to_TO contain_VB mosquito_JJ larvae_NN ``_`` letters_NNS have_VBP been_VBN written_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, notices_NNS served_VBD and_CC the_DT ``_`` sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP applied_VBD for_IN :_: 128_CD wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN ``_`` covered_VBN ,_, 48_CD filled_VBN in_IN and_CC 369_CD cisterns_NNS covered_VBN ._.
``_`` The_DT enormous_JJ amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN in_IN respect_NN of_IN wells_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, cisterns_NNS ,_, ``_`` etc._NN ,_, has_VBZ now_RB come_VBN to_TO a_DT standstill_JJ ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ resolution_NN ``_`` of_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP that_IN a_DT list_NN of_IN only_RB those_DT wells_NNS which_WDT are_VBP away_RB ``_`` from_IN light_NN and_CC air_NN and_CC of_IN which_WDT the_DT water_NN is_VBZ not_RB used_VBN should_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT ``_`` Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT Sub-Committee_NNP will_MD visit_VB these_DT wells_NNS and_CC ``_`` decide_VB what_WP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
Under_IN these_DT circumstances_NNS I_PRP have_VBP nothing_NN ``_`` to_TO say_VB as_IN to_TO the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN during_IN the_DT quarter_NN ;_: as_IN ``_`` beyond_IN the_DT inspection_NN and_CC writing_NN of_IN letters_NNS and_CC serving_NN of_IN notices_NNS to_TO ``_`` the_DT parties_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ premises_NNS such_JJ places_NNS exist_VBP nothing_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN ,_, ``_`` beyond_IN spending_NN a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN time_NN and_CC money_NN without_IN any_DT ``_`` practical_JJ result_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT Corporation_NNP in_IN September_NNP 1909_CD resolved_VBD to_TO ``_`` adopt_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN malaria_NNS and_CC agreed_VBD to_TO the_DT measures_NNS ``_`` I_PRP proposed_VBD ,_, they_PRP also_RB asked_VBD for_IN a_DT report_NN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN six_CD months_NNS :_: ``_`` in_IN that_DT report_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB ready_JJ next_JJ week_NN ,_, I_PRP propose_VBP to_TO explain_VB the_DT ``_`` position_NN in_IN detail_NN ._. Malaria_NNP ._.
``_`` As_IN in_IN the_DT second_JJ quarter_NN of_IN 1909_CD ,_, Malarial_NNP Fever_NNP occasioned_VBD 42_CD deaths_NNS in_IN the_DT period_NN under_IN review_NN ,_, being_VBG 22_CD less_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ quarter_NN ._.
``_`` Anti-malarial_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD continued_VBN during_IN the_DT quarter_NN ._.
Premises_NNS ``_`` were_VBD visited_VBN ,_, wells_NNS ,_, tanks_NNS ,_, cisterns_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, examined_VBN ,_, and_CC wherever_RB mosquitoes_NNS ``_`` were_VBD found_VBN breeding_NN in_IN wells_NNS letters_NNS were_VBD addressed_VBN to_TO parties_NNS to_TO remedy_VB ``_`` the_DT situation_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_IN 58_CD wells_NNS were_VBD covered_VBN and_CC 24_CD filled_VBN in_IN ._.
``_`` In_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP 118_CD wells_NNS ``_`` were_VBD reported_VBN to_TO them_PRP as_IN being_VBG 'the_PRP most_RBS objectionable_JJ cases_NNS ,_, '_'' out_IN of_IN ``_`` which_WDT 15_CD wells_NNS were_VBD visited_VBN and_CC inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Sub-Committee_NNP ,_, who_WP ``_`` recommended_VBD 7_CD of_IN them_PRP to_TO be_VB hermetically_RB sealed_VBN or_CC filled_VBN up_RP ;_: and_CC these_DT ``_`` are_VBP under_IN action_NN ;_: lists_NNS of_IN remaining_VBG cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN returned_VBN to_TO this_DT ``_`` Department_NNP to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT objections_NNS ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, of_IN the_DT owners_NNS to_TO comply_VB ``_`` with_IN the_DT requisitions_NNS of_IN this_DT Department_NNP ._. But_CC as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB exactly_RB a_DT year_NN since_IN ``_`` the_DT anti-malarial_JJ operations_NNS were_VBD commenced_VBN (_( 1st_CD October_NNP 1909_CD )_) with_IN the_DT ``_`` aid_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ staff_NN ,_, the_DT work_NN done_VBN during_IN the_DT 12_CD months_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN ``_`` tabulated_VBN below_IN :_: -_: Wells_NNS examined_VBN and_CC re-examined_JJ for_IN Mosquito_NNP Larvae_NNP ..._: 5,075_CD Cisterns_NNP ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ..._: ..._: 8,516_CD Tanks_NNS ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ..._: ..._: 389_CD Wells_NNP in_IN which_WDT larvae_NN were_VBD found_VBN ..._: ..._: ..._: 2,680_CD Cisterns_NNP ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ..._: ..._: ..._: 994_CD Tanks_NNS ,_, ,_, ,_, ,_, ..._: ..._: ..._: 117_CD Cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT letters_NNS of_IN requisition_NN were_VBD addressed_VBN to_TO parties_NNS ..._: 2,128_CD Cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD complied_VBN with_IN ..._: ..._: 713_CD Cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP to_TO take_VB action_NN under_IN section_NN 381_CD of_IN the_DT Act_NNP was_VBD applied_VBN for_IN ..._: ..._: 282_CD Cases_NNS reported_VBD as_IN ``_`` most_JJS objectionable_JJ ''_'' ..._: ..._: 167_CD Notices_NNS issued_VBN against_IN parties_NNS ..._: ..._: ..._: 99_CD ``_`` complied_VBN with_IN ..._: ..._: ..._: 21_CD Prosecutions_NNS undertaken_JJ ..._: ..._: ..._: 24_CD ``_`` I_PRP have_VBP in_IN my_PRP$ First_JJ Quarterly_JJ Report_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN pointed_VBD out_RP the_DT ``_`` limitations_NNS under_IN which_WDT this_DT work_NN is_VBZ proceeding_VBG ;_: progress_NN under_IN such_JJ ``_`` conditions_NNS must_MD be_VB slow_JJ ._.

?_. 119_CD CHAPTER_NN III_NNP ._.
THE_DT LEGAL_NNP ASPECT_NNP OF_NNP MOSQUITO_NNP PREVENTION_NNP ._.
Section_NN 1_CD ._.
309_CD ._.
NECESSITY_NN FOR_NNP LEGAL_NNP POWERS.-It_NNP is_VBZ sometimes_RB assumed_VBN because_IN a_DT private_JJ person_NN may_MD find_VB little_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN preventing_VBG the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS on_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS ,_, if_IN he_PRP is_VBZ willing_JJ to_TO take_VB the_DT necessary_JJ precautions_NNS ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT comparatively_RB simple_JJ matter_NN for_IN public_JJ bodies_NNS like_IN municipalities_NNS to_TO do_VB the_DT same_JJ thing_NN in_IN the_DT areas_NNS under_IN their_PRP$ control_NN ._.
But_CC a_DT little_JJ experience_NN shows_VBZ this_DT idea_NN to_TO have_VB no_DT foundation_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT officials_NNS charged_VBD with_IN carrying_VBG out_RP sanitary_JJ measures_NNS within_IN the_DT bounds_NNS of_IN a_DT municipality_NN meet_NN with_IN every_DT sort_NN of_IN objection_NN and_CC opposition_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN new_JJ measures_NNS not_RB sanctioned_VBN by_IN custom_NN or_CC supported_VBN by_IN precedent_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ only_RB twelve_JJ years_NNS since_IN Ross_NNP first_RB proposed_VBD mosquito_JJ destruction_NN or_CC prevention_NN as_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ measure_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN in_IN many_JJ places_NNS in_IN which_WDT this_DT form_NN of_IN sanitation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN that_IN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO sup-_JJ plement_NN existing_VBG enactments_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT Public_NNP Health_NNP ,_, by_IN Ordinances_NNS and_CC Bye-laws_NNP ,_, framed_VBD for_IN the_DT specific_JJ purpose_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mos-_NN quitoes_NNS and_CC giving_VBG special_JJ powers_NNS to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT measures_NNS of_IN prevention_NN found_VBD necessary_JJ for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.
310_CD ._.
Colonel_NNP Gorgas_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD the_DT first_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP a_DT successful_JJ anti-mosquito_JJ campaign_NN in_IN a_DT large_JJ city_NN ,_, reported_VBD in_IN 1901_CD ,_, shortly_RB after_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN this_DT work_NN in_IN Havana_NNP ,_, that-_JJ ``_`` the_DT Mayor_NNP has_VBZ issued_VBN an_DT order_NN prohibiting_VBG the_DT keeping_VBG of_IN standing_VBG ``_`` water_NN anywhere_RB within_IN the_DT City_NNP limits_NNS unless_IN made_VBN mosquito_NN proof_NN ._.
This_DT ``_`` is_VBZ being_VBG enforced_VBN ;_: and_CC all_DT standing_JJ water_NN found_VBD not_RB protected_VBN as_IN required_VBN ``_`` is_VBZ emptied_VBN and_CC the_DT owner_NN fined_VBD ._. ''_''
311_CD ._.
Ross_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN upon_IN malaria_NNS in_IN Mauritius_NNP ,_, mentions_NNS that_IN for_IN purposes_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS prevention_NN certain_JJ petty_JJ laws_NNS and_CC regulations_NNS are_VBP necessary_JJ ;_: and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ more_JJR recent_JJ book_NN upon_IN ``_`` The_DT Prevention_NNP of_IN Malaria_NNP ,_, ''_'' in_IN detailing_VBG the_DT first_JJ step_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN by_IN an_DT authority_NN proposing_VBG to_TO reduce_VB malaria_NNS ,_, he_PRP states_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO reconsider_VB the_DT local_JJ Government_NNP and_CC Municipal_NNP sanitary_JJ regulations_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO take_VB power_NN to_TO deal_VB with_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._.
He_PRP summarises_VBZ the_DT objects_NNS for_IN which_WDT such_JJ legislation_NN is_VBZ required_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Briefly_NNP such_JJ enactments_NNS must_MD give_VB the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP power-_NN ``_`` (_( a_DT )_) to_TO enter_VB private_JJ premises_NNS (_( including_VBG houses_NNS ,_, yards_NNS ,_, gardens_NNS ,_, ``_`` lands_NNS and_CC estates_NNS )_) in_IN order_NN to_TO search_VB for_IN mosquitoes_NNS ,_, rats_NNS and_CC other_JJ ``_`` annoying_VBG or_CC dangerous_JJ vermin_NN ;_: ``_`` (_( b_NN )_) to_TO destroy_VB such_JJ vermin_NNS when_WRB found_VBN ;_: and_CC ``_`` (_( c_NN )_) to_TO prevent_VB the_DT breeding_NN of_IN them_PRP ._.
``_`` Another_DT object_NN is_VBZ to_TO compel_VB owners_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS to_TO take_VB reasonable_JJ precautions_NNS against_IN such_JJ breeding_NN ._. ''_''
Ross_NNP points_NNS out_RP that_IN although_IN most_JJS civilized_JJ malarious_JJ countries_NNS now_RB possess_VBP Health_NNP Acts_NNP ,_, more_RBR or_CC less_RBR based_VBN upon_IN precedent_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT contain_VBP clauses_NNS against_IN ``_`` nuisances_NNS ,_, ''_'' the_DT word_NN nuisance_NN is_VBZ not_RB always_RB defined_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO include_VB the_DT breeding_NN of_IN vermin_NN ._.
He_PRP adds_VBZ :_: -_: ''_'' In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, then_RB ,_, it_PRP suffices_VBZ merely_RB to_TO extend_VB by_IN Act_NNP the_DT definition_NN of_IN the_DT word_NN ,_, if_IN possible_JJ to_TO include_VB all_DT vermin_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN mosquitoes_NNS ._. ''_''
312_CD ._.
Colonel_NNP Gorgas_NNP ,_, in_IN a_DT recent_JJ paper_NN upon_IN mosquito_JJ prevention_NN ,_, after_IN stating_VBG that_IN the_DT first_JJ thing_NN in_IN undertaking_VBG such_PDT a_DT work_NN is_VBZ to_TO get_VB the_DT necessary_JJ funds_NNS ,_, adds_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` The_DT next_JJ step_NN is_VBZ to_TO get_VB the_DT authority_NN necessary_JJ for_IN enforcing_VBG the_DT ``_`` sanitary_JJ measures_NNS ._.
To_TO this_DT end_NN I_PRP would_MD have_VB an_DT ordinance_NN passed_VBD declaring_VBG ``_`` it_PRP a_DT nuisance_NN for_IN any_DT property_NN owner_NN to_TO have_VB on_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS any_DT mosquito_NN ``_`` larv_NN ,_, and_CC prescribing_VBG a_DT fine_NN of_IN from_IN 5_CD to_TO 10_CD dollars_NNS for_IN such_JJ offence_NN ._.
The_DT ``_`` Sanitary_JJ Officer_NNP should_MD have_VB powers_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN these_DT sanitary_JJ ordinances_NNS ``_`` are_VBP concerned_VBN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT alcaldes_NNS of_IN most_JJS Latin-American_JJ municipalities_NNS ?_. 120_CD ``_`` have_VBP ._.
This_DT would_MD give_VB the_DT Sanitary_NNP Officer_NNP the_DT power_NN of_IN assessing_VBG the_DT ``_`` fines_NNS or_CC revoking_VBG them_PRP at_IN any_DT stage_NN of_IN the_DT proceedings_NNS ._.
The_DT fine_NN should_MD ``_`` be_VB collected_VBN through_IN the_DT Courts_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT Sanitary_JJ Officer_NNP should_MD be_VB officially_RB ``_`` informed_VBN by_IN the_DT Judge_NNP when_WRB the_DT fine_NN is_VBZ collected_VBN ,_, and_CC also_RB by_IN the_DT treasurer_NN ``_`` when_WRB the_DT fine_NN has_VBZ been_VBN deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT treasury_NN ._.
In_IN this_DT way_NN he_PRP can_MD ``_`` keep_VB control_NN of_IN all_PDT the_DT steps_NNS in_IN the_DT process_NN ._.
``_`` Another_DT ordinance_NN should_MD be_VB passed_VBN giving_VBG the_DT sanitary_JJ officer_NN autho-_JJ ``_`` rity_NN to_TO abate_VB these_DT nuisances_NNS himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ force_NN when_WRB they_PRP have_VBP ``_`` not_RB been_VBN abated_VBN by_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT property_NN after_IN a_DT week_NN 's_POS notice_NN and_CC ``_`` providing_NN that_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN such_JJ work_NN be_VB made_VBN a_DT lien_NN against_IN the_DT property-_NN ``_`` which_WDT cost_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB collected_VBN through_IN the_DT Courts_NNS against_IN the_DT owner_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` property_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT very_RB important_JJ measure_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP enables_VBZ the_DT sanitary_JJ ``_`` officer_NN at_IN no_DT great_JJ public_JJ expense_NN rapidly_RB to_TO carry_VB into_IN effect_NN his_PRP$ sanitary_JJ ``_`` measures_NNS himself_PRP when_WRB the_DT people_NNS affected_VBD are_VBP slow_JJ in_IN executing_VBG the_DT ``_`` measures_NNS ordered_VBN ._.
``_`` A_DT third_JJ ordinance_NN should_MD be_VB passed_VBN directing_VBG that_IN all_DT cisterns_NNS ,_, wells_NNS ,_, ``_`` gutters_NNS and_CC water_NN collection_NN likely_RB to_TO breed_VB mosquitoes_NNS must_MD be_VB either_CC ``_`` abolished_VBD or_CC so_RB screened_JJ and_CC cared_VBD for_IN that_DT mosquitoes_NNS can_MD not_RB breed_VB in_IN ``_`` them_PRP ._.
With_IN these_DT three_CD ordinances_NNS the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP can_MD rapidly_RB get_VB his_PRP$ ``_`` community_NN in_IN such_JJ condition_NN that_WDT very_RB few_JJ stegomyi_NN can_MD breed_VB ,_, and_CC ``_`` the_DT locality_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB in_IN such_JJ condition_NN that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB so_RB few_JJ ``_`` stegomyi_NN that_WDT Yellow_JJ fever_NN can_MD not_RB spread_VB ._. ''_''
313_CD ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN nearly_RB every_DT British_JJ Colony_NNP in_IN the_DT West_NNP Indies_NNPS possesses_VBZ special_JJ Public_NNP Health_NNP ordinances_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN mosquito_NN breeding_NN ,_, which_WDT enforce_VBP the_DT drainage_NN ,_, screening_VBG and_CC protection_NN of_IN collections_NNS of_IN water_NN ;_: and_CC prescribe_VB heavy_JJ penalties_NNS in_IN cases_NNS of_IN default_NN ._.
Similar_JJ ordinances_NNS have_VBP also_RB been_VBN passed_VBN in_IN certain_JJ cities_NNS in_IN the_DT United_NNP States_NNPS ._.
A_DT number_NN of_IN the_DT special_JJ ordinances_NNS and_CC bye-laws_NNS in_IN the_DT West_NNP Indies_NNPS were_VBD quoted_VBN in_IN full_JJ in_IN the_DT appendix_NN to_TO the_DT ad_NN interim_JJ report_NN upon_IN Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP published_VBD early_RB in_IN 1910_CD ._.
Section_NN 2_CD ._.
314_CD ._.
THE_DT CITY_NNP OF_NNP BOMBAY_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP ACT.-In_NNP Bombay_NNP the_DT sanitary_JJ administration_NN is_VBZ conducted_VBN under_IN powers_NNS contained_VBN in_IN certain_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Municipal_NNP Act_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO examine_VB these_DT sections_NNS carefully_RB in_IN order_NN to_TO determine_VB how_WRB far_RB they_PRP meet_VBP the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN mosquito_JJ prevention_NN and_CC in_IN what_WP direction_NN they_PRP need_VBP modification_NN ._.
315_CD ._.
Section_NN 3_CD of_IN the_DT Act_NNP is_VBZ devoted_VBN to_TO definitions_NNS ,_, among_IN which_WDT the_DT three_CD following_VBG are_VBP of_IN importance_NN in_IN relation_NN to_TO the_DT prevention_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS and_CC malaria_NNS :_: -_: Definition_NN (_( t_NN )_) -_: ``_`` Water_NNP work_NN ''_'' includes_VBZ a_DT lake_NN ,_, stream_NN ,_, spring_NN ,_, well_RB ,_, pump_NN ,_, reservoir_NN ,_, cistern_JJ ,_, tank_NN ,_, duct_NN ,_, whether_IN covered_VBN or_CC open_JJ sluice_NN ,_, mainpipe_NN ,_, culvert_NN ,_, engine_NN and_CC any_DT machinery_NN ,_, land_NN ,_, building_NN or_CC thing_NN for_IN supplying_VBG or_CC used_VBN for_IN supplying_VBG water_NN ._.
Definition_NNP (_( z_NN )_) -_: ``_`` Nuisance_NN ''_'' includes_VBZ act_NN ,_, omission_NN ,_, place_NN ,_, or_CC thing_NN which_WDT causes_VBZ or_CC likely_JJ to_TO cause_VB injury_NN ,_, danger_NN ,_, annoyance_NN or_CC offence_NN to_TO the_DT sense_NN of_IN sight_NN ,_, smelling_VBG or_CC hearing_NN ,_, or_CC which_WDT is_VBZ or_CC may_MD be_VB dangerous_JJ to_TO life_NN or_CC injurious_JJ to_TO health_NN or_CC property_NN ._.
Definition_NNP (_( aa_NN )_) -_: ``_`` Dangerous_JJ disease_NN ''_'' means_VBZ cholera_NN and_CC any_DT endemic_JJ ,_, epidemic_JJ or_CC infectious_JJ disease_NN by_IN which_WDT the_DT life_NN of_IN man_NN is_VBZ endangered_VBN ._.
