332_CD ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT improvement_NN on_IN the_DT previous_JJ wording_NN of_IN the_DT section_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT amendment_NN on_IN the_DT lines_NNS suggested_VBD does_VBZ not_RB meet_VB the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN for_IN the_DT following_JJ reasons_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Only_RB potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS already_RB existing_VBG can_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT power_NN given_VBN under_IN any_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT multiplication_NN of_IN potential_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS ;_: and_CC apparently_RB any_DT person_NN can_MD dig_VB a_DT well_NN ,_, construct_VBP a_DT tank_NN or_CC fountain_NN or_CC place_NN any_DT number_NN of_IN tubs_NNS or_CC vessels_NNS to_TO contain_VB water_NN on_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS without_IN let_NN or_CC hindrance_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT powers_NNS enforced_VBN by_IN the_DT existing_VBG Act_NNP only_RB permit_VBD the_DT Munici-_NNP pal_NN Commissioner_NNP to_TO take_VB action_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO section_NN 381_CD with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, and_CC he_PRP can_MD not_RB delegate_VB his_PRP$ duties_NNS under_IN that_DT section_NN to_TO any_DT municipal_JJ officer_NN ._.
Thus_RB the_DT Act_NNP as_IN it_PRP stands_VBZ at_IN present_NN does_VBZ not_RB legally_RB oblige_VBP any_DT person_NN to_TO take_VB notice_NN of_IN a_DT requisition_NN under_IN section_NN 381_CD until_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG from_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Com-_NNP missioners_NNS and_CC the_DT Commissioner_NNP can_MD not_RB issue_VB such_PDT an_DT order_NN until_IN the_DT matter_NN has_VBZ been_VBN considered_VBN by_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
333_CD ._.
An_DT example_NN may_MD be_VB suggested_VBN of_IN what_WP might_MD easily_RB occur_VB under_IN existing_VBG circumstances_NNS ._.
Suppose_NNP an_DT officer_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Department_NNP discovers_VBZ a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN mosquito_JJ larv_NN and_CC pup_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ species_NNS ,_, breeding_VBG in_IN a_DT garden_NN tub_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD call_VB the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT owner_NN to_TO the_DT fact_NN ,_, but_CC legally_RB he_PRP has_VBZ no_DT power_NN to_TO take_VB any_DT action_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT owner_NN objects_NNS to_TO do_VB anything_NN himself_PRP and_CC refuses_VBZ to_TO permit_VB anything_NN to_TO be_VB done_VBN ,_, the_DT officer_NN would_MD have_VB to_TO leave_VB the_DT tub_NN alone_RB ;_: all_DT he_PRP could_MD do_VB would_MD be_VB to_TO report_VB matters_NNS to_TO the_DT head_NN of_IN his_PRP$ department_NN ._.
In_IN due_JJ course_NN the_DT case_NN would_MD be_VB reported_VBN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, who_WP in_IN turn_NN would_MD place_VB it_PRP before_IN the_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ._.
The_DT Standing_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, after_IN considering_VBG the_DT matter_NN ,_, would_MD no_DT doubt_NN sanction_NN the_DT issuing_NN of_IN an_DT order_NN by_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP to_TO the_DT owner_NN to_TO aba\ill\e_VB the_DT nuisance_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT Commissioner_NNP himself_PRP might_MD take_VB action_NN if_IN after_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN the_DT notice_NN nothing_NN has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN ._.
But_CC in_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ course_NN of_IN things_NNS the_DT owner_NN would_MD be_VB summoned_VBN before_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP ,_, and_CC this_DT would_MD create_VB a_DT still_RB further_JJ delay_NN ._.
No_DT doubt_NN the_DT tub_NN of_IN the_DT mosquito_NN larv_NN would_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN the_DT end_NN ,_, probably_RB after_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN some_DT weeks_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT same_JJ thing_NN might_MD happen_VB again_RB and_CC again_RB ._.
This_DT of_IN course_NN is_VBZ an_DT extreme_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ typical_JJ of_IN the_DT unwieldy_JJ methods_NNS that_WDT have_VBP to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP under_IN the_DT present_JJ Act_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT proposed_VBN amendment_NN of_IN section_NN 381_CD does_VBZ not_RB suggest_VB any_DT simplifi-_JJ cation_NN of_IN this_DT cumbersome_JJ procedure_NN ._.
Section_NN 3_CD ._.
334_CD ._.
THE_DT ADMINISTRATION_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP ACT_NNP IN_NNP REGARD_NNP 10_CD MOSQUITO_NNP PREVENTION.-The_JJ powers_NNS given_VBN under_IN the_DT various_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT Municipal_NNP Act_NNP quoted_VBN above_IN are_VBP much_JJ too_RB vague_JJ to_TO enable_VB the_DT Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP mosquito_JJ prevention_NN work_NN with_IN any_DT assurance_NN of_IN success_NN ._.
Until_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS is_VBZ declared_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT statutory_JJ nuisance_NN and_CC the_DT Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS are_VBP given_VBN adequate_JJ powers_NNS for_IN dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT danger_NN in_IN an_DT efficient_JJ manner_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN if_IN necessary_JJ they_PRP can_MD themselves_PRP abate_VB the_DT nuisance_NN after_IN short_JJ notice_NN to_TO the_DT responsible_JJ party_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ if_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ species_NNS of_IN mosquitoes_NNS can_MD be_VB controlled_VBN and_CC the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN be_VB prevented_VBN ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ happened_VBN frequently_RB that_IN when_WRB persons_NNS are_VBP summoned_VBN before_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP under_IN section_NN 381_CD (_( as_IN it_PRP stands_VBZ at_IN present_NN )_) with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO obtain_VB the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN an_DT order_NN to_TO abolish_VB or_CC protect_VB a_DT collection_NN of_IN water_NN that_WDT is_VBZ the_DT breeding_VBG place_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ,_, the_DT case_NN is_VBZ dismissed_VBN ._.
Quite_RB recently_RB in_IN a_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT house_NN owner_NN had_VBD refused_VBN to_TO obey_VB an_DT order_NN to_TO fill_VB up_RP a_DT collection_NN of_IN water_NN in_IN which_WDT mosquitoes_NNS were_VBD breeding_VBG on_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS ,_, the_DT Magistrate_NNP dismissed_VBD the_DT case_NN ,_, basing_VBG his_PRP$ decision_NN on_IN the_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT defendant_NN that_WDT ?_. 125_CD the_DT hole_NN in_IN question_NN was_VBD not_RB a_DT quarryhole_NN ,_, the_DT term_NN by_IN which_WDT it_PRP had_VBD been_VBN described_VBN in_IN the_DT notice_NN ._.
The_DT fact_NN of_IN its_PRP$ being_VBG a_DT breeding_NN place_NN for_IN mosquitoes_NNS was_VBD not_RB disputed_VBN ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN where_WRB a_DT house_NN owner_NN refused_VBD to_TO cover_VB a_DT cistern_JJ which_WDT was_VBD breeding_VBG mosquitoes_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN section_NN 381_CD of_IN the_DT Act_NNP contained_VBD no_DT provisions_NNS regarding_VBG cisterns_NNS ,_, the_DT word_NN ``_`` tank_NN ''_'' being_VBG held_VBD not_RB to_TO apply_VB ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN a_DT man_NN summoned_VBN for_IN refusing_VBG to_TO comply_VB with_IN an_DT order_NN to_TO close_VB a_DT well_NN ,_, stated_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT well_NN on_IN his_PRP$ premises_NNS and_CC called_VBD wit-_NN nesses_NNS to_TO prove_VB the_DT fact_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD of_IN course_NN a_DT mere_JJ legal_JJ quibble_NN ,_, there_EX being_VBG a_DT water-hole_JJ resembling_NN a_DT well_NN on_IN the_DT premises_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT Magistrate_NNP dismissed_VBD the_DT case_NN and_CC the_DT breeding_JJ place_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS which_WDT the_DT inspector_NN called_VBD a_DT well_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT owner_NN something_NN else_RB ,_, remained_VBD unprotected_JJ ._.
335_CD ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ recent_JJ book_NN on_IN Malaria_NNP Prevention_NNP Major_NNP Ross_NNP states_VBZ that-_JJ ``_`` A_NNP serious_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN all_DT sanitary_JJ improvement_NN lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT ``_`` inadequacy_NN of_IN punishment_NN often_RB given_VBN by_IN legislators_NNS for_IN sanitary_JJ contra-_JJ ``_`` ventions_NNS ._.

Endless_JJ petitions_NNS are_VBP ``_`` allowed_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT time_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Department_NNP which_WDT should_MD be_VB spent_VBN ``_`` on_IN useful_JJ work_NN is_VBZ used_VBN up_RP in_IN attending_VBG Courts_NNS and_CC writing_VBG up_RP cases-a_JJ ``_`` simple_JJ waste_NN of_IN public_JJ funds_NNS !_.

The_DT following_JJ paragraph_NN appeared_VBD in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Spain_NNP Gazette_NNP of_IN 6th_CD August_NNP 1909_CD :_: -_: ``_`` For_IN failing_VBG to_TO keep_VB their_PRP$ premises_NNS free_VBP from_IN stagnant_JJ water_NN liable_JJ to_TO ``_`` breed_VB mosquitoes_NNS ,_, four_CD persons_NNS were_VBD prosecuted_VBN at_IN the_DT City_NNP Police_NNP Court_NNP ``_`` yesterday_NN ._.

339_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN these_DT notes_NNS that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN convictions_NNS and_CC fines_NNS inflicted_VBN were_VBD for_IN allowing_VBG mosquitoes_NNS to_TO breed_VB in_IN antiformicas_NN ,_, barrels_NNS and_CC tubs_NNS ._.

340_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT section_NN in_IN the_DT present_JJ City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Municipal_NNP Act_NNP which_WDT would_MD allow_VB the_DT authorities_NNS responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP to_TO proceed_VB against_IN owners_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS of_IN premises_NNS containing_VBG breeding_VBG places_NNS of_IN this_DT nature_NN ;_: and_CC until_IN an_DT enactment_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN laying_VBG down_RP clearly_RB and_CC inclusively_RB that_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS in_IN any_DT and_CC every_DT collection_NN of_IN water_NN is_VBZ a_DT breach_NN of_IN the_DT law_NN ,_, and_CC giving_VBG power_NN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS themselves_PRP to_TO abate_VB such_JJ nuisances_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO see_VB how_WRB mosquito_JJ breeding_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB prevented_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
?_. 128_CD CHAPTER_NN IV_NNP ._.
THE_DT COST_NNP OF_NNP MOSQUITO_NNP PREVENTION_NNP ._.
Section_NN 1_CD ._.
341_CD ._.
THE_DT COST_NNP OF_NNP MOSQUITO_NNP PREVENTION_NNP IN_NNP OTHER_NNP PARTS_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP WORLD.-It_NNP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO discuss_VB the_DT cost_NN of_IN mosquito_JJ prevention_NN at_IN some_DT length_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO arrive_VB at_IN an_DT idea_NN of_IN the_DT expenditure_NN demanded_VBN by_IN efficient_JJ work_NN of_IN this_DT nature_NN ._.
Below_IN are_VBP given_VBN certain_JJ figures_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT staff_NN employed_VBN and_CC the_DT expenditure_NN incurred_VBN in_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN towns_NNS in_IN the_DT tropics_NNS in_IN which_WDT anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN undertaken_VBN ._.
342_CD ._.
Ismailia.-A_JJ town_NN with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 8,000_CD people_NNS ._.
No_DT rainfall_NN and_CC no_DT rivers_NNS or_CC streams_NNS ._.
All_DT mosquito-breeding_JJ places_NNS artificial_JJ ,_, including_VBG the_DT irrigation_NN channels_NNS and_CC small_JJ marshes_NNS formed_VBN by_IN leakage_NN from_IN the_DT fresh_JJ water_NN canal_NN ._.
For_IN anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN a_DT gang_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT European_JJ inspector_NN and_CC three_CD men_NNS ,_, was_VBD employed_VBN ._.
They_PRP visited_VBD the_DT houses_NNS and_CC compounds_NNS in_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC destroyed_VBD any_DT mosquito_NNS larv_VBP they_PRP found_VBD with_IN kerosine_NN and_CC crude_NN petroleum_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, some_DT engineers_NNS and_CC a_DT number_NN of_IN workmen_NNS were_VBD employed_VBN in_IN clear-_JJ ing_NN gardens_NNS of_IN all_DT pools_NNS ,_, puddles_NNS and_CC stagnant_JJ water_NN generally_RB ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT permanent_JJ work_NN was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
30,000_CD ._.
The_DT annual_JJ cost_NN of_IN keeping_VBG the_DT gardens_NNS and_CC irrigation_NN channels_NNS free_JJ of_IN mosquito_NN larv_NN is_VBZ now_RB Rs_NNP ._.
4,875_CD and_CC the_DT oiling_NN of_IN the_DT cess-pools_NNS and_CC the_DT general_JJ work_NN of_IN the_DT mosquito_NN brigade_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN is_VBZ Rs_NNP ._.
6,562-8-0_JJ per_IN annum_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT Rs_NNP ._.
3,312-8-0_JJ is_VBZ spent_VBN on_IN oil_NN and_CC Rs_NNP ._.
3,250_CD on_IN salaries_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN this_DT regular_JJ work_NN is_VBZ now_RB about_IN Rs_NNP ._.

THE_DT COST_NNP OF_NNP MOSQUITO_NNP PREVENTION_NNP ''_'' IN_NNP BOMBAY.-It_NNP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO go_VB into_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN of_IN efficient_JJ anti-mosquito_JJ work_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP in_IN some_DT detail_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN a_DT clear_JJ idea_NN may_MD be_VB gained_VBN of_IN the_DT staff_NN and_CC organization_NN required_VBN for_IN such_JJ work_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Census_NNP Report_NNP of_IN 1901_CD a_DT house_NN was_VBD defined_VBN as_IN ``_`` a_DT building_NN under_IN one_CD undivided_JJ roof_NN ,_, ''_'' but_CC a_DT building_NN having_VBG two_CD or_CC more_JJR separate_JJ root_NN 's_POS connected_VBN inter_NN se_NN by_IN subsidiary_NN roofs_NN was_VBD also_RB classed_VBN as_IN a_DT single_JJ house_NN ._.

As_IN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN stated_VBN ,_, such_PDT a_DT scheme_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB successful_JJ ,_, must_MD ensure_VB that_IN every_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT 45,000_CD ``_`` houses_NNS ''_'' or_CC premises_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP is_VBZ examined_VBN by_IN a_DT trained_JJ inspector_NN once_RB every_DT week_NN or_CC ten_JJ days_NNS ._.

358_CD ._.
But_CC if_IN we_PRP adopt_VBP the_DT figure_NN of_IN 25_CD houses_NNS a_DT day_NN as_IN the_DT work_NN to_TO be_VB accomplished_VBN by_IN each_DT inspector_NN ,_, one_CD man_NN could_MD inspect_VB at_IN this_DT rate_NN about_IN 600_CD houses_NNS a_DT month_NN ,_, 200_CD houses_NNS every_DT ten_NN days_NNS ,_, or_CC 150_CD every_DT week_NN ._.

5,00,000_CD ._.
136_CD CHAPTER_NN V._NNP THE_NNP OBSTACLES_NNP TO_NNP MALARIA_NNP PREVENTION_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY_NNP ._.
383_CD ._.
In_IN an_DT ad_NN interim_JJ report_NN published_VBN in_IN 1910_CD it_PRP was_VBD pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN conditions_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP were_VBD exceedingly_RB favourable_JJ for_IN the_DT suppression_NN of_IN malaria_NNS by_IN measures_NNS directed_VBN against_IN the_DT species_NNS of_IN mosquito_NN responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT Island_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ of_IN small_JJ size_NN and_CC possessed_VBN of_IN no_DT rivers_NNS or_CC natural_JJ water_NN courses_NNS ;_: the_DT population_NN is_VBZ very_RB large_JJ and_CC is_VBZ concen-_JJ trated_JJ chiefly_NN upon_IN the_DT southern_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ._.
This_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ an_DT area_NN of_IN about_IN eleven_JJ square_NN miles_NNS ,_, contains_VBZ the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP proper_NN with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN 700,000_CD persons_NNS ;_: the_DT sea_NN forms_VBZ its_PRP$ boundary_JJ to_TO the_DT south_NN ,_, east_NN and_CC west_NN ;_: and_CC to_TO the_DT north_JJ malaria_NN is_VBZ so_RB little_JJ in_IN amount_NN as_IN to_TO be_VB almost_RB negligible_JJ ._.
Although_IN the_DT total_JJ rainfall_NN is_VBZ heavy_JJ ,_, it_PRP nearly_RB all_DT falls_NNS in_IN four_CD months_NNS and_CC for_IN eight_CD months_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN there_EX is_VBZ almost_RB no_DT rain_NN ._.
On_IN general_JJ grounds_NNS therefore_RB there_RB do_VBP not_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB any_DT great_JJ obstacles_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN ._.
A_DT detailed_JJ consideration_NN of_IN the_DT type_NN of_IN breeding_VBG places_NNS favoured_VBN by_IN Neocellia_NNP stephensi_NN ,_, the_DT principal_NN carrier_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, supports_VBZ the_DT view_NN not_RB only_RB that_IN anopheline_JJ reduction_NN is_VBZ the_DT most_RBS suitable_JJ measure_NN to_TO use_VB but_CC that_IN as_RB far_RB as_IN natural_JJ difficulties_NNS are_VBP concerned_VBN ,_, the_DT work_NN of_IN prevention_NN should_MD be_VB very_RB easy_JJ ._.
There_EX appear_VB to_TO be_VB only_RB about_IN 2,000_CD breeding_NN places_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, which_WDT harbour_VBP larv_NN of_IN malaria-carrying_JJ anopheles_NNS at_IN present_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN are_VBP artificial_JJ collections_NNS of_IN water_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN wells_NNS ,_, fountains_NNS ,_, and_CC small_JJ masonry_NN tanks_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP not_RB in_IN themselves_PRP difficult_JJ places_NNS to_TO deal_VB with_IN ._.
But_CC as_IN we_PRP have_VBP already_RB seen_VBN in_IN the_DT Chapter_NN on_IN the_DT Legal_NNP Aspect_NNP of_IN Mosquito_NNP Prevention_NNP there_EX are_VBP other_JJ obstacles_NNS to_TO be_VB overcome_VBN ._.
384_CD ._.
The_DT physical_JJ obstacles_NNS to_TO prevention_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP are_VBP so_RB few_JJ and_CC insignificant_JJ that_IN they_PRP would_MD not_RB deter_VB municipalities_NNS of_IN one-tenth_JJ the_DT size_NN in_IN many_JJ other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, from_IN undertaking_VBG the_DT immediate_JJ control_NN of_IN malaria_NNS (_( vide_JJ Durban_NNP with_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN 60,000_CD people_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ spent_VBN Rs_NNP ._.
12,00,000_CD on_IN abolishing_VBG certain_JJ swamps_NNS near_IN the_DT town_NN ;_: and_CC which_WDT supports_VBZ a_DT special_JJ mosquito_NN brigade_NN of_IN 2_CD Europeans_NNPS and_CC 50_CD Indians_NNPS )_) ,_, in_IN spite_NN of_IN the_DT few_JJ who_WP might_MD object_VB ;_: but_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT danger_NN that_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP ignorance_NN ,_, prejudice_NN and_CC apathy_NN may_MD make_VB the_DT task_NN no_DT easy_JJ one_CD ._.
385_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ thing_NN when_WRB discussing_VBG the_DT problems_NNS of_IN sanitation_NN in_IN India_NNP to_TO hear_VB people_NNS speak_VB of_IN the_DT dense_JJ ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT masses_NNS ,_, as_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT greatest_JJS obstacles_NNS to_TO reform_VB ._.
But_CC although_IN this_DT is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN true_JJ in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, a_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT facts_NNS does_VBZ not_RB support_VB the_DT view_NN that_IN the_DT dense_JJ ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT masses_NNS is_VBZ any_DT great_JJ obstacle_NN to_TO the_DT suppression_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT ignorance_NN of_IN the_DT masses_NNS did_VBD not_RB prevent_VB the_DT adoption_NN of_IN a_DT pure_JJ water-supply_NN once_IN the_DT educated_JJ classes_NNS had_VBD decided_VBN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD necessary_JJ ;_: neither_DT has_VBZ it_PRP prevented_VBD the_DT adoption_NN of_IN drainage_NN schemes_NNS ,_, street_NN lighting_NN and_CC a_DT host_NN of_IN other_JJ improvements_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT City_NNP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ,_, whenever_WP the_DT educated_VBN classes_NNS have_VBP been_VBN convinced_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ value_NN ;_: moreover_CC the_DT continued_JJ presence_NN of_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ not_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT habits_NNS of_IN the_DT ignorant_JJ masses_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, but_CC to_TO causes_NNS for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN within_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT educated_VBN and_CC wealthy_JJ property-owning_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
386_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS significant_JJ fact_NN that_IN during_IN the_DT investigation_NN no_DT difficulty_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT City_NNP in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN uneducated_JJ and_CC poor_JJ people_NNS ._.
Many_JJ of_IN these_DT people_NNS ,_, especially_RB in_IN places_NNS where_WRB malaria_NN was_VBD prevalent_JJ ,_, were_VBD keenly_RB interested_JJ in_IN the_DT matter_NN ;_: they_PRP readily_RB came_VBD for-_JJ ward_NN and_CC allowed_VBD their_PRP$ fingers_NNS to_TO be_VB pricked_VBN for_IN the_DT taking_NN of_IN the_DT blood_NN films_NNS ;_: and_CC they_PRP often_RB brought_VBD their_PRP$ children_NNS out_RP to_TO be_VB examined_VBN ._.
In_IN other_JJ cases_NNS ,_, when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN open_JJ wells_NNS and_CC other_JJ unprotected_JJ collections_NNS of_IN water_NN were_VBD largely_RB responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT ill-health_NN of_IN their_PRP$ children_NNS or_CC themselves_PRP ,_, or_CC for_IN the_DT plague_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS from_IN which_WDT they_PRP suffered_VBD ,_, many_JJ of_IN the_DT householders_NNS volunteered_VBD the_DT statement_NN that_IN they_PRP would_MD gladly_RB have_VB them_PRP closed_VBN or_CC covered_VBN ,_, ?_. 137_CD but_CC they_PRP were_VBD only_RB tenants_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP feared_VBD that_IN if_IN they_PRP asked_VBD the_DT landlord_NN to_TO close_VB or_CC cover_VB the_DT well_NN and_CC supply_VB a_DT pump_NN ,_, their_PRP$ rent_NN would_MD be_VB enhanced_VBN ._.
387_CD ._.
But_CC this_DT attitude_NN is_VBZ not_RB universal_JJ ._.

388_CD ._.
Early_RB in_IN the_DT investigation_NN very_RB little_JJ difficulty_NN was_VBD met_VBN with_IN in_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN wells_NNS and_CC other_JJ possible_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS on_IN private_JJ property_NN ,_, but_CC directly_RB action_NN began_VBD to_TO be_VB taken_VBN by_IN the_DT municipal_JJ authorities_NNS against_IN owners_NNS of_IN such_JJ breeding_NN places_NNS ,_, opposition_NN was_VBD encountered_VBN more_RBR frequently_RB ;_: and_CC this_DT opposition_NN usually_RB came_VBD from_IN those_DT who_WP were_VBD educated_VBN ,_, wealthy_JJ and_CC influential_JJ ._.
In_IN one_CD case_NN ,_, a_DT wealthy_NN and_CC influential_JJ house-owner_NN ,_, possessing_VBG many_JJ houses_NNS in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT best_JJS parts_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, thereatened_VBD to_TO take_VB proceed-_JJ ings_NNS for_IN trespass_NN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN his_PRP$ properties_NNS being_VBG visited_VBN ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT owner_NN of_IN a_DT large_JJ mansion_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT grounds_NNS of_IN which_WDT there_EX were_VBD five_CD wells_NNS ,_, objected_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ being_VBG examined_VBN and_CC stated_VBN that_IN for_IN eight_CD years_NNS no_DT municipal_JJ inspector_NN had_VBD crossed_VBN his_PRP$ threshold_NN ;_: but_CC eventually_RB he_PRP allowed_VBD the_DT examination_NN to_TO proceed_VB after_IN being_VBG informed_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN an_DT investigation_NN under_IN Government_NNP ._.
389_CD ._.
Within_IN the_DT past_JJ two_CD years_NNS also_RB when_WRB proceedings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Authorities_NNPS against_IN property-owners_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO enforcing_VBG the_DT adoption_NN of_IN precautions_NNS against_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ anopheles_NNS ,_, every_DT conceivable_JJ excuse_NN has_VBZ been_VBN put_VBN forward_RB as_IN a_DT reason_NN for_IN non-compliance_NN ._.
Some_DT well-owners_NNS suggested_VBD that_IN the_DT covering_NN of_IN wells_NNS would_MD be_VB ``_`` Disastrous_NNP and_CC lead_NN to_TO an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN some_DT pest_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT accumulated_JJ bad_JJ gases_NNS and_CC stench_NN forcibly_RB confined_VBD to_TO wells_NNS ._. ''_''
Another_DT idea_NN put_VBD forward_RB was_VBD that_IN the_DT drains_NNS and_CC sewers_NNS of_IN the_DT City_NNP were_VBD leaky_JJ and_CC that_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT cause_NN of_IN the_DT trouble_NN ._.
One_CD protest_NN mentioned_VBD that-_JJ ``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB said_VBD and_CC believed_VBD that_IN our_PRP$ municipal_JJ leaky_JJ sewers_NNS and_CC ``_`` drains_NNS allow_VBP sewage_NN water_NN to_TO run_VB into_IN wells_NNS and_CC pollute_VB them_PRP ,_, and_CC hence_RB ``_`` mosquito_JJ germs_NNS are_VBP produced_VBN or_CC helped_VBN to_TO be_VB produced_VBN ._. ''_''
390_CD ._.
Another_DT opinion_NN which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB received_VBN very_RB general_JJ acceptance_NN ,_, is_VBZ voiced_VBN thus_RB :_: -_: ``_`` It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, admitted_VBD that_IN wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS ,_, besides_IN being_VBG of_IN constant_JJ ``_`` use_NN ordinarily_RB and_CC specially_RB under_IN emergencies_NNS ,_, are_VBP natural_JJ reservoirs_NNS or_CC ``_`` places_NNS for_IN the_DT accumulation_NN of_IN sub-soil_JJ water_NN whenever_WRB the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` land_NN is_VBZ watery_JJ ..._: ..._: and_CC Bombay_NNP land_NN is_VBZ watery_RB ._.
If_IN they_PRP are_VBP filled_VBN in_IN or_CC ``_`` the_DT places_NNS of_IN accumulation_NN are_VBP done_VBN away_RB with_IN ,_, the_DT sub-soil_JJ water_NN ``_`` must_MD naturally_RB rise_VB to_TO the_DT surface_NN and_CC do_VB much_JJ harm_NN and_CC mischief_NN to_TO the_DT ``_`` general_JJ health_NN ._. ''_''
391_CD ._.
Religious_JJ scruples_NNS have_VBP been_VBN put_VBN forward_RB again_RB and_CC again_RB as_IN a_DT reason_NN for_IN not_RB protecting_VBG a_DT well_NN ._.
Thus_RB a_DT Hindu_NNP gentleman_NN stated_VBD regarding_VBG a_DT well_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO cover_VB :_: -_: ``_`` That_IN the_DT well_NN in_IN question_NN is_VBZ a_DT charitable_JJ property_NN ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ used_VBN only_RB ``_`` for_IN bathing_NN purposes_NNS by_IN persons_NNS visiting_VBG the_DT neighbouring_JJ temple_NN of_IN which_WDT ``_`` it_PRP is_VBZ an_DT adjunct_NN ;_: that_IN the_DT filling_VBG up_IN of_IN the_DT well_NN or_CC even_RB the_DT closing_NN it_PRP so_RB as_IN ``_`` to_TO shut_VB off_RP the_DT rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN will_MD hurt_VB the_DT religious_JJ susceptibilities_NNS of_IN the_DT ``_`` pious_JJ Hindus_NNP of_IN the_DT locality_NN ._. ''_''
392_CD ._.
In_IN another_DT case_NN it_PRP was_VBD put_VBN forward_RB by_IN a_DT firm_NN of_IN solicitors_NNS as_IN a_DT reason_NN for_IN their_PRP$ clients_NNS not_RB complying_VBG with_IN an_DT order_NN to_TO cover_VB a_DT well_RB that-_JJ ``_`` The_DT proposed_VBN measures_NNS are_VBP repugnant_JJ to_TO eastern_JJ ideas_NNS and_CC if_IN carried_VBN ``_`` out_RB would_MD wound_VB the_DT religious_JJ susceptibilities_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ clients_NNS and_CC would_MD ``_`` disable_VB them_PRP from_IN performing_VBG their_PRP$ religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS and_CC from_IN ``_`` washing_VBG dead_JJ bodies_NNS ,_, and_CC would_MD interfere_VB with_IN their_PRP$ religious_JJ liberty_NN ;_: B_NNP 136-35_CD ?_. 138_CD ``_`` that_IN the_DT danger_NN against_IN which_WDT the_DT steps_NNS are_VBP prepared_VBN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN is_VBZ an_DT ``_`` imaginary_JJ one_CD ,_, etc_FW ._. ''_''
This_DT letter_NN went_VBD on_IN to_TO point_VB out_RP that_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN malaria_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP was_VBD the_DT ``_`` Excavation_NN of_IN land_NN previously_RB reclaimed_VBN by_IN town_NN sweepings_NNS ''_'' and_CC also_RB stated_VBD that-_JJ ``_`` The_DT existence_NN of_IN fever_NN is_VBZ attributable_JJ to_TO (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT existence_NN of_IN sub-soil_NN ``_`` water_NN and_CC gases_NNS emanating_VBG from_IN the_DT ground_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT defective_JJ construc-_NN ``_`` tion_NN of_IN drains_NNS ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) the_DT leaky_NN and_CC choked_VBD up_RP condition_NN of_IN the_DT drains_NNS which_WDT ``_`` contaminate_NN wells_NNS and_CC places_NNS of_IN storage_NN of_IN water_NN ;_: and_CC (_( 4_CD )_) the_DT use_NN of_IN storm-_JJ ``_`` water_NN drains_NNS for_IN carrying_VBG off_RP sullage_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT letter_NN further_RB stated_VBD that-_JJ ``_`` If_IN the_DT theory_NN of_IN sub-soil_JJ water_NN and_CC emanations_NNS of_IN gases_NNS therefrom_EX is_VBZ ``_`` correct_JJ ,_, the_DT measures_NNS now_RB proposed_VBN would_MD raise_VB the_DT level_NN of_IN the_DT sub-soil_JJ ``_`` water_NN and_CC further_RB endanger_VB the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ._. ''_''
And_CC it_PRP ended_VBD by_IN a_DT second_JJ appeal_NN on_IN behalf_NN of_IN supposed_VBN religious_JJ liberty_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN open_JJ wells_NNS were_VBD necessary_JJ ``_`` As_IN according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ ``_`` religious_JJ doctrines_NNS they_PRP can_MD not_RB use_VB pipe_JJ water_NN for_IN the_DT performance_NN of_IN religious_JJ ``_`` ceremonies_NNS ;_: that_IN the_DT water_NN must_MD be_VB exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, which_WDT ``_`` alone_RB ,_, according_VBG to_TO their_PRP$ religious_JJ text_NN ,_, keeps_VBZ the_DT water_NN pure_NN ;_: that_IN the_DT water_NN ``_`` drawn_NN from_IN covered_VBN wells_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN for_IN religious_JJ purposes_NNS ;_: that_IN the_DT wells_NNS ``_`` would_MD consequently_RB be_VB useless_JJ and_CC would_MD become_VB a_DT source_NN of_IN danger_NN to_TO health_NN ;_: ``_`` that_IN the_DT measures_NNS proposed_VBN would_MD not_RB only_RB cause_VB great_JJ discontent_NN amongst_IN ``_`` occupants_NNS of_IN such_JJ houses_NNS but_CC would_MD be_VB held_VBN as_IN tantamount_NN to_TO an_DT interference_NN ``_`` with_IN religious_JJ liberty_NN which_WDT is_VBZ contrary_JJ to_TO law_NN ._. ''_''
393_CD ._.
These_DT views_NNS ,_, put_VB forward_RB as_IN serious_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN allowing_VBG known_VBN breeding_VBG places_NNS of_IN dangerous_JJ anopheles_NNS to_TO go_VB unprotected_JJ ,_, represent_VB the_DT present_JJ ideas_NNS of_IN even_RB the_DT more_RBR advanced_JJ classes_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC what_WP is_VBZ more_RBR important_JJ from_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN malaria-prevention_NN in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, they_PRP represent_VBP in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS the_DT current_JJ opinion_NN of_IN property-owners_NNS and_CC rate-payers_NNS ,_, in_IN whose_WP$ hands_NNS the_DT municipal_JJ government_NN is_VBZ placed_VBN ._.
The_DT vast_JJ body_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN who_WP are_VBP even_RB less_RBR enlightened_JJ ,_, take_VB but_CC little_JJ active_JJ interest_NN in_IN questions_NNS of_IN sanitation_NN and_CC municipal_JJ government_NN ._.
394_CD ._.
Unfortunately_RB also_RB ,_, the_DT hundreds_NNS of_IN medical_JJ men_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP appear_VBP to_TO influence_VB the_DT views_NNS of_IN wealthy_JJ clients_NNS but_CC little_JJ ._.
In_IN a_DT Municipal_JJ Report_NNP of_IN 1902_CD Dr._NNP Sukhia_NNP ,_, a_DT well_RB known_VBN Parsi_NNP Physician_NNP ,_, recommended_VBD the_DT covering_NN of_IN wells_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO protect_VB them_PRP from_IN the_DT breeding_NN of_IN mosquitoes_NNS ;_: but_CC many_JJ hundreds_NNS of_IN open_JJ wells_NNS exist_VBP to_TO this_DT day_NN in_IN the_DT houses_NNS owned_VBD and_CC tenanted_VBN by_IN Parsi_NNP citizens_NNS ;_: and_CC the_DT Parsi_NNP community_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG in_IN consequence_NN ._.
In_IN 1910_CD a_DT petition_NN signed_VBN by_IN about_IN 350_CD Parsi_NNP priests_NNS was_VBD addressed_VBN to_TO the_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP stating_VBG that_IN ,_, they_PRP could_MD not_RB fill_VB up_RP or_CC even_RB cover_VB their_PRP$ wells_NNS ,_, as_IN according_VBG to_TO traditional_JJ custom_NN they_PRP can_MD not_RB use_VB water_NN for_IN performing_VBG religious_JJ ceremonies_NNS if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ drawn_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT pump_NN from_IN wells_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN covered_VBN up_RP ._.
395_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT most_RBS enlightened_JJ men_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT different_JJ religious_JJ communities_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, see_VBP no_DT great_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN arranging_VBG a_DT satisfactory_JJ solution_NN of_IN the_DT problem_NN ._.
In_IN reply_NN to_TO a_DT communication_NN from_IN the_DT Executive_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP a_DT well_RB known_VBN Parsi_NNP priest_RB stated_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN the_DT Zoroastrian_JJ religion_NN great_JJ importance_NN is_VBZ attached_VBN to_TO the_DT laws_NNS ``_`` of_IN health_NN and_CC rules_NNS of_IN purity_NN and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ therefore_RB been_VBN a_DT common_JJ ``_`` practice_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT wells_NNS attached_VBN to_TO the_DT sacred_JJ places_NNS of_IN ``_`` Parsis_NNP to_TO see_VB that_IN those_DT wells_NNS are_VBP properly_RB cleaned_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN and_CC ``_`` the_DT water_NN kept_VBD in_IN a_DT pure_NN and_CC healthy_JJ condition_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP ,_, therefore_RB ,_, of_IN ``_`` opinion_NN that_IN the_DT unclean_JJ and_CC impure_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT wells_NNS referred_VBD to_TO by_IN ``_`` you_PRP has_VBZ rendered_VBN them_PRP unfit_VBP for_IN human_JJ use_NN ,_, much_RB more_JJR for_IN a_DT sacred_JJ ``_`` purpose_NN ,_, which_WDT those_DT wells_NNS can_MD not_RB serve_VB until_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN impurity_NN ``_`` has_VBZ been_VBN removed_VBN ._.
?_. 139_CD ``_`` According_VBG to_TO the_DT Zoroastrian_JJ Scriptures_NNP ,_, well_RB water_NN is_VBZ kept_VBN in_IN a_DT ``_`` pure_JJ condition_NN by_IN its_PRP$ complete_JJ exposure_NN to_TO the_DT solar_JJ rays_NNS ,_, considered_VBN as_IN ``_`` the_DT best_JJS disinfecting_NN and_CC purifying_VBG source_NN ._.
Hence_NN it_PRP is_VBZ incumbent_JJ that_IN ``_`` the_DT well_NN water_NN that_WDT is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN daily_JJ consecration_NN shall_MD be_VB always_RB entirely_RB ``_`` exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT Sun_NNP ._.
Consequently_RB if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ quite_RB impossible_JJ to_TO clean_VB ``_`` out_IN impurities_NNS from_IN the_DT wells_NNS in_IN question_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ indispensable_JJ for_IN ``_`` the_DT sake_NN of_IN public_JJ health_NN to_TO cover_VB such_JJ wells_NNS as_IN a_DT safeguard_NN against_IN the_DT ``_`` spread_NN of_IN malaria_NNS ,_, then_RB only_RB the_DT suggestion_NN made_VBN in_IN the_DT last_JJ para_NN of_IN ``_`` your_PRP$ letter_NN about_IN the_DT covering_NN of_IN wire-gauze_NN might_MD be_VB adopted_VBN ._.
No_DT ``_`` doubt_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB a_DT check_NN to_TO the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN and_CC partly_RB allow_VB the_DT ``_`` solar_JJ rays_NNS to_TO fall_VB on_IN the_DT well_NN water_NN ._.
But_CC as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ required_VBN that_IN some_DT ``_`` part_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN consecrated_VBD should_MD be_VB poured_VBN into_IN the_DT well_NN (_( from_IN ``_`` which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ drawn_VBN )_) at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT Yazishn_NNP and_CC other_JJ like_IN ceremonies_NNS ``_`` and_CC mixed_JJ with_IN its_PRP$ source_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP afraid_JJ the_DT handpump_NN suggested_VBN by_IN you_PRP ``_`` will_MD not_RB serve_VB the_DT entire_JJ purpose_NN ._.
To_TO obviate_VB this_DT difficulty_NN a_DT well-_JJ ``_`` covered_VBD small_JJ opening_NN must_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT wire-gauze_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP ,_, I_PRP ``_`` suppose_JJ ,_, few_JJ chances_NNS of_IN injurious_JJ larv_NN and_CC other_JJ impurities_NNS being_VBG ``_`` admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT well_RB through_IN this_DT opening_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP will_MD always_RB be_VB used_VBN ``_`` at_IN daytime_NN in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP (_( between_IN 8_CD and_CC 12_CD a.m._RB generally_RB )_) ``_`` and_CC it_PRP will_MD be_VB closed_VBN in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD minutes_NNS after_IN its_PRP$ opening_NN ._. ''_''
396_CD ._.
And_CC another_DT Parsi_NNP priest_NN also_RB recognized_VBN as_IN an_DT authority_NN on_IN the_DT Parsi_NNP Scriptures_NNP expressed_VBD his_PRP$ personal_JJ opinion_NN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` Coming_VBG to_TO the_DT subject_NN of_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN ,_, a_DT well_NN is_VBZ an_DT indispensable_JJ requisite_NN ``_`` in_IN a_DT Parsee_NNP Fire_NNP Temple_NNP ._.
As_IN according_VBG to_TO Parsee_NNP Books_NNP the_DT Sun_NNP is_VBZ ``_`` considered_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT great_JJ purifier_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ required_VBN that_IN the_DT well_NN must_MD be_VB ``_`` exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT rays_NNS of_IN the_DT Sun_NNP ._.
So_RB a_DT well_NN hermetically_RB covered_VBN with_IN ``_`` wood_NN or_CC metal_NN is_VBZ prohibited_VBN ._.
But_CC one_CD 'hermetically_RB covered_VBN with_IN wire-_JJ ``_`` gauze_NN of_IN very_RB fine_JJ mesh_NN ,_, '_'' as_IN suggested_VBN by_IN you_PRP ,_, would_MD serve_VB the_DT purpose_NN ``_`` and_CC would_MD ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, serve_VBP the_DT Scriptural_NNP requirement_NN ._.
``_`` As_IN to_TO the_DT question_NN of_IN drawing_VBG water_NN from_IN such_PDT a_DT well_NN ,_, a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` three_CD principal_JJ ceremonies_NNS performed_VBN at_IN a_DT Fire_NNP Temple_NNP is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN ``_`` that_IN of_IN Jor-melavvi_NNP (_( lit_NN ._.
to_TO unite_VB the_DT Zaothra_NNP or_CC ceremonial_JJ water_NN with_IN ``_`` its_PRP$ source_NN )_) ._.
As_IN we_PRP speak_VBP of_IN 'dust_NN to_TO dust_VB ,_, '_'' i._NN e._NN ,_, one_CD born_NN from_IN dust_NN is_VBZ ``_`` in_IN the_DT end_NN reduced_VBD to_TO dust_VB ,_, this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT ceremonial_NN which_WDT symbolizes_VBZ ``_`` the_DT circulation_NN of_IN water_NN from_IN the_DT earth_NN to_TO the_DT air_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT air_NN to_TO ``_`` the_DT earth_NN requires_VBZ what_WP we_PRP may_MD ,_, on_IN a_DT similar_JJ analogy_NN ,_, speak_NN of_IN as_IN the_DT ``_`` transference_NN of_IN 'water_NN to_TO water_NN ._. '_''
It_PRP requires_VBZ that_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT water_NN ``_`` drawn_NN for_IN ceremonial_JJ purposes_NNS from_IN the_DT well_NN must_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT end_NN returned_VBD ``_`` to_TO its_PRP$ source-the_JJ well_NN ._.
So_RB ,_, the_DT provision_NN of_IN the_DT air-pump_NN ,_, will_MD not_RB ,_, I_PRP ``_`` am_VBP afraid_JJ ,_, meet_VB all_PDT the_DT requirements_NNS ._.
I_PRP would_MD therefore_VB suggest_NN that_IN ``_`` in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT hand-pump_NN ,_, a_DT small_JJ close-fitting_JJ opening_NN ,_, also_RB made_VBD ``_`` of_IN wire-gauze_NN of_IN fine_JJ mesh_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB provided_VBN ._.
For_IN ordinary_JJ purposes_NNS the_DT ``_`` hand-pump_NN may_MD be_VB used_VBN ,_, but_CC for_IN the_DT exceptional_JJ occasions_NNS ,_, when_WRB the_DT ``_`` water_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB drawn_VBN for_IN ceremonial_JJ purposes_NNS ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT above-named_JJ ``_`` Jor-melavvi_JJ ritual_NN ,_, the_DT opening_NN may_MD be_VB used_VBN ._.
As_IN the_DT water_NN for_IN ``_`` ceremonial_JJ purposes_NNS is_VBZ required_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN time_NN only_RB ,_, this_DT provision_NN ``_`` will_MD not_RB permit_VB of_IN the_DT mosquitoes_NNS getting_VBG in_IN ,_, which_WDT generally_RB occurs_VBZ at_IN ``_`` night_NN ._.
Even_RB during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB require_VB a_DT frequent_JJ opening_NN ._. ''_''
397_CD ._.
The_DT views_NNS quoted_VBN above_IN show_NN that_IN there_EX need_VBP be_VB no_DT real_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN satisfactorily_RB protecting_VBG the_DT wells_NNS in_IN Parsi_NNP houses_NNS ,_, provided_VBD the_DT house-owners_NNS are_VBP willing_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT authorities_NNS in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
398_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN Hindus_NNP there_EX may_MD be_VB some_DT slight_JJ difficulty_NN ;_: but_CC if_IN the_DT leading_VBG citizens_NNS of_IN this_DT important_JJ community_NN wish_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, they_PRP can_MD easily_RB arrange_VB a_DT satisfactory_JJ solution_NN of_IN the_DT problem_NN ._.
At_IN present_JJ time_NN there_RB appear_VB to_TO be_VB certain_JJ Hindu_NNP temples_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP that_WDT depend_VBP for_IN their_PRP$ water-supply_JJ upon_IN the_DT water_NN mains_VBZ ;_: and_CC information_NN has_VBZ been_VBN received_VBN that_IN ,_, in_IN a_DT Jain_NNP temple_NN the_DT well_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN a_DT cover_NN and_CC a_DT pump_NN is_VBZ regularly_RB used_VBN for_IN raising_VBG water_NN ._.
399_CD ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT opinion_NN commonly_RB expressed_VBN by_IN Parsis_NNP and_CC echoed_VBN by_IN Hindus_NNP ,_, that_IN a_DT well_NN should_MD be_VB open_JJ to_TO the_DT rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN ?_. 140_CD out_IN that_IN the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ wells_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP are_VBP so_RB situated_JJ that_IN sun-light_JJ can_MD not_RB penetrate_VB to_TO them_PRP ;_: and_CC except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Parsis_NNP ,_, the_DT view_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB based_VBN rather_RB upon_IN some_DT vague_JJ idea_NN that_IN air_NN and_CC day-_JJ light_NN will_MD purfiy_VB water_NN ,_, than_IN on_IN any_DT strict_JJ religious_JJ grounds_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ a_DT common_JJ experience_NN to_TO find_VB that_DT Indian_JJ servants_NNS employed_VBN in_IN large_JJ residential_JJ flats_NNS in_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, which_WDT usually_RB have_VBP many_JJ closed_VBN cisterns_NNS upon_IN their_PRP$ terrace_NN roofs_NN ,_, persist_NN in_IN opening_VBG the_DT lids_NNS of_IN the_DT cisterns_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT sun_NN may_MD gain_VB access_NN to_TO the_DT water_NN ._.
400_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT suggestion_NN that_IN the_DT filling_NN in_IN of_IN tanks_NNS and_CC wells_NNS may_MD cause_VB a_DT rise_NN in_IN the_DT level_NN of_IN the_DT subsoil_NN water_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT covering_NN of_IN wells_NNS may_MD interfere_VB with_IN their_PRP$ ventilation_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT filling_NN in_IN of_IN all_PDT the_DT tanks_NNS and_CC wells_NNS on_IN the_DT island_NN would_MD not_RB affect_VB the_DT subsoil_NN water_NN level_NN to_TO any_DT appreciable_JJ extent_NN ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN water_NN present_NN in_IN the_DT wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS represents_VBZ only_RB a_DT fractional_JJ proportion_NN of_IN that_DT present_JJ in_IN the_DT soil_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT water_NN level_NN of_IN wells_NNS or_CC tanks_NNS is_VBZ usually_RB much_JJ below_IN the_DT level_NN of_IN the_DT subsoil_NN water_NN ._.
The_DT average_JJ rainfall_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ close_JJ upon_IN 72_CD inches_NNS or_CC nearly_RB 6_CD feet_NNS of_IN rain_NN per_IN annum_NN which_WDT is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO a_DT fall_NN of_IN 375_CD gallons_NNS of_IN water_NN upon_IN every_DT square_JJ foot_NN of_IN the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT land_NN ._.
Much_RB of_IN this_DT enormous_JJ volume_NN of_IN water_NN drains_VBZ away_RB into_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN which_WDT would_MD otherwise_RB drain_VB away_RB goes_VBZ into_IN the_DT wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS and_CC raises_VBZ their_PRP$ water_NN level_NN considerably_RB ;_: and_CC the_DT existence_NN of_IN these_DT open_JJ wells_NNS and_CC tanks_NNS helps_VBZ to_TO maintain_VB the_DT subsoil_NN water_NN at_IN a_DT higher_JJR level_NN than_IN it_PRP would_MD otherwise_RB reach_VB ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) As_IN regards_NNS the_DT supposed_VBN necessity_NN for_IN ventilating_VBG wells_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN a_DT well_NN is_VBZ quite_RB open_JJ and_CC uncovered_JJ does_VBZ not_RB necessarily_RB ensure_VB its_PRP$ ventilation_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ way_NN to_TO ventilate_VB many_JJ wells_NNS is_VBZ by_IN drawing_VBG out_RP a_DT considerable_JJ volume_NN of_IN water_NN from_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC a_DT well_RB entirely_RB covered_VBN may_MD be_VB better_JJR ventilated_VBN ,_, if_IN water_NN is_VBZ being_VBG continually_RB pumped_VBN out_RP from_IN it_PRP ,_, than_IN a_DT well_NN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ quite_RB open_JJ ._.
Other_JJ things_NNS being_VBG equal_JJ the_DT water_NN from_IN a_DT well_NN that_WDT is_VBZ entirely_RB covered_VBN will_MD be_VB cleaner_JJR and_CC much_RB purer_JJR than_IN that_DT from_IN an_DT open_JJ well_NN ,_, especially_RB one_CD in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN a_DT populous_JJ city_NN ,_, exposed_VBN to_TO dust_VB and_CC all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN contamination_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN very_RB few_JJ of_IN the_DT wells_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP supply_NN water_NN that_WDT is_VBZ fit_JJ for_IN potable_JJ use_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT covering_NN of_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN these_DT wells_NNS would_MD be_VB a_DT great_JJ sanitary_JJ improve-_JJ ment_NN even_RB apart_RB from_IN the_DT question_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN ._.
?_. 141_CD CHAPTER_NN VI_NNP ._.
THE_DT PLACE_NNP OF_NNP QUININE_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PREVENTION_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP IN_NNP BOMBAY_NNP ._.
401_CD ._.
When_WRB considering_VBG the_DT problem_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ to_TO discuss_VB the_DT relative_JJ merits_NNS of_IN quinine_NN prophylaxis_NN and_CC anopheline_VB reduction_NN because_IN the_DT facts_NNS described_VBN in_IN detail_NN in_IN the_DT chapters_NNS dealing_VBG with_IN ``_`` Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay_NNP ''_'' and_CC ``_`` the_DT Mosquitoes_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ''_'' lead_NN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_WDT anopheline_JJ reduction_NN is_VBZ not_RB only_RB possible_JJ but_CC comparatively_JJ easy_JJ of_IN accomplishment_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN physical_JJ obstacles_NNS in_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ concerned_VBN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN a_DT previous_JJ report_NN ,_, the_DT general_JJ conditions_NNS present_NN are_VBP so_RB favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT success_NN of_IN anopheline_JJ prevention_NN that_IN the_DT complete_JJ eradication_NN of_IN autochthonous_JJ malaria_NNS should_MD be_VB aimed_VBN at_IN rather_RB than_IN the_DT mere_JJ mitigation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
402_CD ._.
This_DT being_VBG so_RB ,_, the_DT place_NN of_IN quinine_NN in_IN any_DT scheme_NN of_IN malaria_NNS prevention_NN for_IN Bombay_NNP should_MD be_VB a_DT subordinate_JJ one_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP must_MD be_VB made_VBN clear_JJ that_IN this_DT statement_NN is_VBZ in_IN no_DT sense_NN a_DT generalization_NN ._.
It_PRP relates_VBZ only_RB to_TO the_DT Bombay_NNP City_NNP ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT conclusion_NN arrived_VBN at_IN as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN careful_JJ investiga-_JJ tion_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ based_VBN upon_IN the_DT assumption_NN that_IN the_DT end_NN to_TO be_VB achieved_VBN is_VBZ not_RB the_DT mere_JJ palliation_NN of_IN malaria_NNS but_CC the_DT complete_JJ eradication_NN of_IN local_JJ sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN ;_: and_CC should_MD any_DT scheme_NN aiming_NN at_IN mitigation_NN of_IN malaria_NNS rather_RB than_IN its_PRP$ complete_JJ control_NN be_VB finally_RB adopted_VBN in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, the_DT question_NN of_IN prevention_NN by_IN quinine_JJ treatment_NN would_MD require_VB further_JJ consideration_NN ._.
403_CD ._.
Shortly_RB after_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT investigation_NN Captain_NNP A_NNP ,_, G._NNP McKendrick_NNP ,_, I._NNP M._NNP S._NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD then_RB in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, proposed_VBD that_IN a_DT distribution_NN of_IN quinine_NN should_MD be_VB undertaken_VBN in_IN certain_JJ malarious_JJ areas_NNS in_IN order_NN to_TO effect_NN an_DT immediate_JJ mitigation_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT hope_NN of_IN preventing_VBG a_DT recurrence_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ malaria_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ autumn_NN ._.
The_DT Municipal_NNP Commissioner_NNP supported_VBD his_PRP$ proposals_NNS ,_, and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN the_DT Munici-_NNP pality_NN made_VBD a_DT special_JJ budget_NN grant_NN to_TO cover_VB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT measure_NN ._.
Two_CD medical_JJ men_NNS and_CC ten_JJ compounders_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN dis-_JJ tribution_NN which_WDT was_VBD commenced_VBN in_IN April_NNP 1909_CD ._.
At_IN first_JJ it_PRP was_VBD confined_VBN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN of_IN children_NNS shewing_VBG splenic_JJ enlargement_NN ,_, but_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN blood_NN examinations_NNS which_WDT shewed_VBD that_IN children_NNS without_IN enlarged_VBN spleen_NN ,_, and_CC adults_NNS also_RB ,_, harboured_VBD malarial_JJ parasites_NNS in_IN almost_RB as_IN great_JJ a_DT proportion_NN as_IN children_NNS with_IN spleen_NN ,_, after_IN July_NNP 1909_CD ,_, treatment_NN was_VBD extended_VBN to_TO all_DT who_WP were_VBD willing_JJ ;_: and_CC by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN August_NNP between_IN 4,000_CD and_CC 5,000_CD people_NNS were_VBD in_IN receipt_NN of_IN the_DT remedy_NN ._.
404_CD ._.
Each_DT compounder_NN was_VBD given_VBN a_DT certain_JJ area_NN to_TO cover_VB and_CC was_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO visit_VB each_DT house_NN about_IN three_CD times_NNS a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS was_VBD at_IN first_JJ decided_VBD on_IN ,_, but_CC there_EX was_VBD some_DT little_JJ delay_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG a_DT supply_NN and_CC for_IN about_RB ten_JJ weeks_NNS coated_VBN pills_NNS were_VBD used_VBN ._.
The_DT pills_NNS proved_VBD to_TO be_VB unsatis-_JJ factory_NN as_IN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN many_JJ of_IN the_DT children_NNS did_VBD not_RB swallow_VB them_PRP ;_: in_IN some_DT houses_NNS they_PRP were_VBD simply_RB put_VBN on_IN one_CD side_NN and_CC in_IN other_JJ cases_NNS they_PRP were_VBD thrown_VBN away_RB ;_: but_CC when_WRB the_DT sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS arrived_VBD they_PRP appeared_VBD to_TO be_VB much_RB more_RBR acceptable_JJ than_IN the_DT pills_NNS ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD taken_VBN readily_RB both_DT by_IN the_DT small_JJ children_NNS and_CC adults_NNS ._.

412_CD ._.
The_DT sale_NN of_IN Quinine_NNP in_IN palatable_JJ form.-_NN During_IN 1910_CD a_DT small_JJ experiment_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP in_IN order_NN to_TO determine_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN popularizing_VBG quinine_NN by_IN putting_VBG it_PRP up_RP in_IN a_DT palatable_JJ form_NN in_IN small_JJ quantities_NNS and_CC placing_VBG it_PRP on_IN sale_NN at_IN tea_JJ shops_NNS and_CC with_IN small_JJ vendors_NNS to_TO whom_WP a_DT discount_NN or_CC commission_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN ._.

415_CD ._.
The_DT conclusion_NN to_TO be_VB drawn_VBN from_IN this_DT small_JJ experiment_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN a_DT palatable_JJ form_NN of_IN quinine-preferably_JJ sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS put_VBD up_RP conveniently_RB and_CC attractively_RB in_IN small_JJ quantities_NNS at_IN a_DT price_NN within_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN the_DT masses_NNS of_IN the_DT population-is_JJ likely_JJ to_TO meet_VB with_IN a_DT considerable_JJ demand_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ supplied_VBN to_TO vendors_NNS at_IN a_DT price_NN which_WDT will_MD allow_VB them_PRP a_DT fair_JJ profit_NN as_IN an_DT inducement_NN for_IN pushing_VBG its_PRP$ sale_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS both_CC as_IN regards_NNS the_DT popularization_NN of_IN the_DT remedy_NN and_CC the_DT mitigation_NN of_IN malaria_NN are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB very_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
416_CD ._.
The_DT use_NN of_IN sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB an_DT important_JJ factor_NN in_IN conducing_VBG to_TO the_DT popularization_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.

In_IN a_DT recent_JJ letter_NN referring_VBG to_TO this_DT matter_NN he_PRP states_VBZ :_: -_: ``_`` One_CD thing_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN commented_VBN on_IN with_IN peculiar_JJ satisfaction_NN ``_`` is_VBZ the_DT advantage_NN of_IN the_DT sugar-coated_JJ tablet_NN form_NN over_IN the_DT quinine_JJ powder_NN ``_`` (_( or_CC crystals_NNS )_) ._.
One_CD Police_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, not_RB quite_RB fully_RB conversant_JJ with_IN English_JJ ``_`` ..._: ..._: ._. said_VBD that_IN the_DT 'sourness_NN '_POS (_( meaning_VBG 'bitterness_NNP '_POS )_) of_IN the_DT ``_`` quinine_NN in_IN packets_NNS prevented_VBD his_PRP$ men_NNS from_IN using_VBG the_DT latter_JJ although_IN ``_`` supplied_VBN to_TO them_PRP free_JJ ,_, but_CC that_IN these_DT tablets_NNS could_MD be_VB taken_VBN readily_RB ._. ''_''
417_CD ._.
A_DT point_NN that_WDT was_VBD remarked_VBN upon_IN by_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT vendors_NNS was_VBD that_IN there_EX was_VBD no_DT maker_NN 's_POS name_NN upon_IN the_DT tubes_NNS supplied_VBD ;_: but_CC this_DT is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN that_WDT can_MD easily_RB be_VB arranged_VBN ._.
The_DT size_NN of_IN the_DT tablets_NNS was_VBD objected_VBN to_TO by_IN some_DT ,_, especially_RB when_WRB they_PRP required_VBD the_DT remedy_NN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN children_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN a_DT smaller_JJR tablet_NN about_IN the_DT size_NN of_IN those_DT used_VBN in_IN Italy_NNP would_MD be_VB more_RBR suitable_JJ ._.
The_DT Italian_JJ tablets_NNS are_VBP sugar-coated_JJ and_CC contain_JJ 020_CD of_IN a_DT gramme_NN (_( about_IN 3_CD ?_.
grains_NNS )_) of_IN quinine_NN ._.
Tablets_NNS of_IN either_DT bi-sulphate_JJ or_CC bi-_JJ hydrochloride_NN of_IN quinine_NN are_VBP on_IN sale_NN in_IN that_DT country_NN at_IN every_DT shop_NN licensed_VBN to_TO sell_VB salt_NN or_CC tobacco_NN ._.
418_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT score_NN of_IN cheapness_NN the_DT bi-sulphate_NN of_IN quinine_NN is_VBZ especially_RB suitable_JJ for_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ much_RB inferior_JJ to_TO the_DT other_JJ salts_NNS of_IN quinine_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NN ._.
But_CC to_TO make_VB quinine_VB a_DT popular_JJ remedy_NN it_PRP must_MD be_VB administered_VBN in_IN a_DT palatable_JJ form_NN ,_, and_CC although_IN sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB quite_RB so_RB effective_JJ as_IN solutions_NNS of_IN quinine_NN ,_, the_DT powdered_JJ drug_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB uncoated_JJ tablets_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ question_NN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP very_RB much_RB better_JJR than_IN no_DT quinine_NN at_IN all_DT ;_: and_CC the_DT result_NN of_IN practical_JJ experiment_NN has_VBZ been_VBN to_TO shew_VB that_IN when_WRB dealing_VBG with_IN large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN people_NNS among_IN whom_WP persuasion_NN and_CC not_RB compulsion_NN has_VBZ to_TO be_VB relied_VBN upon_IN ,_, sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS of_IN quinine_NN are_VBP more_RBR generally_RB effective_JJ than_IN any_DT other_JJ form_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN ._.
419_CD ._.
A_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN quinine_NN in_IN this_DT form_NN is_VBZ already_RB consumed_VBN in_IN Bombay_NNP not_RB only_RB among_IN European_JJ and_CC educated_JJ Indians_NNS but_CC among_IN certain_JJ of_IN the_DT poorer_NN classes_NNS ._.
Usually_RB sugar-coated_JJ tabloids_NNS containing_VBG 2_CD grains_NNS appear_VBP to_TO be_VB used_VBN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP sold_VBN in_IN the_DT bzr_NN for_IN about_IN Re_NNP ._.
1-4_CD a_DT bottle_NN of_IN 100_CD ._.
But_CC there_EX are_VBP many_JJ people_NNS who_WP do_VBP not_RB know_VB of_IN them_PRP or_CC can_MD not_RB afford_VB to_TO purchase_VB as_IN large_JJ a_DT quantity_NN as_IN 100_CD ._.
Among_IN the_DT better_JJR class_NN of_IN coolies_NNS many_JJ do_VBP not_RB care_VB to_TO attend_VB hospitals_NNS or_CC dispensaries_NNS for_IN gratuitous_JJ treatment_NN ,_, but_CC they_PRP will_MD readily_VB purchase_NN medicine_NN that_IN they_PRP think_VBP is_VBZ really_RB useful_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ these_DT people_NNS who_WP will_MD welcome_VB the_DT sale_NN of_IN quinine_JJ tablets_NNS ._.
420_CD ._.
Treatment_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN Malaria_NNP in_IN Bombay.-It_NNP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO refer_VB to_TO the_DT treatment_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, because_IN enquiry_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ good_JJ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT treatment_NN received_VBN by_IN sufferers_NNS from_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN is_VBZ not_RB always_RB efficient_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN many_JJ people_NNS ?_. 145_CD have_VBP a_DT great_JJ prejudice_NN against_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN quinine_NN ,_, and_CC prefer_VBP to_TO use_VB some_DT other_JJ remedy_NN ;_: others_NNS make_VBP use_NN of_IN quinine_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN doses_NNS so_RB ridiculously_RB small_JJ as_IN to_TO be_VB almost_RB of_IN no_DT value_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX are_VBP ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN mentioned_VBN elsewhere_RB ,_, a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN who_WP use_VBP neither_DT quinine_NN nor_CC any_DT other_JJ remedy_NN when_WRB attacked_VBN by_IN intermittent_NN fever_NN ._.
421_CD ._.
Unfortunately_RB many_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS appear_VBP to_TO share_NN the_DT common_JJ prejudice_NN against_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN adequate_JJ doses_NNS of_IN quinine_NN ,_, and_CC prescribe_JJ doses_NNS of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD grains_NNS twice_RB or_CC three_CD times_NNS daily_RB ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN the_DT sufferer_NN from_IN malaria_NN derives_VBZ little_RB or_CC no_DT benefit_NN from_IN the_DT treatment_NN ,_, and_CC both_DT patient_NN and_CC physician_JJ become_NN confirmed_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ belief_NN that_DT quinine_NN is_VBZ of_IN little_JJ value_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ unsuited_VBN to_TO the_DT constitution_NN of_IN Indians_NNPS ._.
422_CD ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ a_DT matter_NN of_IN importance_NN to_TO determine_VB the_DT minimum_JJ amount_NN of_IN quinine_NN that_WDT will_MD cure_VB ordinary_JJ cases_NNS of_IN malarial_JJ fever_NN ,_, the_DT majority_NN of_IN which_WDT are_VBP mild_JJ intermittents_NNS ,_, advantage_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT investiga-_JJ tion_NN in_IN the_DT south_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN people_NNS presented_VBN themselves_PRP at_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT enquiry_NN and_CC asked_VBD for_IN treatment_NN ._.
Gratuitous_JJ treatment_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO a_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS in_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT blood_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN being_VBG first_JJ examined_VBN ,_, a_DT supply_NN of_IN medicine_NN sufficient_NN for_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD days_NNS '_POS treatment_NN was_VBD given_VBN to_TO him_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP was_VBD instructed_VBN to_TO return_VB for_IN a_DT further_JJ supply_NN of_IN medicine_NN and_CC to_TO report_VB progress_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT medicine_NN was_VBD exhausted_VBN ._.
The_DT preparation_NN of_IN quinine_NN used_VBN was_VBD the_DT bisulphate_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS ,_, 5_CD grains_NNS in_IN each_DT ._.
423_CD ._.
The_DT routine_JJ treatment_NN adopted_VBN for_IN adults_NNS was_VBD four_CD 5-grain_JJ tablets_NNS a_DT day_NN for_IN the_DT first_JJ 3_CD or_CC 4_CD days_NNS ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN this_DT time_NN they_PRP had_VBD to_TO return_VB for_IN a_DT further_JJ supply_NN of_IN medicine_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT second_JJ visit_NN they_PRP were_VBD told_VBN to_TO continue_VB with_IN 3_CD tablets_NNS a_DT day_NN for_IN three_CD days_NNS and_CC then_RB 2_CD tablets_NNS a_DT day_NN for_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP had_VBD to_TO take_VB 1_CD tablet_NN a_DT day_NN for_IN a_DT month_NN ._.
424_CD ._.
The_DT mode_NN of_IN treatment_NN gave_VBD excellent_JJ results_NNS in_IN all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NN who_WP visited_VBD the_DT office_NN ._.
In_IN no_DT case_NN did_VBD the_DT 20_CD grains_NNS of_IN quinine_JJ daily_JJ fail_NN to_TO check_VB an_DT intermittent_NN ._.
It_PRP must_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT class_NN of_IN case_NN met_VBD with_IN was_VBD not_RB of_IN the_DT severe_JJ kind_NN so_RB often_RB seen_VBN in_IN hospitals_NNS ._.
Serious_JJ attacks_NNS of_IN malaria_NNS immediately_RB endangering_VBG the_DT life_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN form_NN only_RB a_DT very_RB small_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT problem_NN to_TO be_VB solved_VBN is_VBZ not_RB so_RB much_JJ the_DT treatment_NN of_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN cases_NNS as_IN of_IN the_DT mild_NN but_CC persistent_JJ intermittents_NNS ._.
425_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT treatment_NN referred_VBD to_TO above_IN no_DT great_JJ stress_NN was_VBD laid_VBN upon_IN particular_JJ dosage_NN ,_, patients_NNS being_VBG told_VBN to_TO take_VB either_DT 2_CD tablets_NNS twice_RB a_DT day_NN or_CC one_CD tablet_NN four_CD times_NNS a_DT day_NN as_IN they_PRP felt_VBD disposed_VBN ,_, the_DT only_JJ thing_NN that_WDT was_VBD impressed_VBN upon_IN them_PRP was_VBD that_IN they_PRP must_MD take_VB the_DT full_JJ four_CD tablets_NNS daily_RB until_IN the_DT fever_NN had_VBD ceased_VBN to_TO return_VB on_IN the_DT expected_VBN day_NN ._.
426_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS recurrences_NNS or_CC relapses_NNS it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN in_IN no_DT case_NN did_VBD a_DT patient_NN get_VB a_DT relapse_NN while_IN under_IN treatment_NN ,_, but_CC some_DT who_WP neglected_VBD to_TO continue_VB the_DT treatment_NN after_IN the_DT first_JJ cessation_NN of_IN fever_NN had_VBD relapses_NNS after_IN an_DT interval_NN of_IN from_IN ten_JJ days_NNS to_TO three_CD weeks_NNS ._.
No_DT very_RB young_JJ children_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN ,_, but_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN several_JJ ,_, aged_VBN about_IN 10_CD or_CC 12_CD years_NNS ,_, 15_CD grains_NNS a_DT day_NN was_VBD given_VBN in_IN place_NN of_IN 20_CD grains_NNS for_IN the_DT first_JJ three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS ,_, thereafter_RB 10_CD grains_NNS for_IN about_IN a_DT week_NN and_CC then_RB 5_CD grains_NNS daily_RB for_IN a_DT month_NN ._.
427_CD ._.
A_DT point_NN in_IN connexion_NN with_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN malaria_NN which_WDT frequently_RB arouses_VBZ discussion_NN is_VBZ the_DT form_NN the_DT remedy_NN should_MD take_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ frequently_RB laid_VBN down_RP that_DT quinine_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB administered_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN pills_NNS or_CC tablets_NNS but_CC in_IN solution_NN or_CC powder_NN ;_: and_CC experience_VB in_IN regard_NN to_TO many_JJ serious_JJ hospital_NN cases_NNS leads_VBZ physicians_NNS to_TO insist_VB on_IN a_DT dosage_NN of_IN from_IN 30_CD to_TO 50_CD or_CC more_JJR grains_NNS of_IN quinine_NN a_DT day_NN ._.
Both_DT these_DT rules_NNS are_VBP excellent_JJ ones_NNS for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN serious_JJ cases_NNS of_IN malaria_NN ,_, but_CC insistence_NN upon_IN them_PRP in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT vast_JJ majority_NN of_IN mild_JJ intermittents_NNS is_VBZ a_DT mistake_NN ,_, because_IN it_PRP nauseates_VBZ patients_NNS needlessly_RB with_IN the_DT taste_NN of_IN the_DT drug_NN and_CC alarms_NNS them_PRP by_IN the_DT cinchonism_NN induced_VBD ._.
428_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT observations_NNS described_VBN above_IN it_PRP appears_VBZ reasonable_JJ to_TO assume_VB that_IN for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN mild_JJ intermittent_JJ malaria_NN ,_, which_WDT forms_VBZ the_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN met_VBD with_IN in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, 20_CD grains_NNS of_IN quinine_NN B_NNP 136-37_CD ?_. 146_CD a_DT day_NN for_IN 3_CD or_CC 4_CD days_NNS is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO check_VB the_DT paroxysms_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN relapses_NNS may_MD be_VB prevented_VBN by_IN continuing_VBG with_IN a_DT small_JJ daily_JJ dose_NN of_IN quinine_NN (_( about_IN 5_CD grains_NNS )_) for_IN a_DT month_NN or_CC more_JJR ._.
429_CD ._.
Young_NNP children_NNS and_CC even_RB infants_NNS appear_VBP to_TO bear_VB quinine_JJ pro-_JJ portionately_RB much_JJ better_JJR than_IN adults_NNS ._.
A_DT child_NN of_IN 5_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN can_MD easily_RB bear_VB a_DT dose_NN of_IN 5_CD grains_NNS of_IN quinine_NN repeated_VBN twice_RB a_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ doubtful_JJ if_IN much_RB less_JJR than_IN a_DT 2-grain_JJ dose_NN is_VBZ of_IN any_DT value_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN infantile_JJ malaria_NNS ._.
Infants_NNS of_IN under_IN a_DT year_NN can_MD bear_VB the_DT latter_JJ amount_NN of_IN quinine_JJ easily_RB and_CC children_NNS of_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, if_IN suffering_VBG from_IN chronic_JJ malaria_NNS and_CC enlarged_VBD spleen_NN ,_, often_RB improve_VB under_IN a_DT daily_JJ dose_NN of_IN 5_CD grains_NNS ,_, increased_VBD to_TO 10_CD when_WRB they_PRP get_VBP fever_RB ._.
430_CD ._.
Finally_RB ,_, as_IN regards_NNS the_DT form_NN the_DT preparation_NN should_MD take_VB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN although_IN quinine_JJ solution_NN is_VBZ undoubtedly_RB the_DT best_JJS way_NN in_IN which_WDT to_TO administer_VB quinine_NN to_TO individual_JJ cases_NNS ,_, sugar-coated_JJ tablets_NNS are_VBP so_RB easily_RB taken_VBN even_RB by_IN small_JJ children_NNS that_IN they_PRP offer_VBP a_DT very_RB great_JJ advantage_NN when_WRB dealing_VBG with_IN malaria-infected_JJ populations_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN malaria_NN it_PRP is_VBZ of_IN more_JJR importance_NN that_IN ,_, the_DT many_JJ thousands_NNS of_IN mild_JJ cases_NNS should_MD obtain_VB a_DT form_NN of_IN treatment_NN which_WDT they_PRP will_MD accept_VB readily_RB and_CC which_WDT will_MD be_VB of_IN real_JJ service_NN to_TO them_PRP ,_, than_IN that_DT ,_, they_PRP should_MD be_VB discouraged_VBN from_IN making_VBG use_NN of_IN a_DT remedy_NN ,_, by_IN insistence_NN upon_NN certain_JJ ideal_JJ conditions_NNS as_IN regards_NNS its_PRP$ form_NN and_CC dose_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP only_RB of_IN great_JJ importance_NN in_IN serious_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
?_. 147_CD CHAPTER_NN VII_NNP ._.
SOME_NNP REASONS_NNP WHICH_NNP MAKE_NNP IT_NNP IMPERATIVE_NNP THAT_IN THE_NNP CITY_NNP OF_NNP BOMBAY_NNP SHOULD_NNP UNDERTAKE_NNP THE_NNP ERADICATION_NNP OF_NNP MALARIA_NNP ._.
431_CD ._.
Now-a-days_CD the_DT existence_NN of_IN a_DT preventible_JJ disease_NN in_IN an_DT important_JJ city_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB ignored_VBN and_CC it_PRP has_VBZ become_VBN the_DT custom_NN in_IN large_JJ towns_NNS in_IN the_DT tropics_NNS to_TO carry_VB out_RP certain_JJ measures_NNS of_IN anti-malarial_JJ sanitation_NN as_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN routine_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ generally_RB considered_VBN that_IN such_JJ measures_NNS should_MD be_VB propor-_JJ tionate_NN to_TO the_DT prevalence_NN and_CC intensity_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN when_WRB malaria_NN is_VBZ comparatively_RB mild_JJ there_EX is_VBZ little_JJ need_NN for_IN drastic_JJ methods_NNS and_CC heavy_JJ expenditure_NN ,_, but_CC if_IN epidemics_NNS occur_VBP greater_JJR efforts_NNS must_MD be_VB made_VBN and_CC increased_JJ expenditure_NN incurred_VBN ._.
432_CD ._.
Approaching_VBG the_DT question_NN of_IN malaria_NN prevention_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN this_DT standpoint_NN ,_, it_PRP might_MD be_VB argued_VBN that_IN ,_, because_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ endemic_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ that_WDT measures_VBZ for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN ._.
It_PRP might_MD be_VB urged_VBN also_RB that_IN because_IN the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN malaria_NNS numbered_VBD many_JJ hundreds_NNS ,_, the_DT cases_NNS of_IN disease_NN many_JJ thousands_NNS and_CC the_DT money_NN loss_NN occasioned_VBN to_TO the_DT City_NNP amounted_VBD to_TO twelve_VB or_CC more_JJR lakhs_NNS of_IN rupees_NNS per_IN annum_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD reasonable_JJ to_TO spend_VB a_DT considerable_JJ sum_NN in_IN an_DT endeavour_NN to_TO reduce_VB these_DT figures_NNS ._.
433_CD ._.
But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT more_RBR important_JJ reason_NN for_IN adopting_VBG adequate_JJ measures_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP than_IN considerations_NNS such_JJ as_IN these_DT ;_: and_CC the_DT possibility_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB of_IN diminishing_VBG the_DT amount_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN totally_RB eradicating_VBG the_DT local_JJ sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN from_IN the_DT City_NNP ,_, makes_VBZ it_PRP imperative_JJ that_IN adequate_JJ measures_NNS for_IN attaining_VBG this_DT end_NN should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN without_IN delay_NN ._.
434_CD ._.
If_IN evidence_NN is_VBZ wanted_VBN in_IN support_NN of_IN this_DT statement_NN it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB necessary_JJ to_TO point_VB to_TO the_DT areas_NNS in_IN the_DT centre_NN and_CC north_NN of_IN the_DT island_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP at_IN present_JJ almost_RB free_JJ from_IN malaria_NN ._.
A._NN ,_, B._NNP and_CC C._NNP Wards_NNP are_VBP probably_RB 80_CD times_NNS as_RB malarious_JJ as_IN Mahim_NNP ,_, Worli_NNP and_CC Sion_NNP ,_, but_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT valid_JJ reason_NN why_WRB the_DT former_JJ area_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB rendered_VBN as_IN free_JJ of_IN malaria_NN as_IN the_DT latter_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP should_MD be_VB possible_JJ to_TO accomplish_VB this_DT in_IN a_DT very_RB short_JJ time_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT expenditure_NN of_IN a_DT com-_JJ paratively_RB small_JJ amount_NN of_IN money_NN ._.

Panama.-Since_NN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN work_NN at_IN Panama_NNP there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN an_DT extraordinary_JJ reduction_NN both_DT in_IN the_DT total_JJ amount_NN of_IN sickness_NN and_CC mortality_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN recorded_VBD from_IN malaria_NN ._.
Gorgas_NNP describing_VBG the_DT present_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, says_VBZ :_: ``_`` Our_PRP$ death-rate_NN for_IN the_DT total_JJ population_NN on_IN the_DT Zone_NNP has_VBZ fallen_VBN from_IN ``_`` a_DT maximum_NN of_IN 67.72_CD per_IN 1,000_CD in_IN July_NNP 1906_CD to_TO 21.52_CD in_IN December_NNP 1909_CD ._.
The_DT rate_NN for_IN 1905_CD was_VBD 49.94_CD ;_: 1906-48.37_JJ ;_: 1907-33.63_JJ ;_: 1908-24.83_JJ ;_: ``_`` 1909-18.19_JJ (_( per_IN thousand_NN )_) ._.

Referring_VBG specially_RB to_TO the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT special_JJ work_NN against_IN malaria_NNS Gorgas_NNP says_VBZ :_: ``_`` It_PRP has_VBZ reduced_VBN the_DT deaths_NNS from_IN malaria_NN in_IN the_DT total_JJ population_NN from_IN ``_`` a_DT maximum_NN of_IN 16.21_CD per_IN 1,000_CD in_IN July_NNP 1906_CD to_TO 2.58_CD per_IN 1,000_CD in_IN ``_`` December_NNP 1909_CD ._.

Wilhelmshaven.-It_NNP is_VBZ recorded_VBN that_IN in_IN 1896_CD during_IN the_DT construc-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT harbour_NN at_IN Wilhelmshaven_NNP ,_, a_DT fearful_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN malaria_NN occurred_VBD ,_, which_WDT affected_VBD both_DT the_DT workmen_NNS ,_, the_DT crews_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT shipping_NN and_CC the_DT residents_NNS in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN ._.
At_IN this_DT time_NN little_JJ was_VBD known_VBN of_IN the_DT possibility_NN of_IN preventing_VBG malaria_NN ._.
But_CC during_IN the_DT recent_JJ enlargement_NN of_IN the_DT harbour_NN works_NN ,_, special_JJ precautions_NNS were_VBD adopted_VBN from_IN the_DT commencement_NN and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN there_RB has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
442_CD ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT preventive_JJ work_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP at_IN Panama_NNP and_CC Wilhelmshaven_NNP shows_VBZ that_IN even_RB among_IN aggregations_NNS of_IN labourers_NNS engaged_VBN upon_IN construction_NN work_NN in_IN malarious_JJ areas_NNS ,_, the_DT adoption_NN of_IN adequate_JJ precautions_NNS is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO neutralize_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN malaria_NN ,_, to_TO which_WDT these_DT temporary_JJ collections_NNS of_IN labourers_NNS are_VBP specially_RB liable_JJ ._.
443_CD ._.
Before_IN concluding_VBG the_DT chapter_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB as_RB well_RB to_TO draw_VB attention_NN to_TO an_DT objection_NN that_WDT may_MD possibly_RB be_VB raised_VBN to_TO the_DT carrying_VBG out_IN of_IN anti-anopheline_JJ measures_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN such_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP failed_VBN at_IN Mian_JJ Mir_NNP ,_, a_DT station_NN in_IN India_NNP in_IN which_WDT ,_, as_IN is_VBZ well_RB known_VBN ,_, anti-malaria_JJ measures_NNS were_VBD undertaken_VBN some_DT years_NNS ago_RB ._.
444_CD ._.
Mian_JJ Mir_NNP (_( now_RB called_VBN Lahore_NNP Cantonment_NNP )_) is_VBZ a_DT military_JJ station_NN in_IN the_DT Punjab_NNP ,_, possessed_VBD of_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_IN 16,000_CD ,_, and_CC covering_VBG an_DT area_NN of_IN about_IN 8_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ._.
The_DT country_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ situated_VBN is_VBZ exceedingly_RB flat_JJ ,_, and_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT impervious_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT soil_NN the_DT area_NN is_VBZ an_DT exceedingly_RB difficult_JJ one_CD to_TO drain_VB ._.
In_IN a_DT description_NN of_IN Mian_JJ Mir_NNP it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN :_: -_: ``_`` After_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD hours_NNS of_IN continuous_JJ rain_VBP the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT ``_`` cantonment_NN is_VBZ changed_VBN from_IN that_DT of_IN an_DT arid_JJ plain_NN to_TO that_DT of_IN a_DT district_NN in_IN ``_`` flood_NN ._.
Broad_NNP expanses_NNS of_IN water_NN ,_, often_RB a_DT quarter_NN of_IN a_DT mile_NN in_IN extent_NN ,_, ``_`` cover_VB the_DT plain_NN on_IN every_DT side_NN and_CC the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT follower_NN 's_POS huts_NNS ``_`` on_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT comparatively_RB lowlying_JJ parts_NNS are_VBP literally_RB flooded_VBN out_RP ._.
``_`` The_DT majority_NN of_IN these_DT large_JJ expanses_NNS of_IN water_NN dry_VBP up_RP in_IN the_DT hot_JJ sun_NN in_IN ``_`` three_CD or_CC four_CD days_NNS ,_, but_CC numerous_JJ small_JJ deeper_NN pools_NNS are_VBP left_VBN which_WDT ,_, lasting_VBG ``_`` for_IN the_DT week_NN or_CC ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, form_JJ excellent_JJ breeding_VBG grounds_NNS of_IN anopheles_NNS ``_`` mosquitoes_NNS ._. ''_''
Unfortunately_RB the_DT anopheles_NNS mosquitoes_NNS responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN malaria_NN in_IN Mian_JJ Mir_NNP readily_RB breed_VBD in_IN the_DT pools_NNS of_IN water_NN that_WDT form_NN in_IN and_CC about_IN the_DT station_NN during_IN the_DT rainy_NN season_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN these_DT pools_NNS exist_VBP in_IN every_DT direction_NN out_IN in_IN the_DT open_JJ country_NN far_RB beyond_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT Cantonment_NNP ,_, it_PRP becomes_VBZ an_DT almost_RB impossible_JJ task_NN to_TO control_VB the_DT breeding_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ anopheles_NNS there_RB ;_: and_CC although_IN irrigation_NN has_VBZ been_VBN abolished_VBN and_CC a_DT considerable_JJ amount_NN of_IN preventive_JJ work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attempted_VBN ,_, the_DT results_NNS have_VBP not_RB been_VBN satisfactory_JJ ._.
445_CD ._.
To_TO those_DT who_WP do_VBP not_RB realize_VB that_IN malaria_NN is_VBZ a_DT disease_NN almost_RB entirely_RB dependent_JJ upon_IN local_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, the_DT fact_NN ,_, that_IN anti-anopheline_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP failed_VBN in_IN one_CD place_NN ,_, may_MD seem_VB an_DT argument_NN against_IN their_PRP$ adoption_NN in_IN another_DT ._.
But_CC such_PDT a_DT view_NN is_VBZ not_RB a_DT reasonable_JJ one_NN ._.
446_CD ._.
A_DT brief_JJ comparison_NN of_IN the_DT conditions_NNS relating_VBG to_TO malaria_VB in_IN Mian_JJ Mir_NNP ,_, with_IN those_DT present_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, is_VBZ given_VBN below_IN :_: -_: 151_CD Mian_JJ Mir_NNP ._.
